name: The Great Below
description: Siyra Phemduk has been a resident of the Lavender Beds since 2016 with her husband Ser Phemduk. Shes always been a huge housing fan and enthusiast, helping others decorate, and manage her free company home's d√©cor as well. It wasn't until recently she started to venture out to actual venues around Primal.

Siyra decided to turn her humble abode into a relaxing venue for adventurers looking for a place to rest, take a dip in a hot tub after a long day, or grab something to eat and drink. She was inspired to do so by other relaxing venues like The Nomnomazu, and the Senpan Tea House.

The Great Below serves six different menus (please note all times are listed in Pacific time): breakfast (available 5:00AM to 11:00AM), lunch (available 11:00AM to 6:00PM), dinner (available 6:00PM to 10:00PM), Waffle House Hours (available 11:00PM to 5:00AM), dessert (available at all hours), and a variety of beverages (available at all hours). name: Wicked Ways Distillery
description: > > Wicked Ways will reopen on Sept. 5th. <

The dark and foreboding distillery stood on the outskirts of town, its shady reputation preceding it like a specter. Rumors swirled that the distillers brewed their Magic Rum with mysterious ingredients and techniques, creating a potent concoction that was said to be unsafe for those who consumed it. Despite the warnings, curious thrill-seekers would often sneak in at night, hoping to catch a glimpse of the distillation process and sample the fabled elixir. description: A cozy tavern tucked away in the Black Shroud welcoming adventurers of all types. There you will find SFW RP in an immersive, but still relaxed atmosphere, good company, and an owner who would be honored with your presence!

name: THE BLOODMOON
description: THE BLOODMOON is a safe haven for all creatures of the night that lets you shed their day faces and turn to the night!
We like to surround our nights with metal and rock music along with multitudes of beings of the night!

name: Pica Cafe
description: Have an insatiable craving for construction materials and forbidden food? We're here to serve you. Non-RP chatting and casual RP are welcome!

name: Moonshine Host Club
description: Moonshine is modelled after a traditional host/hostess club where we aim to entertain our guests and help them unwind after a long day with food, drinks and excellent company!

name: Midnight Echoes
description: Midnight Echoes is a high-class Establishment that is a Lounge. A soft atmosphere in which you're able to sit, relax and talk with friends, loved ones or even a stranger. Regardless if you're new or not, you'll find a nice drink, and company you might find yourself surprised to have. Available we have our Moonbeams and Echoes ready to help you out after a long day, a long week. We're here to listen, to talk, to let you enjoy the music with a drink as you see where the rest of your evening brings you.

name: The Coerthan Rose
description: Ishgard's local pirate tavern. Come in from the cold and enjoy a warm drink by the fire with friends!

name: 226 Club
description: Based on a Chicago club in the 1920s, it was shut down due to it's shady Mafia background and rebranded. And since blood is a big expense, Hype Squad Mafia is here to bring it back! Come to Al Capone's favorite club and the hottest speakeasy on Primal - whether your with friends, the family, or by yourself looking for somebody. We would love to make you an offer you can't refuse! <a:wine:881435440933138444>

name: Secret Sakura
description: 🌸 Welcome to Secret Sakura 🌸 We are an 18+ bathhouse with free refreshments, edibles, and more! We are 420 friendly, with a wide variety of hours! Come join us?

name: Blue Bird Cafe
description: The Blue Bird Cafe is Pretty Cozy Cafe ran by two best friends! We make it pretty cozy with Fireplace upstairs for coming out of the Ishgard Cold and it has two different Styles the upstairs is blue and with a lot of plants in the style that fits the Owner who loves bright colors and the downstairs is designed for the co owner who loves the dark colors!

name: Myths Tavern
description: Before you stands a door seeming to appear out of nowhere yet looks and feels like it has always been there. Was it just looked over? It slowly opens and chatter can be heard and rich scents of a well cared for Tavern comes wafting out. As one steps through the door a feeling passing a powerful thrush hold passes through. The Barkeep waves with a ready smile and says to sit anywhere.
We have Live Bard music and if you want to take the stage just ask any of the staff. A rich original lore setting. Are you new to RP no worries we welcome players of all levels.

name: Lunaria
description: Lunaria is designed to be a higher-class and relaxing Bar & Lounge venue for all to enjoy. Want a place to chill with a group of friends, or relax after a long day?
Whatever your need is for coming here, we will, and have tried our best to make sure Lunaria is a good fit.

name: Ruby Red Flower Shop
description: Shop for the perfect flower for a new budding romance, a memorable anniversary gift, or a simple but yet significant "I love you" gesture! I will help you choose the perfect flower for your special occasion!

name: The Voidcast Den
description: The Voidcast Den is a dive bar from the Thirteenth! Rest your weary souls with an enticing drink while enjoying the siren songs of the void~ Or if youre feeling a hint of luck you can go against the odds with our game 666's~

name: Scarlet Order
description: Vampire/Dark themed venue. Come and walk with the Creatures of the Night. Rock/Metal and 90s hits with the occasional theme nights! So come and let the darkness take you. We don't bite.... much.

name: Meili's Repose
description: A cozy little cottage tucked away somewhere in the Black Shroud, Meili's Repose offers a relaxed restaurant/bar atmosphere for travelers who need to put up their feet after a long day on the road.

name: Deadly Sins!
description: Welcome to the Deadly Sins Lounge. What is your favorite sins? Come play with us. ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: The Crystal Meyhane
description: The Crystal Meyhane is a social gathering space for adventurers and all sorts, offering food, drinks, and activities! We have an open stage for bards and sparring, activity rooms such as a gym, a medical center, and more being added!

name: The Traders' Respite
description: An immersive RP cafe for all with an open stage and an Ul'dahn theme. Come relax and have a coffee or hot chocolate with us!

name: The Black Wolf
description: The Black Wolf is an FC led danceclub established in February 2023. Our target is to be an inclusive venue for people to party with no bullshit. That means - apart from the bar - no paid services, no VIP, no paid backrooms. We want everyone coming to us have fun the same way. Chat with other guests, dance, drink. All that matters is that YOU have fun with us. Intrigued? Find us on Light - Odin - Mist - Ward 29 Plot 2.

name: Seventh Dawn Cafe
description: A Cafe themed around the "Scions of the Seventh Dawn."

name: The Corsair
description: Eorzea's first bar and bathhouse on an airship, for gay men, bi men, trans men, and curious men looking to find a safe space to forge relationships and new friendships! We have a stocked bar on our top deck with a fine view of the skies, a hefty menu for those wanting a good hearty meal, and the finest booze for the discerning palates! Try out our Moonshine rum challenge, and enjoy our intimate baths on the lower deck, best for intimate company with a good drink in hand!

name: The Hidey Hole
description: Closed until after the holidays.
An up and coming RP bar inside a hidden cave accessed through a capsized pirate ship. Expect cozy vibes with a hint of chaos, a live bard and a cute bartender. We hope to see you there!

name: Mirage
description: Welcome to Mirage, the ultimate destination for luxury and indulgence in the heart of Eorzea. Our nightclub sets the stage for an unforgettable evening, where the elite come to see and be seen. Step into our opulent realm and prepare to be whisked away into a world where extravagance knows no bounds.

From our exclusive VIP perks to the electrifying beats of live music spun by our renowned DJs, every moment at Mirage is an invitation to indulge in the finer things in life. Immerse yourself in the thrill of our luxurious casino, where a diverse selection of games promises excitement and the chance to test your luck in style. Relax in the lavish surroundings of our VIP exclusive lounge, where personalized service caters to your every whim. Engage with our elegant courtesans, who are dedicated to ensuring your evening is nothing short of extraordinary. Capture the magic of the moment in our state-of-the-art photobooth, and toast to luxury and flex your wealth with our exquisite champagne calls. Join us at Mirage, where the bougie elite come to play and revel in the epitome of luxury and indulgence.

name: Wafflegoth
description: Join us for some laughs as we celebrate spooky season year round.

name: Infrared
description: Infrared is the home of the Hype Krew family. Within these walls we party, make new friends, and have fun doing it. We are an SFW venue and we built this venue on the principles of PLUR (Peace, Love, Unity and Respect). We are also a LGBTQIA friendly venue as well. Come on down and listen to one (or two depending on the week) of our amazing DJ's spin amazing music and have some amazing drinks at our bar. See you soon ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Usaginosokutsu
description: The Rabbits' Den is an 18+ only night-club. Our themes fall in the line of Cybergoth and J-goth. Luxuriant gothic Hingan-themed dance club and lounge. Usaginosokutsu began in a small Shirogane apartment space before moving to our new location in Empyreum, where we offer music, drinks, dance, a casino, and various other pleasantries that come with the night life! We're also roleplay friendly, and most of us spend our time in-character regarding the staff!

We rotate live DJ's and on nights we can't, we have a house DJ who offers plenty of playlist selections. So, even if we don't feature anything specific, we have something for everyone. We also hold plenty of events like cosplay contest, auctions, barding events and more.

name: Third Eye Izakaya
description: It‚Äôs that time of the week! NightRaid‚Äôs partnered establishment will be open for Happy Hour! Bring your friends, lovers, or colleagues to enjoy a night of doman cuisine! All drinks during HAPPY HOUR are discounted. Go through our specials and various types of sushi and doman dishes on the menu! 🍶 Special guest performances usually the second half of Happy Hour!

notices.message: This venue is usually open at the below times at the discretion of the owner, it is not a fixed schedule. Please check the discord's announcements channel before visiting. 😉

name: The Gilded Knob
description: Eorzea's Premier RP Entertainment Venue. Come relax with our professional dancers, a team of talented bar staff ready to cater to your every thirst, and our top-rate atmosphere and hospitality. Spend your evening in the loving embrace of our staff, enjoy our new drink menu, play a few games at our Gilded Casino, and explore our beautiful venue! [The Gilded Knob] Where all your dreams are Golden!

name: Midnight Sanctuary
description: Midnight Sanctuary is a nightclub that celebrates the moonless sky.  It is a time to reflect and find ourselves.  Come join the fun with live DJ's, Gamba, Stocked Bar, raffles and more

name: Usagi Warehouse
description: Looking to see what's behind all the caution tape? Usagi Warehouse is an immersive RP lounge and bar when you can find some underground respite amidst the chaotic outside world. Just be careful of the Kitsune~
Stage is open to all bards unless pre-booked. SFW and NSFW RP services offered.

name: The Tipping Scales
description: This is an immersive 18+ RP venue that welcomes all levels of experience. A little hole-in-the-wall fight pit nestled in the heart of the Goblet, named after the Traders' Scales and how they can ever tip in and out of one's favor in just the blink of an eye. Join us for a fight or two. A round of drinks? Regardless, memories are to be made, fights to be had, and much more.

name: The Beaver Lodge
description: The Beaver Lodge is a place for lewdies with naughty ideas and wicked whims. Whether you're looking for the hottest strippers or courts or just looking for that casual hookup, we're the place for you. A flirty, fun atmosphere is what you can expect when you stop in the Beaver Lodge. Roleplay your way, we're all here for some sexy fun in our ERP lounge. Caution: full frontal lewdity!

name: Nophica's Bowl
description: Nophica's Bowl offers the best in Eorzean fine dining, with seasonal menus, table service, and restaurant book-outs available for special events.

name: Empyreum of Arts
description: Empyreum of Arts is a theater that hosts shows with various performers ranging from dancing to musical performances to comedy shows and more!

name: The Abyssal Zone
description: A void lesbian bath house where you can AFK, relax, soak, or make new friends.

name: The Fire Pit
description: Located in the basement of the Hearth, home of Torchlight Ventures, The Fire Pit is a family friendly tavern that's known for its Eorzean soul food, welcoming IC staff, and a stage to promote performers in the RP community! Its casual setting is welcoming to all and we hope to see you soon!

name: The Moogle's Paw Speakeasy
description: The Moogle's Paw is an rp lounge and bar with a fun and relaxing atmosphere. Come for the tarot and drinks, stay for the moogles!

name: Azeyma's Respite
description: A sanctuary for the world-weary and the sun-starved, a haven for the lost. Azeyma's Respite is a simple character-driven venue featuring lore-focused vignettes within the wider world of Eorzea. Devoted to the ideals embodied by the goddess of inquiry and her exalted flame, this apartment venue is a cozy study dedicated to providing adventurers a warm hearth and safe haven to share their stories with kindred spirits. Come on in, enjoy a glass of wine, offer a prayer, and let down your guard under the shelter of the Warden's refuge. "Here reside the just and the fair, the honest and the philanthropic."

name: The Fiery Nut
description: A quaint, down to earth dive. Located on Balmung at Goblet 10, Plot 4.
Open Wednesday, 8pm-10pm EST
Performances third Wednesday of every month.
Feel free to join our discord for the latest nut updates and special events.

name: Lunar Jelly Lounge
description: Lunar Jelly is a lounge with baths and a bar wrapping around both sides to allow easier access to all patrons! We offer sketches, tarot reading, and gamba shifting in availability. We are a place that wants to ensure the safety of those around us and allow you to feel the vibe and be you!

name: Solace
description: Solace strives to be your light in the distant dark.
We're a group of friends that is trying to bring a bi-weekly place to you,
where one can chill-out at, meet new people and engage
in a bunch of activities while listening to amazing vibes.
Where most have rules, we stick to chaos.
It's a bi-weekly saturday happening, we want to have fun, just like you.

name: Blind‚òÜNamazu
description: Welcome to the Blind‚òÜNamazu, the finest (and only) Namazu-run speakeasy this side of the Ruby Sea! Our staff may be small in stature, but they are large in‚Ä¶ enthusiasm! Trust us, we've managed to avoid any ‚Äòunfortunate accidents‚Äô (this week), so you‚Äôre in safe fins! Probably...

name: Fae Cafe
description: A cute LGBTQ friendly faerie cafe on Siren! Ran by a friendly extroverted Faera, this place was made with love, and provides a cozy, cheerful, welcoming atmosphere! Join us for food, drinks, a little gamba and live bard music! ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Sassy Nightclub
description: Have you ever felt sassy sometimes? Yes, de feel like that all the time, and we are also here to represent ourselves as Royal Family, in service to you our Royal Guests. Do not worry because we are not scary folk, just a bunch of people who want to have a good time and provide some for others so we all can enjoy our nights together with fancy music and a little bit of Role-Play activity. So why don't you come over and experience all we have to offer to you? What are you waiting for? Become a part of our Sassy Royal Family and let's have fun together.

name: Inari Nightclub
description: Inari Nightclub was born from a love of Eastern culture and the goal of bringing a similar feeling to Eorzea. Everything including our club design, menu, ambiance, and DJ choices will keep this core concept in mind. Each week we are proud to foster a safe, inclusive environment as we host auctions, enjoy theme nights, play games, and interact with our friends and patrons. We hope you enjoy your time spent with us and we thank you for choosing Inari as your escape in Eorzea.
Location: Primal - Behemoth - Lavender Beds Ward 18 Plot 6
Venue Hours: 10:00 PM - 2:00 AM EST

name: The Tranquil Tiger
description: The Tranquil Tiger (TRT) is a vibrant bathhouse and club, offering an immersive and welcoming atmosphere for all our patrons.
We offer a wide variety of services to our patrons being VIP, courts, GAMBA, GACHA Wheel, and so much more! Come check us out every Saturday from 8 PM - 12 AM EST!

name: Sunbloom Caf√©
description: A warm and comfy venue aiming to provide you with a cosy space and a gentle atmosphere to unwind in. So sit back and enjoy our friendly service, sip on a nice drink whilst listening to our in-house bard. Whether its to make new friends, or you simply need a place to relax, whatever the reason for your visit, we'll strive to make you feel at home!

name: The Drifting Siren
description: An immersive roleplay venue offering La Noscean classics, fresh seafood, rum, grog and fisticuffs.

name: Lunar Garden
description: 18+/Nightclub/RP Bar

name: Cafe Vesi
description: Cafe Vesi is a cozy cafe at the heart of the Shroud! We aim to offer relaxed, cozy and chill atmosphere for those lazy weekend mornings/early afternoons with simple foods, snacks and drinks. We have a small stage as well where our bards perform their amazing tunes - or would you like to show off your skills? Just ask the bard/staff if you could play a tune or two!

Come have a look at our indoor garden and feed the fishies, enjoy a nap in our pink corner with plushies, have a quiet moment with a book from our small collection while you enjoy the warmth of the fireplace, or just come enjoy the atmosphere and have a chat with us!

name: The Mudd Pitt
description: In here we are lovers and fighters. A RP venue for dirty drinking, dirty dancing and the best part, dirty wrestling

name: The Dueling Otters
description: The Dueling Otters is a casual RP sparring venue. You can always find a friendly face at the bar, great music to listen to, and a staff member to fight. They have a full food and drink menu and hold special nights at the beach and championship matches.

name: Love N Lassos
description: Whether you're a seasoned cowboy or a city slicker who's always wanted to try your hand at country dancing, this is your chance to let loose, embrace the Western spirit, and create memories that will last a lifetime. So grab your partners, both old and new, and let's do-si-do the night away!

name: Darlings
description: We are a larger club that's here for a good time, and to make friendships along the way.

name: Sultana's Moon
description: Chill and cozy environment inspired in fantasy inns/taverns. A place to relax, soft-rp, chat or just afk. Open stage available, unless a band was hired.

name: Black Clover
description: This prohibition era pub hides a secret behind closed doors, a speakeasy of sorts for people to sing, dance, eat and drink their sorrows away. A mysterious tune of times long gone comes from the party dance floor downstairs where you can prance the night away in sounds of electro swing and old classics alike. The dear "Flowers" are eager to accompany you on the dancefloor and ensure your entertainment with games and conversation.
The bars are stocked and ready to serve authentic prohibition era drinks and dishes with a twist and our security is prepared to deal with any do-badders on the scene!

name: Forgold Casino
description: 10k - 1mil bets! Seven unique games! High payouts! (1.5x - 20x and more!). Special free-to-play 'Battle Royale' mini games take place at the top of each hour with a completely house funded grand prize based on the number of players. Play for fun and play FORGOLD! ‚òÖ Goblin ‚òÖ Lav Beds ‚òÖ W4 ‚òÖ P9 ‚òÖ forgoldcasino.carrd.co
I realize random openings is not ideal, and I apologize for that!  I just really do not want this to feel like a job to me.  FUN is the name of the game. 🙂

name: Leaf & Liqueur
description: Leaf & Liqueur is a Bar & Tea House that celebrates the marriage of rich flavors and enticing aromas of quality tea leaves and divination: Tarot Reading. It serves as a sanctuary where patrons can unwind, savoring a diverse selection of beverages that span from non-alcoholic tea blends to creatively crafted cocktail mixes infused with tea. Guests can enjoy the cocktails and tea with various events being hosted each week, including but not limited to bard performances, tea leaf reading, tarot reading, tale-telling, tea bag stitching, tea blending... and much more!

name: StarMist Bathhouse and Lounge
description: Enter our marble sanctuary, where elegance meets indulgence. Lose yourself in the gentle cascade of water and soft candlelight, surrounded by timeless beauty. Embrace the sensual touch of marble on your skin as you immerse in blissful tranquility. Our 18+ Indoor/Outdoor Bathhouse and Lounge awaits, open 24/7. Join us to chat, relax, or indulge‚Äîrules respected, pleasures embraced.

name: Moonlight Groove
description: Moonlight Groove is a Fun & Exciting Nightclub/Venue to hang out with friends and meet new people every FRIDAY NIGHT from 9 pm until Midnight CST, Sometimes later!! We have fun Themes but also great prizes, raffles, giveaways and auctions! You can find us on the Primal DC! We're Located in the Goblet on Famfrit. You can learn more about us at https://mgnc.crd.co/

name: Cheshire
description: Cheshire, is a whacky place that looks to have a fun time. And be a little mad while doing it. Enjoy the regularities one might find at a venue. A fully stocked bar with exotic drinks, a blackjack table & dice set to swipe your coin away, tarot readings. Plus a host of artists, ranging from GPoses, Digital Art, traditional crafts and Roleplay! Come down the rabbit hole, and have a mad time!

name: Club Ignis
description: **„Äã„ÄãClub Ignis„Ää„Ää**
Where the thrill of the night ignites the warmth of connection & community!
‚òÜ  Step into our torch-lit underground nightclub and lose yourself in the fiery ambiance created by flickering flames and electrifying beats from our resident DJ.

‚òÜ For a more relaxed vibe you can head upstairs to enjoy the enchanting sounds of our bard stage, whose soul-stirring performances fill the top two floors, setting the perfect mood whether you're relaxing in our gamba-friendly billiards lounge or indulging in some light roleplay.

‚òÜ For the ultimate escape, ascend to our top floor to soak in a luxurious bathhouse, uncover your destiny with mystical tarot readings, or unwind in the exclusivity of our elite VIP lounge‚Äîall while the melodies of our talented bards weave through the air.
***At Club Ignis, the night is yours to ignite and we'll keep it burning bright!***

name: Tail & Scale Resort
description: We are a small start up venue that is here to help people relax, find new people, and more. We provide many services in our establishment from baths, massage tables, lounges, and a bar. We are a 21+ venue and appreciate anyone that comes to join us. We are open 24/7 for anyone to come and enjoy the establishment!

name: Caf√© Leblanc
description: Caf√© Leblanc is a cozy, quiet little spot to stop in for homemade coffee and curry.

name: iaun
description: Near constant rain pelts the ever growing, and changing landscape of this world. Rusted metal, and dense greenery, meet neon fantasy, as you escape the horrors of life outside the walls, and join us, here, in sanctuary. This nightclub venue has live Djs, dancers, interactive bar, bar games and gamba! Rooms for rent as well if you'd like a little private time away.

name: The Gilded Lily
description: A luxury resort style Venue in the heart of Ul'dah that provides succulent food, expertly crafted drinks, fabulous company, and a space for relaxation and titillation. Tips welcome. (No OOC gil required for food or drinks.)

name: The Loser's Club-Low Roller Casino (smaller location)
description: Welcome to The Loser's Club-Low Roller Casino! We offer Gamba & Live Bards and Dancers! Get around that pesky 50k minimum bet and come test your luck today!

name: Ashu Talif
description: Ashu Talif is a SFW rustic, pirate-themed tavern with a rugged ambiance, set in a seedy port. It caters to immersive RP with a Corsair twist, offering traditional food, drinks, and live entertainment. The venue features an open-air terrace with ocean views, creating a gritty yet inviting space for roleplayers. With an in-house bard and dancers, the tavern emphasizes rough seafaring charm, blending history and adventure for those looking to engage in rich, character-driven stories.

name: Soaking Sound
description: Welcome to a cozy, chill amd NSFW hangout area built in the void. There's nearly always someone here with a vibrant and fun patronage, but our most active time is as listed! 💖

name: Hyper!
description: Hyper is a RP nightclub known for it's close-knit staff and immersive experiences. With themes changing regularly, including full rebuilds of the venue, every experience with Hyper will be unique and fun! Dance on our dancefloor to live DJ's or sit and drink at the main bar or in VIP, have fun with our nightly minion giveaways and special raffles, there is always something to do at Hyper.

name: Crimson Court
description: An indulgent night of company and carousing at the Red Lantern. Dress in black and fetch a mask to gain entry to the court, where you may wine and dine and perhaps even find yourself in the personal company of the companion of your choosing - if you've the wit to woo one. Not interested in more personal care? You're still more than welcome! Enjoy curated concoctions in the company of our excellent hosts, or enjoy our favorite Coffee & Tease treats for a more vanilla affair. Either way, you're bound to have an enjoyable experience.

name: The Temptation Room
description: The Temptation Room, a gentlemen's club, is where elegance and desire intertwine. Step into a world of opulence, where captivating performances and sultry ambiance set the stage for unforgettable evenings. With plush surroundings, intimate lighting, and the finest company, The Temptation Room offers a luxurious escape for those seeking both pleasure and sophistication in one enticing experience.

name: The Rogue Palace
description: A wonderful place to come and forget about reality. Get lost in the amazing beats of our DJ's while you enjoy the amazing drinks mixed by our Bartender!

name: The Drunken Harlot
description: "The Drunken Harlot is a cafe, fronting a speakeasy, which is a cover and money laundering scheme for sky pirates. Mmm, tastes like crime!"
Event is located in the secret tavern downstairs. Give our maidservant the password "foxhole" and come on down for some great drinks and company!
Everyone except Lalafell are welcome!

name: Japanese Anime song Cafe"MIQO"
description: We will **open at 21:00 on Sunday, November 24.**
We will be doing a DJ set of **Japanese anime songs on Twitch**, so please come and have fun with us! If there is an anime you like, we will also take requests.

name: Not a Venue
description: NaV is a Free NSFW Space! so be warned there will be people doing naughty naughty stuff! (And yes, you can ERP here, animations are welcomed too). We do not sell any services like other venues, this is just a place for everyone to come and relax, the venue is open 24/7! But we have preferred hours, join the discord to know more! And so, feel free to use the place as much as you'd like.

name: The Brewing Sands
description: Pray return and welcome to the Brewing Sands, my small indie gallery cafe themed after our beloved Scions of the Seventh Dawn. Here I serve a fine variety of beverages from different parts of the world, provide good company and hospitality, warm fireplace and soothing music. Oh, and Triple Triad, too.
Hope you enjoy your stay!

name: La Signora
description: 𝑾𝒆𝒍𝒄𝒐𝒎𝒆 𝒕𝒐 𝑳𝒂 𝑺𝒊𝒈𝒏𝒐𝒓𝒂

description: The Galbadia offers a high-class, relaxing atmosphere for everyone to enjoy! A place filled with dark humor and violence, we welcome all who seek the thrill of a good spar, and don't mind a little teasing from our clowny announcers and commentators. Best watch your footing, as who knows what sort of trouble you can find yourself in. Various duel themed events, good-looking drinks and even better looking staff! Fancy yourself to be one with the chaos? You can find the thrill of throwing someone full body down to the floor within the ring. We also now present our Circus events, which are big events that take place twice a year! At the circus, there are many games and treats for you to enjoy, as well as collaborations with our affiliates and patrons from other venues!

RP is heavily encouraged, but not required. At Veridian, our goal is to create an immersive experience for our patrons and our staff alike! Our staff aims to interact directly with our patrons and make them feel welcome. Our courtesans/dancers are also encouraged to engage with the audience while performing. The three of them envisioned a place where you could go completely HARD, both musically and erotically, without being separated by VIP sections or surrounded by dancers.

The bakery will be open on Sundays from 6 pm PST, with a soft close at 10 pm PST. It's worth noting that the bakery tends to remain open beyond the posted hours to cater to the influx of customers. Keep an eye on Party Finder and FF14 Venues.

name: The Menagerie
description: *Requires pre-booked appointment via our Discord.* 🎎
If you follow the sounds of a trickling stream, nestled and hidden within the bright lights of Thanalan, you will find The Menagerie ‚Äì a uniquely immersive RP venue.

Fresh lacquer, the sweet scent of newly woven tatami mats, and the warmth of a smile welcomes those that choose to step through the door. For those who are seeking something special, you'll find a haven of beauty and exquisite skill.

It‚Äôs where an exclusive, hand selected few have been trained as Geisha and Oiran for the pleasures of our esteemed guests. Tea Ceremonies, Fan Dances, Horoscopes and more...let our special jewels give you an intimate experience you won‚Äôt soon forget.

Moonlit Kiss is an 18+ high energy Night Club that does tons of fun theme nights, cosplay contests, giveaways and promotes a high energy party hall type of environment with lovely dancers, hype squad, and bartenders.

name: bYOND Lounge

locale in the hills of the Mist.
Great place to hang, chill with friends,
and listen to bARDS perform.

name: The Rabbit Hole
description: Tired of staring at the endless expanse of the aethersea? Weary of the ever-present hum of primals and prophecies? Then tumble down the hatch and into the cozy chaos of The Rabbit Hole!

Here, amongst adventurers, merchants, and moogles alike, you'll find respite from the troubles above. Quench your thirst with exotic elixirs and local brews, guaranteed to put hair on your lalafell's chest (or scales, as the case may be).

Music spills from the corner like spilled ink, weaving tales of bygone heroes and legendary battles. Let loose, share your war stories, or simply bask in the warm glow of camaraderie. Just remember, what happens in The Rabbit Hole...well, let's just say the aether currents have a strange way of keeping secrets.

So, whether you're a weathered veteran or a fresh sprout, The Rabbit Hole welcomes you. Just mind the occasional bombastic bard and the inevitable chocobo stampede - it's all part of the charm, we assure you.
Dive in. You might just find yourself at home.

name: The Falling Snows | Research & Study Respite
description: With changes in the recent year, it appears one of the Scion research enclaves tucked away in Ishgard has opened its' doors to the public.

Having been established for further collaborative effort with Ishgard after the Dragonsong War, it was a simple place for recovery for the Scions in their continuing endeavor, given its' namesake by a dear friend.
It is now open 24/7 for those in need of respite or a quiet place to chug through 3am late finals essays.
The Aide often does not leave his own studies, buried in paperwork, but may make an appearance to check on the goings on at rare times.

(This is my first and only venue, and I wanted to just set it up for people to have their study/research RP if they liked, I hope you like it! I recently set up extra RP rooms as well, and am working on more! There's a more tucked away study/relaxation nook behind the wall/door on the lower floor, and a little cozy space up on the top floor for smalls!
It's pretty much unstaffed/NPC staffed by the nodes since I and my FC buddy are busy a lot of the time, but I made it for others to RP in instead!)

Whether you're looking to relax with a drink, test your luck, find some top notch quality courtesans or win exclusive prizes, Supreme Nightclub sets the standard for elegance and entertainment in Eorzea.

Get ready to indulge in our renowned signature drinks while immersing yourself in the finest music from some of Eorzea's greatest bards. As you step inside you will be greeted by the beautifully redesigned bar and lounge that await you on the ground floor. It's the perfect place to unwind, mingle, and indulge in the finest beverages we have to offer.Our charming VIP area is a haven of comfort with plush sofa seating and the best view in the house to our expanded stage that is eagerly awaiting the arrival of your beloved bard bands from far and wide, ready to entertain you with their melodious talents from across the realms.

Things can get a bit chaotic sometimes, but we work very hard to be open and welcoming to all walks of life and RP experience levels. We would love to see you grow with us!

Hidden in the hills deep in the glades of Gridania, with trees whispering secrets as you venture. While the moogles dance and trick, our doors provide a safe retreat. Private booths, adorned with plush velvet, invite intimate conversations, and the bar serving exotic cocktails, creating an ultimate atmosphere of allure and opulence. This is the Boulder Bay, A tavern and bathhouse within the Emerald Grove.

description: Located at Empyreum's Ingleside tower, we are an SFW establishment on Jenova offering our patrons both immersive and casual RP. Tucked away inside this cozy nook, you'll find good food and drink, good conversation, and a friendly, relaxed atmosphere. In addition to our tavern services, we also offer an open stage and an in-house portrait artist (when advertised). Thanks for giving us a look, and we hope to see you soon!

description: In the cold, dreary province of Ishgard lies a quaint hideaway - the Whispering Ember Lounge.

Step through its unassuming entrance and find yourself transported to a haven of warmth and tranquility. The air is filled with the enticing aroma of freshly brewed coffee, delicate pastries, and the comforting scent of well-worn books. The carefully curated ambiance exudes a cozy charm, making it the perfect refuge from the icy winds outside.

description: Embark on extensive journeys through Eorzea, where captivating locations, rich history, and fascinating fauna and flora await. Wether you prefer to enjoy a relaxing ride in the Chocobo Carriage or would rather mount up with your friends, there's plenty to explore and discover!
Let me show you the beauty and wonders of the world as while we travel. I would be delighted to have you as my companion on this adventure ^^

name: Steamworks Brewery & Barhouse
description: 21+ HEAVY-RP VENUE

Steamworks Brewery and Barhouse strives to be your home for bards, brews and scenic views! Our brewery is nestled on the shores of Shirogane, where the warm breeze off the Ruby Sea meets frosty cold tankards full of our signature handcrafted beers - the perfect place to unwind after a long day of adventure or gather with friends to enjoy the evening.

Our full-service bar offers six specialty beers, such as our Bottoms Up Pale Ale, in addition to a wide selection of drinks and top-notch bar food. We're also proud to showcase the finest solo bards, bands, and entertainers from across the realm on our Steamworks Stage.

At Steamworks, you're more than a guest ‚Äî you're part of the story. We invite you and your friends to bring your OCs in, pull up a barstool, kick back with a cold one, tell a few stories, enjoy the music, and relax with us.

Serving as a modern take on a traditional Far-Eastern  themed Teahouse & Bath-house, it comes complete with an Onsen, and a dedicated floor with a small bar and a stage for photos, if that's what you preferred 🤍
KITSU is designed to act as a social hub and bring people together, through rest and relaxation,
So come on in and relax where you want, nothing is off limits !  be it in the uniquely modelled Teahouse or in the Bath House below, Maybe you just want to take pictures upstairs ?
KITSU has been designed to offer a place of respite for anyone who may stumble upon it, whether its a catch up with friends or some wind down time.

Ontop of that it makes the ideal place for photoshoots, by yourself or with a group of friends. Even if its just two of you 💙

Noches tem√°ticas de cada pais latinoamericano cada vez que abrimos y divertidos juegos siempre!!

Latin club where the main action where you can RP in Spanish! We are located in Mist (Dynamis-Maduin-W5-P30). We strive to offer funtastic lewdity for our 18+ patrons and are a very open RP venue. We offer services not limited to: GPose Contests, DR Tournaments, and amazing services to help people lounge about and have a good time while doing it. Our venue has a full bar, dancefloor, gamba, entertainers and even tarot readings! We have are a no judgement/zero drama venue!

name: The Crypt (EU)
description: The Crypt is a new venue helmed by the Goddesses of Goth, Glam and Grunge, aimed at metalheads, RPers and anyone looking for something different.

Located in a derelict chapel dedicated to Azeyma and desecrated by dark forces, the Crypt welcomes you in a unique decor for a rythm-fueled ritualistic night of fun! With heavy riffs and a heavier focus on roleplaying, we offer unique activities centered around the Twelve to protect the venue from an invasion of voidsent.

name: Null and Void
description: You‚Äôve heard whispers about this place. You‚Äôve might have seen notes swap hands on the busy streets of Uldah, found a cryptic message on a shipping manifest in Limsa, or a carved symbol on a less traveled grove in Gridania. Standing outside of it now, you are greeted with the same symbol that has haunted your travels leading you here to this place.

It appears so mundane, so normal ‚Äì that for a moment you truly wonder if the fuss you‚Äôve made to get to this point is all in your head. Perhaps, it has all been errant dreams and this journey has been a misguided fool‚Äôs errand. Still, you‚Äôve come this far and while it isn‚Äôt too late to turn back the draw of the unknown outweighs your better judgement, and you turn the handle.

(Null and Void is a neutral ground for supernatural creatures to interact with adventurers like yourself. With an emphasis on story and roleplay, N&V is an immersive venue that explores a variety of themes. Our hosts have the primary focus of providing quality, interactive roleplay to further develop your character‚Äôs story as well as their own. You will find a variety of different creature types among our hosts, and nothing is quite like what it seems.)

name: A Realm Rebrewed Coffee
description: Caffeinating the realm one Eorzean at a time. 🍵

name: Femboy Hooters
description: Femboy Hooters a fun restaurant venue experience where you can be served food and drink by some of the cutest femboys you can find in Eorzea!

name: Honey Bee Inn
description: Life can be harsh but we can make it oh so sweet!

One of NA's largest immersive roleplay venues, we offer RP in all it's forms, whether it's casual conversations or something more intimate, along with special events every month! With over 100 staff members, there is always something for everyone. Not only that, but our prices are some of the lowest anywhere and we cater to players of all skill levels, not just the veterans.

Our staff are made up of seasoned roleplayers and newcomers alike, all of whom are happy to interact with anyone, regardless of your gender, race or sexuality. At HBI, it's not about the bookings but enjoying a night of fun filled roleplay! We feature one of the best VIP programs which includes having a room at the Inn decorated to your specific tastes as well as a drink that you design added to our menu!
Whether you want to write the night away with one of our talented staff or just want to people watch as the yellow and black dances around you, HBI is the place to be!

name: Senpan Tea House
description: Senpan Tea House is a tranquil tea house tucked away in a quiet corner of Lavender Beds, allowing warriors and wanderers alike to relax as much as they want, for however long they want, either with their companions or by themselves.
We believe that everyone deserves to have peace, quiet, and a good cup of tea, and so our philosophy is to never bother our guests during their most needed and well-deserved downtime.

name: Classy's (Closed)
description: Classy‚Äôs is the main Venue of Lala‚Äôs Fortune S.S.L. Shady mafia vibes, cocktails, liquors and wines all of them served by gentlemen for ladies and gentlemen with elegance and class. Elevate your night to the next level mixing our amazing beverages with a new and refreshing gambling experience with our dealers.
We provide bar services and gamba services.
Ask our bantenders about the history of the cocktail you are drinking if you are curious enough.

name: Honour's Rest Tavern
description: A refuge away from the cold, blistering winds of Coerthas. Nestled within the great city of Ishgard, Honour's Rest serves as the home away from home for the weary traveler.

Be you a long-standing warrior, a humble adventurer, or a simple passerby, you are always welcome to rest your weary blade, and enjoy good drink, good food, and good company, at Honour's Rest, where honour never rests.
Open every second and fourth Friday of the month! 9pm-12am EST!

name: Lunarium
description: Alternative nightclub & cocktail bar nestled in the heart of the Lavender Beds

name: Stargazers' Lounge
description: The Stargazers' Lounge is a place to chill, have some chats, or just afk while you're doing work or other activities. Feel free to gpose, or bard if you'd like. Come and go as you please~~

name: Pastry Lounge
description: Pastry Lounge has a cozy caf√© and a classy bar upstairs. The stage is open for anyone who loves to play music! Feel free to sit anywhere and enjoy the beauty of nature. We have a wonderful selection of homemade desserts and drinks for our patrons.

name: Club Desolyte

name: The ComPlex
description: Welcome to The ComPlex

In the streets of the lavender beds, hidden between the houses, lies a jewel of the underground scene: The Complex. This club, a masterpiece of steel, glass and light, combines the dark charm of cyberpunk with the raw energy of metal. Upon entering the club, visitors are immersed in another world - one that is both futuristic and nostalgic.

The interior of The Complex is a visual explosion of glowing neon colors, holographic projections and smoky shadows.  Laser lights dance through the room while heavy metal riffs permeate the air and harmonize with the driving beats of synthwave.

In one corner of the club is the imposing bar, where the bartender serves futuristic cocktails. A wide variety of characters gather here - from modified cyborgs and mysterious netrunners to classic metalheads. Together, they immerse themselves in a world of sound and lights, leave everyday life behind and lose themselves in the pulsating energy of the night.

The Complex is not just a club, but an experience. A place where the boundaries between past and future blur, where music and technology merge and create a unique atmosphere that keeps visitors coming back for more. Here, the spirit of cyberpunk comes alive, while the sound of metal and synthwave, as well as EDM music, conquers the hearts and souls of night owls.

name: Electric Six

E6 is an RP bar with a focus on m/m, but all are welcome to come hang out!

There's free sweets and drinks to sate your appetite, and we often change decor and menu to match both the season and in-game holidays. Feel free to join our Community and Visit us at the Mist!~

SPROUT FAE'S FIRST EVER BATH HOUSE IS NOW OPEN FOR BUSINESS!!! description: In the opulent shadows of Ul'dah, The Femme Fatale stands tall.  Within the velvet-clad confines of the  dimly-lit venue, patrions are clad in bespoke suits and adorned with polished accessories. Fighters face off our grand stage, their movements a deadly ballet of precision and grace. Each fight is watched by the audience, whispers and gil passing hands.

name: Polar Eclipse
description: Polar Eclipse is a breathtaking ice-themed nightclub that offers an unforgettable arctic experience. As you approach the entrance, you're greeted by towering ice sculptures, their blue and white hues glowing under soft, ethereal lights. The door is made from frosted glass with etched patterns resembling snowflakes, giving a magical, otherworldly feel.

Upon entering, the temperature is cool but comfortable, with misty vapors swirling in the air, creating a frosty atmosphere. The walls and ceilings are crafted to look like sleek ice caves, with jagged icicles hanging down, glistening in different shades of blue and silver. LED lights embedded within the ice pulse with the beat of the music, giving the entire space a dynamic, living quality.

The bar is the crown jewel, carved entirely from translucent ice blocks that catch and refract light in mesmerizing patterns. Drinks are served in ice-cube glasses, and the cocktail menu features arctic-inspired creations like the ‚ÄúAurora Borealis,‚Äù a shimmering, colorful drink, and ‚ÄúFrostbite,‚Äù a cocktail that smokes with dry ice.

The dance floor is a massive ice sheet that‚Äôs perfectly smooth but not slippery, designed to replicate the look of a frozen lake. LED panels beneath the surface flash and ripple like the northern lights, casting vibrant colors across the dancers. Above, a chandelier made of hundreds of hand-blown glass icicles dangles over the crowd, refracting light like crystals.

VIP sections are set in cozy ice alcoves, each with fur-lined seating and soft, heated cushions to keep guests warm. These private areas are surrounded by ice partitions, offering both privacy and a stunning view of the main club.

The DJ booth, designed to look like an ice throne, is raised on a platform with towering speakers. The music is a blend of energetic electronic beats, deep house, and remixes that mirror the icy, futuristic vibe of the club. Occasionally, fog machines pump out chilly mists that blend with the lights, enhancing the surreal, frosty environment.
Throughout the night, performances by ice dancers and LED light shows create an immersive, sensory experience, making Polar Eclipse a wonderland of cold beauty, music, and art.

Welcome in your new home, where we are one big family. One looks after the other and we all have the same goal: Make the family the strongest in all Eorzea. For that we offer drinks, gamba, women, men, anything in between as much as the best music and of course, protection. Come, and enter a world you dont want to leave on your own again. Be one of us.

name: Club Kolat
description: If venues had a soundtrack, Kolat's would be a mix of music‚Äôs past, present, and future with cuts of different genre's all blending in perfect harmony. Explore the Kolat Nightlife, see a Kolat Show, and dive into Kolat‚Äôs diverse entertainment offerings. With music and entertainment around every corner, friends and family can enjoy the sounds that make this club your nighttime destination.

What‚Äôs your pleasure? At Kolat, you will find an intoxicating variety games and denominations, friendly dealers and a stylishly exotic ‚Äì yet always comfortable ‚Äì atmosphere that will enhance every experience. Fast, hostess service makes it easier to concentrate on your next move. New to gambling? There‚Äôs no reason to be intimidated by the action‚Ä¶ our gambits are happy to show you how each game works and soon, you‚Äôll be playing like a pro.

Kolat gives way to many quality entertainers in a relaxing and exotic atmosphere that you could almost call home. The Aether LB locale packs the house with the steamiest entertainers in the land. Since it‚Äôs establishment in 2018, The Burgundy Room strives to push the limits of what is possible in the art form of complex in-game performances with synchronized audio. Our troupe members LOVE what they do, and spend hours upon hours honing their craft!
We open on the last Saturday of each month at 7:30pm Eastern.

In the heart of this electric underworld, we invite you to step into the shadows and embrace the eternal allure of the night. Our DJs, masters of the dark arts, will entrance you with their hypnotic beats, from heart-pounding EDM to the raw power of hardcore, metal, and drum & bass. Here, the music isn‚Äôt just heard‚Äîit‚Äôs felt in every beat of your soul.

The Lost thrive when the moon is high, and here, time becomes a distant memory. The dance floor is your sanctuary, where flashing lights cast seductive shadows, and the energy of the crowd pulls you deeper into the night. Whether you're seeking to get lost in the crowd, seduced by the pounding bass, or drawn to the allure of mystery, Lost Boys is more than just a club‚Äîit's a sanctuary for creatures of the night.

The bar flows with potions to fuel your thirst for adventure, and the atmosphere hums with the danger and excitement of something forbidden. You don‚Äôt just visit Lost‚Äîyou become one of us. Once you cross the threshold, the night is yours to command. Dance, drink, and live like there's no dawn in sight....

serendipity is eorzea's hottest new venue based off of the world of FFXIII. our choco-dancers will provide endless entertainment while our bar is full stocked with the finest liquors from cocoon and yusnann. our vip lounge is provided with luxury, free bottle service and a private choco-dancer to see to your needs. looking to test your luck? the gamba table and 50/50 split raffle are waiting for you! our carefully picked djs are ready to keep the night alive with their incredible talent.

name: Kegs 'N Cogs
description: "There's a rumor to say that there's a dive bar that's cropped up near The Path of Knowing outside of Illyshire. Now, I'm not a big fan of rumors but there has to be something out there...right?" There truly is, and it's name is Kegs 'N Cogs and it's run by the leader of the Alexander Preservation and History committee, Odsar Tuva. Originally meant to be a hideaway cabin where she could study, now became a full bar overnight. Why? No reason, but it's certified by Illdyshire and everything?

Kegs 'n Cogs is a Lore influenced venue with an RP focus! This means that we see the lore, build on the lore, exist in the lore but we don't force you to play by the lore rules! Consider it like this. You don't have to be all caught up and in character to hang in here. As long as your Gil/Allagan coin is legit or not, we're not the cops or have something to barter with, we can work with you! Of course the barter would have to be at least the same price. Every glance, every whisper, every touch tonight is designed to pull you deeper into a world of seduction‚Äîwhere the rules are simple: surrender to your desires and lose yourself in pleasure. The night is young, and so are your temptations. At LPM, we give you the freedom to explore, to indulge, and to let go of everything that holds you back.

Cocktails flow freely, bodies sway to hypnotic rhythms, and fleeting glances ignite sparks in an electrifying atmosphere. Games of chance and seduction intertwine, creating a space where passion and impulse collide in a whirlwind of sensations. name: Harvestbell Lesbian Lounge
description: Harvestbell Lesbian Lounge is a sex-positive, NSFW lesbian bar and bathhouse for immersive and erotic RP.

This establishment is for feminine characters to engage with other feminine characters. If you would like to have a masculine character be present to socialize but not participate, this is allowed - but be prepared for any sexual advances to be ignored or criticized. Please note that this does not apply to players, all IRL identities are welcome here. We expect and demand that writers clearly differentiate between IC and OOC, and respect the line drawn in the sand between fantasy and reality.

All characters and players must be, and appear to be, adults. This means no underage players, no underage characters, and no characters that appear to be underage - in other words, no Lalafells or other models shrunk to similar proportions.

This establishment is meant to celebrate sex. As such, we encourage all sexual activity that takes place within the estate in-game be written in public chat channels (/say and /em). Please note that the immediate exterior of the estate is not an acceptable place to write publicly-visible sex.
mareCode: Join the Discord server to find out

So welcome in to have local hingan food or perhaps some western food that reminds a lot of the grand sea. Same is with the fine drinks and let our bartenders awe you both with selection of hingan spirits and awestriking western drinks.

name: Toxic Casino
description: Toxic Casino is the Prime Gamba spot for high rollers! a night of fun and giveaways to our most amazing guest!

description: O7Nights Bar & Dance is a roleplay club, with a bar setting within the MMORPG Final Fantasy XIV. It is owned by player Juzo Mohjahro of the Aether Datacenter and Midgardsormr Server. It stands as one of the many venues which players can socialize and find a nightlife without leaving home. This venue prioritizes on spreading a contagiously positive atmosphere, 'Being o7,' by accepting and educating new but brave role-players, while indulging veterans with authentic and thoughtful interactions. While upfront providing a relaxed bar setting, this venue has many moments that escalate the energy, between octet bard performances by Raevyn Koneko, regular appearances from wildly outgoing bar regulars and Juzo making drinks just right from his Specialty Menu. On nights where players both want to rest their feet, or get them moving, Juzo and his patrons are there, Making Midgardsormr a little More o7.

description: Tired of a long day of adventuring? Looking to sit back, relax, and enjoy some great food and better company? Come visit the Oaken Tavern, a sfw venue and open social space to make new friends and find like minded Warriors of Light to play with. Open and welcoming to players of all backgrounds, we ask that you try to extend that same courtesy to our other guests.

We're glad to have you, our tavern boasts a fully stocked bar, an open Stage for performing bards, and a cozy interior to help melt the weariness away. For More information, please visit our discord server and check out our website!

name: Roxbury
description: Built within the depths of Eorzea's desert jewel, amidst the neon glow and concealed beyond the mist...  a breathtaking nightlife of future-tech awaits. Roxbury pulsates‚Äî an intoxicating energy connects you to the dance-floor; the towering nightclub sculpted with cutting-edge decor redefining our empowerment through music. Your eyes travel ever upward to dizzying heights where beyond the grasp of the Syndicate's hand, an elevated lounge illuminates the favored few, your senses bask in the audio-visual symphony moving freely through the atmosphere. With heightened senses, the melodic soundtrack guides you towards an opulent marbled bar, offering carefully curated cocktails infused with key flavors to tantalize your taste buds. Indulge in the captivating allure of the youthful dancers encircling you, adorned in vibrant attire that effortlessly catches the eye. Their enchanting gazes draw you closer, immersing you in the irresistible pleasures up for offer. Within this captivating domain, time becomes endless, beckoning your surrender to all-encompassing bliss and the mesmerizing stimulation that awaits.

Our grunge-inspired club is a sanctuary for nocturnal souls, We're a club created by friends, for friends, dedicated to providing a safe and thrilling haven for all creatures of the night. Whether you're here to dance, play, or just enjoy the vibes.

Our club is for everyone‚Äîno matter who you are or where you're from. With electrifying music, pulse-pounding dance floors, and a lineup of exciting activities, there's never a dull moment in the shadows.
So step into the dark, embrace the fun, and let your inner night creature roam free. In Shadowfell, the only rule is to be yourself. Welcome to the family

- LGBTQ+ Friendly

- AFK Friendly

‚ùÄ As you enter our realm, you‚Äôll be immersed in the glowing radiance of bioluminescent tanks, gently cradling the delicate cherry blossoms we‚Äôre dedicated to preserving. Here, we‚Äôre not only devoted to protecting nature‚Äôs beauty‚Äîwe‚Äôre also fueled by the heavy beats of relentless hard techno raves that ignite the very soul of our nightclub.

name: Freedom Star club
description: We are Crimson-42 a Venue which provides outstanding entertainment has to officer We do from popular DJ's to Bards and more coming soon and I hope yo enjoy Night we best of best keep you all happy.

name: Life's a Beach Lounge
description: Re-opening soon. 🎉

name: Silver Lining Cafe
description: "We'd like to invite you to our small corner of Eorzea, the Silver Lining Cafe! Our friendly staff has a listening ear for if you'd like to talk about your recent adventures, or life in general, and a variety of food and beverage options if you're looking for a bite to eat! Let your true self shine as you swim through a night of electrifying beats and endless fun. So, take the plunge, let loose, and dance until your fins can't take it anymore‚Äîbecause tonight, the sea is yours to explore!

An electric energy pulsates through the dance floor and shadows intertwine with sultry silhouettes that beckons patrons to lose themselves in the rhythm of the night. The bar, a sanctuary of indulgence, serves exotic cocktails that tantalize the senses and promise an escape into a world of pleasure. As the night unfolds, the thrill of chance beckons from the gaming tables, where fortunes can shift with a mere flick of the wrist. The allure of the unknown is palpable, as tarot cards whisper secrets of desire, and neon lights flicker like sirens, drawing in the curious and the bold. Here, in this sanctuary of hedonism, every moment is steeped in a rich tapestry of desire and intrigue, where the line between reality and fantasy blurs into a mesmerizing dance of life, making every moment feel alive with possibility.

description: Welcome to the Black Dahlia one and all!

Come and enjoy the sights and sounds of Faerie‚Äôs premiere dark garden. We are an upscale gothic style club offering a mix of traditional gothic ambiance and modern atmosphere catered to delight gothic hearts and upbeat club hoppers alike.
We offer a wide array of amenities and services to ensure that a night spent with us is one that you‚Äôll not likely forget.

Dan's BBQ Shop aims to provide a more low-key atmosphere and southern home cooking to patrons, featuring dishes heavily inspired by dives and diners in the Memphis area, and we hope you'll enjoy the chance to try something out of the ordinary.

It's a "House of Harder Styles", dedicated to the genres of Techno that fall under the Harder Styles definition and a bit left and right. The idea behind BASSLINE originated during the BADASSS Techno and TECHNO THURSDAY at the HELLFIRE CLUB, were we enjoyed these styles while partying through the night with our awesome clubbers and staff. We had so much fun that we decided to create a separate venue dedicated to this kind of parties with the looks and feel of a Warehouse / Boiler Room event.
BASSLINE is a venue for mature audiences [18+]. We are LGBTQ+ and NSFW friendly, welcome both RP and OOC orientated guests and usually offer an open Bar and Gamba.

With live performances that mesmerize from the hottest DJ's around and dancers that will be sure to catch your eye, there is something for everyone around.
Nocturna is where moments become memories in the heartbeat of the night.

Ribbit!

Our venue features an original Chocobo racing game, an open bar, slots, a Roulette Wheel, and a stage for anyone to use! Roleplayers of all skill levels are encouraged to join us. No gil? No problem! RACE TO THE FINISH LINE- IF YOU'RE NOT FIRST YOU'RE LAST!

Here you'll find wait staff ready to take your drink order, bartenders eager to thrill you with their mixology skills, and music to tickle your eardrums. We will play host to DJs, helping to boost those who are just starting out or haven't made their name yet, giving them a place to showcase their talent. If you want to get away from life for a while, reconnect with old friends, or make some new ones, this is the place to be. LGBTQ inclusive and lala friendly! Open every Monday and every 4th Saturday.

name: The Hideaway Cafe
description: So you've finally made it! Grab a drink! The show starts soon. Welcome to the Hideaway Cafe! A Corner venue meant for all venue workers to come, relax, and kick their feet up. Dueling piano Bards try to outwit each other each night, and drinks served in our Speakeasy set up are cold, and very fairly priced. So fill your cups and empty your heavy coffers after a long day's work, here at The Hideaway! Enjoy your escape.

name: Stiletto
description: You find yourself stumbling down a dark back alley late at night. Your drunken eyes guided various neon signs littered across the walls.
A moody looking Au'ra scowls at you as you try keep your composure. "Lookin' for a good time, lad?"  he says with a wry smile, gesturing to a set of stairs. You nod, not knowing what to expect.
You make your way down to a bright red door and hesitate for a second, before opening it and stepping into darker pleasures.
Stiletto is a red light district themed dive bar found in the dark back alleys of Empyreum. Come see what darker pleasures await you Underground.

name: Delightful Edibles & Libations
description: Welcome to the DEL Teahouse nestled in the very snowy parts of Empyreum. We offer cozy teas & snacks for the weary traveller and plan to host events in the near future. We have a stage so performers are welcome to contact us!

name: Glitch Leather Night Club
description: We're a premier Leather Night Club that focuses on BDSM Education and Exploration. Discussion Nights are Tuesdays 10 pm - 2 am CST and Demo Nights are Saturdays 2 am - 6 am CST.
Sometimes we open late night for people to use the dungeon after hitting the clubs, but our doors & facilities are always open to private members.
Home of DEGEN - Eorzea's Adult Magazine.

name: The Mikoshi's Rest
description: The Mikoshi's Rest is an Eastern Themed Roleplay Venue and brothel and parlour located on the Northern Shores of Shirogane. Decadence, drinks and desire come together here, so we invite you in to experience Mateus' premiere Eastern venue.
Come see how deities rest - you might find you want to stay forever.
marePassword: [The Password on this syncshell rotates for security, please visit our discord for the updated password]

name: Morpho Forest: Cafe and Bathhouse
description: Looking for a nice relaxing soak or a bite to eat? Come to Morpho Forest and enjoy our dreamy atmosphere!

name: The Cask and Keg
description: The Cask and Keg is a quaint speakeasy styled venue tucked underneath a clothing store.

name: Paw-Ya | Teahouse
description: Welcome to our teahouse, where the warmth of home meets the buzz of nightlife! Run by two lively miqo'te sisters, this cozy haven invites you to unwind and savor a taste of the east. With twinkling lights and an inviting ambiance, every corner exudes charm, making it the perfect spot to gather with friends or enjoy a quiet evening.

name: The Heavenly Hearth
description: Welcome to The Heavenly Hearth Tavern, a quaint and exclusive Eorzean-style establishment situated in the port city of Kugane.
Enjoy the variety of flavors of our signature dishes and drinks. Have a taste of our Fireside Curry, and our specialty mixed drinks, all at affordable prices!
Rest and relax by the hearthside's warmth, and enjoy the ambience with the company of your fellow adventurers. Our doors are open to all, and we look forward to your visit!
[ NOTE! ] For narrative reasons, we are temporarily operating within an airship-themed dive bar called "The Harrowing Harbor".

name: Cult
description: Cult is more than just an LGBTQ+ nightclub‚Äîit's a destination where alternative rock reigns supreme. Here, the music isn‚Äôt just background noise; it‚Äôs the heartbeat of the night, driving every moment with an intensity that resonates deeply with our diverse crowd. Cult is a space where authenticity is celebrated, and everyone is encouraged to embrace their true selves without reservation.

name: Viktoria's Secret

name: Our Sanctuary

Fun, relaxation, luxury, and great vibes all in one place!

(All services are SFW only.) [Open on/at: First Sunday of the month @ 10pm Central | Third Friday of the month @ 10pm Central]

name: Shinku Tatsu: Gay Resort
description: Shinku Tatsu is an Eastern Themed Gay Resort. We strive to create a relaxing and RP Immersive environment suitable for a variety of adult-oriented leisure activities, with a focus on providing a space for gay, queer, and curious males to safely pursue romantic, consensual relationships with each other. While we cater to these groups, our goal is to create an inclusive environment open to all whom seek to come and enjoy a relaxing soak.

description: Serenity Cay is a tropical island themed restaurant with accompanying serene gardens, nestled in the heart of a magical island inlet. Our skilled chefs happily create exotic drinks and dishes for our visiting guests while encouraging them to take much needed vacation time!

name: Bits & Bytes

Attention, Runners! The venue is live, the net is hot, and the coffee is brewing. Bits & Bytes is open and ready to fuel your hacks and stacks with fresh coffee, tea, energy drinks, and the best snacks this side of cyberspace.
📍 **Address:** Lamia, Empyreum, Ward 20, Ingleside Wing 2, Room 13
Jack in, grab a bite, and let's run the grid! See you on the servers. 🖤💻‚òï

Omens is the perfect blend of SFW & NSFW. Eden (entry level) is kept strictly SFW for those who may not want to participate in NSFW. It offers a serene caf√© atmosphere with cuddle session services & yummy food and drink~! Chat with our hosts/hostesses or simply enjoy the peace.

description: Copied Iris Bakery and Cafe is a small Bakery founded by Naja Malkot and her wife Pandora Connatus in the heart of the Goblet. Seemingly normal to the outside, Copied Iris holds one no-so-secret close to those who come inside. Not only is it a sweet Fae inspired Bakery and Cafe upstairs, a Haukee Manor Lounge middle floor with a icy Shiva themed basement, but from Pandora herself being the fabled 2P of Copied Factory legend. While Naja is busy baking up a storm with two toddlers on each hip, Copied Iris is a flourishing venue ready to have new customers waltz in and grab a hot tea. If the weather is kind to us, you can also enjoy the outdoor seating while you wait or enjoy your treats.
‚ãÖÀö‚Çä‚Äß ‡≠®‡≠ß ‚Äß‚ÇäÀö ‚ãÖ

Copied Iris is a IC RP friendly venue that welcomes non-RP as well! Founded alongside their FC of the same name <FIKRI> they strive to stay as Mom and Pop (Or Mom and Mom) shop and strive to make a pleasant experience either in RP or AFK! Occasionally they have in-house Bard that helps out so be lucky and you might catch Operator 6O don her Eorzean looks and play us a tune! With small games and services to keep you possibly entertained, we hope to see you soon!

name: Shine
description: At SHINE, we strive to create a space where individuals feel truly seen and valued. It's a place where authenticity is celebrated, and everyone has the opportunity to shine brightly. Through our commitment to shining a light on issues and supporting those in need, we aim to be a beacon of hope and compassion in our community. We believe in the power of a simple hello to brighten someone's day and in the importance of spreading kindness wherever we go. With every interaction, we endeavor to make a positive difference in the lives of those around us, fostering a culture of empathy, inclusivity, and support.

name: BB Lounge
description: Whilst out upon your leisurely stroll, you came across a directory with quite a bit of information of bars and taverns, venues a like. One of them had a very blue-like tint to its advertisement. It had a name that seemed to be an abbreviation of something. Bars and Booze? Buns and Bass? Bun Boy? Bar-b-ques and Beer? Big Bara Lounge? The letters were not further elaborated, but something about it made you curious enough to even consider reading on...
Welcome to BB Lounge!

A predecessor of KGB, a small hole in the wall bar that was nestled in a Shirogane apartment, has expanded and rebranded into a newer location for an much more comfier stay. The owner has lovingly spent many hours and months to make the place feel like a place where you could relax and be a part of the conversation if you so desired. Still within the Shirogane housing district in Halicarnassus. Once an apartment place called home, now a bar built for comfort and leisure in mind in a medium house a few wards down. Join us for a casual evening to help lift your spirits for a brand new week!

name: Cattery Garden
description: Cafe and lounge, for all you weary travelers, come and take in the atmosphere. As you lay and rest in our beautiful garden, which we will gracefully open your heart to all the wonders, we have to offer.

name: The Stuffed Peach
description: In the Stuffed Peach, you can come it and get a cute waiter to sit on your lap and feed you the tastiest fries ever! An LGBTQ+ focused venue, you can come here enjoy the care and comfort of our staff, as personal as you need it to be.

name: The Fluffy Kitty
description: The Fluffy Kitty is a Hearts 'N Toes venue.
‚Ä¢ Open bi-weekly on Saturdays.
‚Ä¢ Live bard performances.
‚Ä¢ Live streaming DJs.

name: Eben's Toy Kingdom
description: Welcome to Eben's Toy Kingdom! Where you can come to buy all the stuffed toys you like! With our newly added Claw machine too!!

name: Studio 55
description: Studio 55 is hosted in an 18+ LGBTQIA+  venue hosted by the  BOIS FC. Bringing a full-service nightclub to the community. Bringing  Music, Games, and all-around Fun times for everyone.

name: Celestial Vixen
description: Celestial Vixen's: Where Fantasy Finds Its Freedom

Welcome to Celestial Vixen, an enchanting sanctuary nestled in the heart of Diabolos, where the art of seduction and sensory exploration intertwine seamlessly. As a premier destination for those who crave not just a night out, but an unforgettable experience, we proudly offer a luxurious bar experience with immersive role-playing (RP) and erotic role-playing (ERP) interactions with our lovely escorts in a uniquely liberating environment. What sets Celestial Vixen's apart is our distinctive approach to conversation and connection, inviting patrons to dance the night away; engage in a voyeur experience,  or perhaps join in conversations/demonstrations on a variety of topics with a tantalizing BDSM twist. Here, each interaction is an opportunity to explore desires and fantasies with like-minded individuals in an atmosphere that champions safety and consent.

Our mission is simple yet profound: to empower our guests to embrace their inner selves, providing a safe space where kinks can be explored and fantasies brought to life. At Celestial Vixen's, we believe that indulgence in one‚Äôs true self is not just a privilege, but a celebration. Join us and step into a world where your dreams can become reality.......

name: TARTARUS
description: TARTARUS is Aethers HOTTEST vampiric/goth night club and safe haven for the vampiric kind but.. if you are one of those mortals who always wanted to see the dark and wild side of our world, why not stop by?
We have a fully loaded bar with that of which you only will see upon entering our little realm. Need a hot night? Maybe a little love from our courts of the night, why not ask one?

Blood Raves, sacrifices? Yes... we have them. Care for some good music while you dance the night or your mortal life away? Leave it to our lord and DJ Redvayne and they will show you the rhythm of the night.
Beware the night or embrace it, the choice is yours.

name: Socius Voxis
description: A Place to Socialise, relax and chill, listen to dj's, attend the bars, enjoy with friends and meet new people!

name: The GATSBY
description: welcome to The GATSBY - where the future meets the jazz age and we party like every night is New Years! The swankiest venue on Saturdays we invite you to join us for our general audience atmosphere and big club experience - from the best VIP experience in Aether to our renown High Roller gamba tables we got it all and more - there really isn‚Äôt anything quite like it now is there, old sport?

name: Auntie Farehi's
description: Auntie Farehi's is an idyllic, cozy Eastern Teahouse and Bistro right dab in Shirogane! Enjoy the diverse and sublime splendors of Othardian Cuisine has to offer, and rejoice in a warm, comfortable setting enriched with great food, refreshing tea and drinks, alongside especially good company!
Openings are at Auntie's leisure, so best to tag this venue as your "Favorite Venue" and check PF whenever it's available!

name: Farmer's Attic
description: Farmer's Attic is a co-op where crafters, gatherers, and customers can meet for casual farmer's market RP and tax-free commerce on Sunday mornings. Each vendor is responsible for bringing their own merchandise and setting their prices ‚Äî all profits go back to the vendor, with no house fees taken. Low-level crafters and gatherers are welcome and are in fact encouraged to drop by and sell their wares!

While the premise of the venue is commerce, it is a community oriented space that aims to foster camaraderie between disciples of the land and hand. So bring your best farmer's market outfit and get ready to barter at Aether's own locally sourced marketplace.

name: Havoc
description: HAVOC is a Final Fantasy XIV Alternative Night Club made for everyone to enjoy and discover good music, meet new people and friends.

name: Nophica's Spring
description: Nophica's Spring Marketplace & Center for the Arts is home to six venues (and growing!), featuring something for everyone, from dining to entertainment, shopping, and more! Stop by Nophica's Spring Bistro for a drink, then head down to the Chobo Revue Theater and catch a show! Open every Wednesday!

Open the 1st and 3rd Thursday of the month from 9-12pm CST, Repose is a casual RP Nightclub fully staffed with Bartenders, Dancers, DJs Hosts, Gamba, and more!

name: Twilight Tavern & Theatre
description: A place where bards and fans can get together to enjoy a night of fun and togetherness to celebrate a very special group of people in the FF14 community the amazing Bards!

name: Synergy Bar & Lounge
description: Step into a world of relaxation and connection where good vibes flow like smoke rings. Synergy Bar & Lounge is your ultimate hookah destination‚Äîa space to unwind, meet great people, and soak in the chill atmosphere. Whether you‚Äôre here to explore new flavors, vibe with the music, or just hang out, this is the place to kick back and enjoy. Let‚Äôs keep the energy high and the vibes immaculate.

name: The Apothecafe
description: The Apothecafe is, at first glance, what it says right on the tin: an apothecary fused with a cafe. There's plenty of bright, cozy spots to curl up in and enjoy our offerings, but as with every light, it has its shadows. Given the nature of its owner, the cafe also serves as a safe space/neutral ground for otherworldly creatures and/or lawbreakers to conduct their business (as long as they behave, of course).

We're a roleplay venue welcoming RPers of all experience levels and styles (though we do tend to lean towards the heavier side of things) and our doors are open for RPing even when we're not staffed. So come drop by, pull up a chair, and wile away the hours with a bubbly potion, a warm meal, or perhaps even something more.

name: The Pocket Tea House
description: Welcome one and all to the Pocket Tea House! Come and try one of our specialty Garlean spiced teas: fruit, black, or green. Staying a while? Enjoy some cake from our bakery and a relaxing read in the library. We're open daily from noon to 7pm (non-staffed venue - free to use anytime).

description: A  chill club & lounge with a live bard. We strive to be a friendly hang out venue and RP lounge. Welcoming all forums and levels of Rp, from beginners to seasoned veterans. With our venue and server, we hope you can find comfort and friends weather it be with other guests or our wonderful staff.

name: Haunted House Escape
description: A time limited escape adventure in the haunted house! Some secret virus experiments were executed in the basement of a sugarcoated cafe. You will have to collect clues to help you out while dealing with hidden events, unknown enemies, and jumping puzzles. The situation was getting out of control and we need you to get the anti-virus reagent out there before it's too late! Total 5 areas to explore, time is ticking, will you be the survivor or become part of "them"...?
>>Booking a spot in advance is highly recommended. Otherwise, you might have to try your luck to see if the night is full. (Reservations are for free, please contact us in discord)
