name: Journey's End
description: At Journey's End, we are dedicated to providing a sanctuary where adventurers and wanderers from all walks of life can find solace, rejuvenation, and camaraderie. Our cozy tavern, owned and run by seasoned travelers, offers a warm and welcoming atmosphere for those in need of rest, healing, and a sense of community. More than just a place to pause, Journey's End is a hub where travelers can equip themselves for future quests, share tales of their exploits, and build the bonds that make every journey worthwhile. We believe that even the greatest heroes cannot face every challenge alone. Here, you will find the support, resources, and companionship to help you continue your path or simply recover from the weariness of the road. Welcome to Journey's End‚Äîyour home away from home.

name: Jigoku
description: 18+ open NSFW, immersive rp venue
Jigoku, the realm of the dead, the deepest level of the afterlife of where those that are unworthy of rebirth reside. Step through the gates of Hell to mingle with lust and flirt with danger.

Fancy testing your luck? Our gaming tables await you! Every corner of our lounge is designed to immerse you in a world of relaxation, fun, and boundless enjoyment. Come, let your worries drift away on azure waves, and find out what makes us the perfect place for adventure, connection, and unforgettable nights.

Our wait staff and bartenders will be glad to serve you drinks or food if you so desire! So come down and join us on Crystal - Coeurl in The Lavender Beds, Ward 25, Plot 16.

description: We are an LGBTQIA+, heavy RP venue with an ocean floor vibe and a strong immersive focus. Our experienced roleplaying staff offer both SFW and NSFW services, but the open-RP lounge floor is always SFW, so anyone can come in and feel comfortable.

description: Introducing "Blink" - your ultimate FFXIV nightlife destination. We're thrilled to welcome K-pop role-players and enthusiasts to our cozy space, where inclusivity and camaraderie thrive. Enjoy Twitch DJ sessions and SyncShell while connecting, creating, and celebrating with us. Join our exciting journey!

Gleaners, Scholars, Students and Adventurers from all over gather at House Almateria's library to both enjoy the relaxing atmosphere of the study halls and cafe nestled within its walls.

description: Whether you're looking for a calm bar to chill at or a place to lounge and listen to music, Reverie's the spot to be. We pride ourselves on a chill atmosphere and excellent service. Every Wednesday we have a host of bards playing their best, most soothing sounds, a lovely lounge area, and a fantastic bar with staff ready to serve you the entire time you're there. And after hours, there's time for a soak in our hot tubs down below!
We also offer VIP rooms if you wanna get away from the crowd. If a particular staff member catches your eye, you can rent them out for some private, SFW conversation in our VIP rooms.

description: # Welcome to Little Fox!
`Every second Wednesday & Friday at 7:00 PM ST`
`Light-Raiden-Goblet-W5-P38`

Let yourself fall into a relaxed space in our little foxden! With music fitting to the evening of our Dj¬¥s. Chat with friends or new connections! Get yourself some snacks and drinks or perhabs a companion of our staff? Or even let yourself go and just enjoy the quiet and relaxing atmosphere! We also host a variety of themed events every other opening so don¬¥t hesitate to join us and explore. Occasionaly there will be even a Gamba open!
`Music of different tastes`

Come in and let yourself be swept away by some relaxing tunes? Some country? or even when fitting a lil harder music! We try our best to make the evening unforgettable and most relaxing as possible! If you have suggestions for songs or even hole themes don¬¥t hesitate to post them in 🎶music-ideas
`Relaxing experience`

This establishment offers you the opportunity to relax and dance, to enjoy role playing and to make new friends, or simply to have fun on a night out and give free rein to your desire to dance and have a good time!
`Events`

Check in littlefox-announents for any upcomming openings or even events that will happen! Be it fun little games or even a themed night every other opening! Show us your creative glamour be it vanilla or Modded and get a free drink!
`Mare infos`
Our infos about our syncshell lies in 🦊fox-magic

name: The Sleepy Karakul
description: Sleepy Karakul is an cozy inn dedicated to house early birds and night owls alike. Guests can relax in our baths upstairs, game or chat at our lobby or get meals and drinks at the tavern downstairs, all while listening to bards playing at the stage. Rooms are available for tired adventurers and venue "hoppers", each with different themes and the privacy they need. Come and make yourself at home! ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: The Rabbit Hole
description: Welcome to the Rabbit Hole, a modern basement venue with live DJs, gamba, games and more!

name: Sodalicious
description: The Soda and Dessert lounge with some bard music. SFW atmosphere with a pop of imagination in roleplay. So come join us by embracing the fizz of the cold drink in your hand. Join us and see what we mean!

name: The Thrall's Rest
description: The Thrall's Rest is a MATURE Roleplay Tavern! It's owned by a notorious gang of Limsan pirates known as Llymlaen's Thralls, because they spend more time in the water than off of it. The Tavern is really only a front, where people will put on nice appearances while they trade sensitive information, stolen goods, illegal contraband, and the like- but, despite it not being the MAIN operation of the establishment, they do still sell drinks and provide service as any tavern would- wouldn't do much good if they weren't sellin' drinks when the Maelstrom passed by now would it? So treat it as if you'd treat any other tavern! Sit down, drink and relax as you try to ignore the people next to you discussin' how much they think yer necklace would be worth!~ Or get black out drunk and start a bar fight- It's not like anyone cares enough to stop ya. Please remember that while this tavern IS shady, some people are simply here to socialize and drink- they have a bad taste in establishment if they are, but when seeking RP establish ahead of time what your RP companion is comfortable with! All types of RP is welcomed and encouraged here, from enjoying a quiet drink in the corner as you watch the chaos, to aforementioned fights, to shady deals, to getting absolutely fucking wasted and lookin' for a cutie to pick up n' take home-!

name: The Boiled Egg
description: Get ready to crack into a shell of delight at The Boiled Egg! We're over-easy with eggcitement to welcome you to a scramble of culinary delights. Come enjoy a boiled egg made by Eorzea's premier egg chef, or even take a crack at it yourself! Don't be a rotten egg - come join the fun!

name: Bad Habits
description: Come one, come all to my circus! Buckle up it's going to be a bumpy ride...

name: Wreck House
description: Wreck House is a gritty, abandoned warehouse turned underground nightclub, tucked away in the Mist. Its worn-out walls and flickering lights set the stage for an intense, high-stakes atmosphere where danger and excitement lurk around every corner. The remnants of its former life as a warehouse are still visible‚Äîrusted machinery, cracked concrete floors, and graffiti-covered walls all add to the raw, edgy vibe of this notorious hideout. Inside, the beats are heavy, the crowd is wild, and the only rule is to let go.

name: Minus One
description: Minus One is a ice cold club for a chill time or an icy blast of a night , Bring your best dance moves to keep warm alongside our stone cold DJ's for a night of thrills and chills.

name: The Maplewood Diner
description: A newly opened venue with a classic breakfast theme.

name: RMX RAINBOW
description: Based on the popular track from Mario Kart this rainbow road is sure to please your every need! 🌈 fun, light and random come party in your favorite glams.

name: The Jeweled Cypress
description: The Jeweled Cypress is a Hingan and Doman eatery-and-tavern hosted in the Mist of La Noscea on the Mateus server of FFXIV, comprised of signature drinks and hand-crafted entrees. Open every other Sunday evening from 7pm to 10pm EST.

name: The Dark Garden
description: An abandoned library hidden away in a forgotten corner of Eorzea, where your own story can be made. A haven for those who are looking to forget their troubles for the night, or maybe share a drink within the abyss.

name: The Whisperwind Archives
description: A cozy library with shelves of tomes open to researchers, book-lovers, information-seekers and those with secrets to share over a warm drink and sweet treat at the cafe.

name: HellGate Night Club
description: Are you ready to unleash your inner devil?
Join us for the grand opening of HellGate, the hottest new nightclub!
We have everything you need to have a wicked good time: a spacious dance floor, a cozy VIP area, a fully stocked bar, and a devilish theme that will make you feel like you're in the underworld.
But that's not all! We also have three amazing DJs who will spin the best tunes for you all night long!

name: The Forum Shopping Center
description: The Forum Shopping Center is the ONLY full RP shopping mall in Eorzea! We have a wide variety of options available for your shopping, dining or entertainment experience!

name: The Comfy Corner
description: A comfy lounge with a relaxing ambience, stargazing balcony, good food, and better conversation.

name: The Red Room
description: The Red Room is a cozy tavern owned and hosted by Q'lara Tihrah. We provide a subdued atmosphere for those looking for either a calm hang out spot, intimate RP experience, or a place to meet new friends. In addition we also host a photo studio in the basement for those looking for a neutral backdrop to take GPoses against.

name: Poncho
description: Going on 6 years of weekly Trance music shows with artists throughout the Midwest. Music first venue, in person or on stream staying as faithful to the IRL music set experience as we can. Full Trance sets followed by late night Happy Hardcore, find us IRL from Minnesota to Chicago!

name: Unwritten
description: Unwritten adventurer's tavern is the place to relax, grab a drink and something to eat, and share a story.

name: Aquarius
description: Aquarius Nightclub
The Ultimate Spot for a Great Night Out

If you're looking for the perfect place to socialize, dance, and unwind, Aquarius Nightclub is where you want to be. With an electrifying atmosphere, top-notch DJs, and a crowd that‚Äôs always ready to have fun, the energy here is unbeatable.

The music selection is on point, keeping the dance floor alive all night long, while the vibrant and friendly vibe makes it easy to meet new people or enjoy the night with friends. Whether you're in the mood to groove to the beats, sip on a cocktail, or just soak in the lively ambiance, Aquarius Nightclub delivers an unforgettable experience.
Get ready for a night of great music, happy people, and pure fun‚Äîthis is the place to be!

name: Four Fiends Resort & Casino
description: Welcome to Four Fiends Resort! We have a variety of things to choose how you wish to spend your time with us. Gamble at the Casino and earn Fiend Tokens to redeem at our Prize Counter. Join the hype on the Dance Floor with our DJs. Get some drinks or appetizers at the bar. Rent a room for you and a guest. All of this and more! Let us change your luck.

name: √Çme soeur
description: √Çme soeur is a relaxing sea side bath house and lounge that is a wonderful place to unwind or afk!

name: The Blackest Night
description: We are an [18+] goth/alternative themed, nightclub/bathhouse. We also offer other services like private massage sessions and photo shoots on request, and more 🔞 Come by for drinks and some cute company 💗 Located at Dynamis, Maduin - Empyreum Ward 16 Plot 32. Can't wait to see you there~!

name: Valkyrie Club
description: Step into the afterlife at Ishgard's finest venue. All are welcome to enjoy drinks, dancers, photography, auctions, and more in our uniquely icy setting.

name: Starfall Caf√©
description: Sunday is around the corner, where our doors are open to all who are looking to socialise or grab a bite of something from our extensive menu of treats!

Our caf√© has always prioritized creating a safe, comfortable place for our patrons to wind down at the end of the week. Come by for a wide range of delicious drinks and sweet snacks, ordered straight to your table by our talented staff team. We look forward to your visit!

name: Irontoe Brewery Tap
description: Irontoe Breweries is owned and operated by Wrag Irontoe, with its primary brewhouse located in the Thanalan desert's jewel city, Ul'dah. There, the squat Roegadyn makes his home in an old, converted warehouse where he and his trusted brewers develop both customary and unique ingredients into foamy, thirst-quenching ales, lagers, ciders, and stouts.

Several of Wrag Irontoe's brews could be found in local city bars but, in the recent weeks, have been popping up in cities all across Eorzea. Wrag can often be found wandering into venues with a pack of sample bottles on his back, seeking new locations who will feature the result of his labours.
Irontoe Brewery can be found in Garnet Lane, Ul'dah. [[Mateus Goblet Ward 3, Plot 34]]

name: The Maneki-Neko
description: The Maneki-Neko is a love letter to those who seek to bask in the modern eastern vibes of a nightclub in cabaret's clothing. We have experienced bartenders, gambling, booming music and enticing courts & hosts that are bound to fill up your night with a mind-blowing experience and leave you with a little taste for more.

name: Rainbow Room Lounge
description: Discover a vibrant, all-in-one destination that brings together the energy of a nightclub, the comfort of a lounge, the flavors of a restaurant, and the relaxation of a dispensary. Whether you‚Äôre here to dance, unwind, indulge, or connect, the Rainbow Room Lounge is a place where everyone can feel at home.

As an LGBTQ+ focused venue, we take pride in creating an inclusive space where people from all walks of life are welcomed and celebrated. An integral part of our atmosphere is immersive roleplay, and roleplayers of all experience levels are welcome.
Grab a drink, strike up a conversation, or hit the dance floor, maybe even a joint! Whatever you‚Äôre in the mood for, the Rainbow Room Lounge can make it happen.

name: Demons Den
description: Welcome to a realm like no other‚Äîa sanctuary where shadows come alive and your spirit is free to roam. Here in the depths of the lair, you‚Äôll find a vibrant disco to ignite your nights, a bar stocked with infernal brews, cozy corners for games, and countless spots to capture the perfect gpose. Step in, let loose, and be your wickedly true self.

name: The Snack Shack
description: Located down the stairs from the hotsprings in Ishgard's Empyreum, The Snack Shack is a sfw bar and grill that offers snacks to the weary traveler visiting the 1st ward and 57th plot of Empyreum on Gilgamesh/Aether.

name: ATLAN-T15
description: ATLAN-T15 (generally called Atlantis) is a cyberpunk themed bar set in a tall building that is located in The Tempest, where there is an open balcony view of the fallen city of Amaurot. This place is inspired by video games like VA-LL HALL-A and a bit of Cyberpunk 2077 as they are merged into one of Final Fantasy XIV's most amazing setting in Norvrandt. Here you can can vibe to the music from our chosen playlist in the homepage, or 'Neath Dark Waters' on repeat while you grab a drink and socialise with the bartenders and other visitors. Maybe even refer to each other as 'choom'.

name: Knight's Ryokan
description: An expansion of Valentine's Teahouse and home to the Pocket Knight's, this Ryokan serves eastern style meals and drinks, and has a comfy room for the wandering traveler.

name: Chocobo Wild Wings
description: We offer a variety of food and drink, along with some unique gamba options.- open only during Sporting Events. Focusing mainly on the NFL Football season, sometimes we will be open during other events depending on schedule

name: Heaven's Gate
description: Heaven's Gate is a NightClub come and have fun.

name: Secret Garden
description: Join us for an evening of music, fun, and friendship in the garden!
Recently discovered in a run-down house, the garden has been transformed back to its original beauty, ready for new and old friends to enjoy!
Our resident DJs will spin Melodic Deep House tunes, and our fabulous resident bartender will serve all sorts of fun throughout the night.

name: Sunset Spa Sol
description: Enjoy the unique crimson sunsets with one of many relaxing onsen!
The Bathhouse features multiple baths and spa rooms to unwind after your hard adventures - either alone or in company.
The venue is currently open without staff and can be freely visited at any time!
Keep in mind that since this is a bathhouse, the venue will openly contain NSFW nudity while visiting!

name: Honeysuckle Teahouse
description: Honeysuckle is an RP18+ Teahouse offering baths and companionship! We are a group of friends that love to meet new people and hang out. Our venue has been around for over two years, and we would love it if you came by to see us!

name: Valentine Teahouse
description: Welcome to Valentine's Teahouse, where you can come relax with a nice cup of tea and enjoy our Far Eastern cuisine, indoors by our pond or by the onsen.

name: Mogsong Academy
description: ‚ô™Learn to bard!‚ô™ Join us at Mogsong Academy for our beginner's hand bard class! No experience required, just grab your keyboard or controller and we'll have you learning songs in no time!

name: ENVY
description: ENVY is a cyberpunk-themed futuristic community aspiring to bring you an experience that stands apart. We fuse cutting-edge style with immersive environments, pushing the boundaries to offer something fresh and unforgettable.

name: Degens, Inc.
description: 18+ NSFW Venue & Free Company
Strip Club Lounge HQ, Chill Atmosphere
FREE Moon Magic, FREE Drinks, FREE RP Matchmaking - No VIP Needed!
Choose Your Tag:
‚Ä¢ LFP = Seeking ERP
‚Ä¢ LTM = Seeking SFW RP
‚Ä¢ RP = Just Vibing
~ Additional Pop-up Openings listed in our Discord events! ~

name: Heavenside Bath & Spa
description: Experience the divine touch of Angels - Massages & Sponge-baths on demand.
- Relax in the company of our Angels.
- Curated wines by our Sommelier.
- Experience our new bar selections.
- New Syncshell available!

name: UA Academia Lounge
description: Eorzea's original auction house and premiere dance club, UA Lounge is your destination whether it be to dance the night away, meet new people, buy, or sell, you're sure to have an enjoyable evening. Our staff is eager to help you have the night of your life, and they don't bite, unless you ask them to. With various events being offered, you never know what the night will bring!
mareCode: Join our Discord for moon magic info! ‚ô•
marePassword: Join our Discord for moon magic info! ‚ô•

name: Whimsy Nook
description: "Nestled deep within a wisteria wood, dancing lights guide your way to the entrance of Whimsy Nook. A small cozy cottage that you find turns out to be a caf√©! No regular tables here, just comfy seats. Come put up your feet, relax, and get away from the world."

name: Shark Tank
description: *Come swim with the sharks! Or, perhaps, just the team of Drum and Blahaj!
The new home of Team Drum and Blahaj boasts a beautiful aquatic shark theme.
The venue is open two nights a week, one night is reserved for the team;
the second night is a true open deck night and is first come first serve for DJs to show off what they've got!!*

**Note:** Our venue is NSFW because we prefer an 18+ audience due to containing adult themes, * **HOWEVER** * we do not employ courtesans and do not offer NSFW services! Come and let your bait hang low as much as you want, but our sharks are not for sale! Thank you for understanding ‚ô•

name: Dawnshine's Den
description: Remotely in the Mist an old fabric lay fallow. Formerly used to melt weapons from rare materials, Sorenna found them abandoned and took care of them. Thanks to clever conversions and renovations, the outside of the building shines in a great style, which invites you to take a closer look.
When you enter you immediately see the old charm of the factory, the old masonry, raw materials and pipes, grilles and flair.
The atmosphere invites you to sit comfortably and chat; there are dance floors and seating on several levels.

Extravagant drinks are freshly prepared for you at the bar and the bartenders are happy to fulfill any wish, as long as they can mix it. You can celebrate wildly on the dance floor, and you can always find a welcome place among all sorts of people.
The DJ finds enough space on the stage for the evening's entertainment, accompanied by great entertainment in the form of dancers, nothing stands in the way of an exuberant evening.
Come celebrate with us at Dawnshine's Den! We welcome you and ensure a wonderful evening.

name: Crimson Ravens Hunting Guild - Open Guild Night
description: Here at the Crimson Ravens Hunting Guild, we serve to provide some good old-fashioned big-game hunts while giving the chance to socialize with other hunters and craftsmen in the business - all while earning gil, getting grub, and making new friends in the process. We're a friendly lot and open late, so whether you're needing to find some place to kill time, looking to kill some baddies, or simply want to find some company in our quaint little hunter hangout that totally isn't run by the most outlandish cast of huntsmen around, our doors are open to many and nearly everyone across the star.
Come for the drinks, stay for the hunts!
(Note: The syncshell listed will be emptied for a refresh for each open night)

name: Asmodeus
description: Asmodeus strives to create a safe space for the degenerates of Eorzea to congregate. We are LGBT+ owned with a diverse staff seeking to bring you nothing but the best alternative club experience.
Our outstanding DJs create the perfect musical backdrop with music that spans industrial, metal, nu metal, rock, darkwave, and more.
Whether you‚Äôre looking for a little friendly company or bringing a party of friends, Asmodeus caters to your darkest desires, from handcrafted specialty drinks to our kink-friendly hell‚Äôs belles.
Stepping into the club brings a sense of luxury, of high class, with a twist of the demonic‚Äì a walk on the wild side if you dare.

name: OMNIA Nightclub
description: Named after the Latin word "omnia", meaning "everything", **Omnia Nightclub** redefines Eorzean nightlife by offering an all-encompassing experience that caters to your every desire. Omnia is not just a nightclub; it's a realm of endless possibilities. It's where celebrations, connections, and memories are made. Omnia embraces the spirit of **"everything"** by delivering a diverse range of musical talents, immersive artistic expressions where every detail matters, and a chance to experience everything that makes life vibrant and exhilarating. No matter who you are or where you're from, Omnia Nightclub invites you to be part of the everything experience.

name: Red Velvet Lounge
description: Welcome to the Red Velvet Lounge! The poshest speakeasy on Eorzea! Visit our hidden lounge for live DJs, a tended bar with bootleg drinks, games, giveaways, and a vibrant RP atmosphere! Come dressed for a lush party and jump right in!

name: Legatum Mysteria
description: Welcome to Legatum Mysteria, where mysteries are our business! Come join us on the first Monday of every month to inquire about the various services we can provide, be it research, commissioning an item from our many artisans, hiring our mercenaries to do an array of jobs, or procuring a rare item for you! But if you're not in need of services, we also offer an array of items in our storefront, submitted by our members! Come join us for a drink, chat with us in the lounge, and see for yourself what Legatum Mysteria is all about!

name: The Canvas
description: The Canvas is an art studio/lounge focused on doing live art commissions! Come by to commission artists, or enter our weekly art raffle done by one of our artists!

name: M.I.L.K
description: Hi guys we are M.I.L.K stands for man, i love knives! A meme night club where we have fun, love music, and just socialize. We also advocate mental health.

name: Iceberg Lounge
description: It‚Äôs always a cold day in hell.. at the Iceberg Lounge! Welcome to the coldest nightclub in Solution 9 - cyberpunk meets frostpunk in this HipHop & Hardcore venue home to some of the wildest parties in existence - keep your guard up as this venue is home to the galaxies toughest and most ruthless and our ladies know just what you want with our lewd dancers and naughty gamba games - lets kick some ice

name: The Wild Peony
description: The Wild Peony is a 18+ venue that offers an experience that transcends the ordinary, where desires are embraced, and fantasies come alive. Surrender yourself to the sensory delights of this Thavnairian sanctuary, where passion and allure intertwine in an unforgettable symphony of pleasure and decadence.

name: Laid-Back Lounge
description: Laid-Back Lounge is a fun venue meant to give you a place to unwind and spend time with your friends. We are a group of players on Balmung aimed at uplifting the LGBTQIA+ community within FFXIV.

name: The Crypt Nightclub
description: Mostly Goth/ Industrial with theme nights here and there that include, Edm/pop, 90's night, etc.

name: VLVT DRMS
description: VLVT DRMS is a safe for work dance venue and bar lounge, lavishly decorated with a cozy and warm atmosphere to both entice and relax even the weariest of wanderers. We strive to bring a safe, calming space into our wonderful community, hoping that each visit will leave you in the clouds! Whether you're looking to grab a few drinks, make pleasant conversation or dance the night away, there is a member of staff that is eager to spend their time dreaming with you. Come dream with us tonight!

name: Blasphemy Lounge
description: An 18+ nsfw lounge for those who wish to relax in a small hide away. The loung features an onsen tub and seating to slip away into comfort.

name: The Lunar Whale
description: A lunar themed venue to come relax, recharge, and make yourself at home. To our guests visiting from Mare Lamentorum we hope that perhaps you will even feel a little bit at home.

name: WHIPPED
description: Indulge in the tantalizing allure of WHIPPED, Primal's Premier 18+ LGBTQ+ BDSM Strip Lounge & Bar. Step into our seductive mansion, crafted with passion and detail, where fantasies come alive. Our focus on roleplay creates an intoxicating mix of fun, sexiness, and a relaxed vibe. Surrender to the experience and dive deep into our vibrant, alluring world.

name: L'Atelier des Saveurs
description: L'Atelier des Saveurs is not just a cafe; it's an artistic haven where your senses come alive. Inspired by the vibrant world of art and culinary delights, we invite you to immerse yourself in a space designed for relaxation, creativity, and connection.

name: The Whispered Wish
description: Unrivaled discretion. Unmatched service. Luxury that stays within reach of even the common adventurer and layman. And, above all, an adult entertainment locale unlike anywhere else.

We are the Whispered Wish, the premier brothel, bar, and night spot. We don't just provide a pillow house; we offer an experience that caters to you while providing the utmost in discrepancy and comfort.
Whether your needs are simply a soft place to sit, a hard drink to sip, a simple companion, or a daring night, we're ready to provide.

name: Barrels & Beans Cafe
description: Barrels and Beans is not just a place to eat and drink. It's a vibe. Here, we brew boldness, one shot of espresso at a time, all accompanied by a relaxed jazz vibe that sets the perfect tone.

Come to share stories, whether it's about epic adventures or just the usual day-to-day stuff. Laughter echoes against the cozy backdrop, creating this laid-back atmosphere where every sip and bite is like a pause in the daily grind.
This isn't just a cafe; it's an immersive experience. Step into Barrels and Beans, where every sip and bite is a chapter in the ongoing story of camaraderie and adventure.
So, if you're up for good company, tasty bites, and a place that feels like a second home, Barrels and Beans is the spot to be. Come join the crew!

name: Scarlet Devil
description: Step into our enchanting teahouse, where a coterie of exquisite Geisha await to delight and entertain you. Allow yourself to be guided to your designated table, where one of our graceful geisha will serve you with the utmost care and attention. Indulge in lively games and charming prizes provided by our skilled performers, making your visit an unforgettable experience.

name: Little Bee Cafe
description: -We're open alternating Mondays! Please check our website or join our Discord to know when we're open!-

A brand new SFW roleplay experience for anyone wishing to have a relaxing evening! Our cafe features a full menu of sweets and treats and our hosts will be there to keep you entertained at no charge. This is the perfect venue to stop by if you're just dipping your toes into roleplay or if you're looking to enjoy an evening without any pressure!

name: The Light's Chosen
description: An RP venue where people can relax and enjoy themselves. New to RP? No problem! We are here to help! LGBTQ+ 18+ friendly
Famfrit-Shiro-Ward 26/Plot 43

description: Convergence is a heavily roleplay-centric and immersive Resort & Lounge with a SFW environment and optional NSFW encounters. We offer bar and lounge games (such as classics like Never Have I Ever), room rentals, in-house photobooths & photographers on staff, and community-organized events with the occasional raffle/giveaway and an Open Mic Night!

name: Full Moon Manor
description: Full Moon Manor aims to be Eorzeas premier goth nightclub! Featuring a dancefloor, bar, cafe, private rooms, and baths, we aim to warm the black hearts of our patrons!

name: Maid of Hearts
description: We are a SFW Maid Cafe.

name: The Red String
description: The Red String is a bar and lounge situated within the boughs of the Lavender Beds.
Owned and operated by an active pirate captain, people can expect patrons from all walks of life to come in and share a fine drink. The first sip will have one feel the rhythm of life in a glass.

name: The Celestial Veil
description: Welcome to The Celestial Veil, where art, elegance, and mysticism come together to offer an unforgettable experience. Nestled in an mystical venue, we offer a space where sensuality meets sophistication, with performances that captivate and cocktails that delight. Step beyond the veil and indulge in a world where creativity and luxury dance together.

name: Above and Below Workshop
description: The Above and Below Workshop is your one-stop shop for all things mechanical and domestic! Whether you‚Äôre soaring through the skies, diving beneath the waves, or simply enhancing the comforts of home, we have the parts, tools, and supplies to make every endeavor a success. name: Ignition
description: A night club with live djs and giveaways!

name: Garden of Azalea
description: The Garden of Azalea is Primal's exclusive floral cafe! Come downstairs and relax, take in the sweet scents that will make all of your weariness fade away, and get comfy as you listen to the best music our cafe radio has to offer, as it changes every week!  We also have a news bulletin on our menu, offering interesting stories across the realm, also refreshed every week.

name: Sip & Brew
description: Our little caf√© is here to provide high quality product, in a relaxed environment. Please take your time and enjoy a refreshment and unwind in our dining area, library lounge or gardens. Close to the Lavender Northeast subdivision aetheryte, or straight down the docks and up the hill!

name: The Wanderer's Respite Inn and Tavern
description: SFW RP- A place where folks can rest their heads after a long day. Drinks specials, snacks, an open stage for bards, poets and other stage performances. Relaxed vibes.

name: The Coeurlregina
description: A heavy rp bar and lounge for the femme seeking the comfort and companionship of other femme individuals.

name: BobaShot Night Club
description: 18+ Night Club, Courts, Dancers, Bar, Drinks, Boba Alcohol Theme, DJ, Services, RP Friendly. Services & VIP available!

name: Mainframe
description: Welcome to Mainframe; where your electric fantasies are illuminated by neon light. Immerse yourself in our playground, where technology and pleasure intertwine. Dive into your desires, indulge in euphoria, and surrender to the pulsating rhythm of our DJs and staff, as they guide you through sensory delight.

name: The Bookend Lounge
description: The Bookend Lounge is a casual bookstore-themed speakeasy. Roleplay is encouraged but not necessary! We have an open bard stage, custom cocktails and occasional blackjack.  Hang out and mingle with friends new and old. Come and take a look behind the shelves.

Irish ~ an Ishgardian hometown slang used in pubs of the Brume. Often used by the working class who, though typically overlooked or outright ignored by nobles and clergy, are a loud, proud and essential piece (perhaps THE most essential piece) of Ishgardian culture and economy. "IRISH" i.e. "I ARE ISH" i.e. "I AM ISHGARD!"

Here at MLAW, like our friends from Foundation's lower levels, we always assume everything that can go wrong will go wrong. It's a little rough around the edges in here, a little rowdy (OK, a lot of both). Good thing we got the luck on our side...usually.

The menu, a fusion of innovation and classic flavors, features beverages and snacks crafted using both traditional and alchemically infused techniques, from clockwork-coiled pot brewed coffee to crystal-infused tea and an array of cocktails and spirits.

name: Church of Metal
description: *There stood a weathered relic of the unfaithful known as The Church. Its stones bore the weight of centuries, each weathered brick a witness to the passage of time. Filled with towering stained-glass windows where the moonlight is casting a kaleidoscope of colors across the glossy black marble dance floor. The bell tower, with its timeworn chimes, seemed to toll with tales of forgotten days. Around the edges of the space, alcoves and hidden nooks provided intimate corners for those seeking more private pleasures. Within these hallowed, desecrated walls, the Church had become a sanctuary for the lost, the passionate, and the unrepentant. Here, under the watchful gaze of the transformed saints, they found communion in their shared devotion to the raw, unapologetic energy of Metal music and the dance of unrestrained desire.*

As mentionned above, as we own many venues, we rotate every weeks, please find all our infos on our discord.

name: Headquarters
description: Welcome to Headquarters, home of Eternal Entertainment and Team Lewd! Here you will find special events hosted by either organization or the DJs within.

name: House of Cuties
description: Welcome to the House of Cuties which is a haven meant for comfort and lewd activities! Upstairs we have a comfy cafe that of course serves some alcoholic beverages along with coffee and tea. Then downstairs we have our lewdies club where we have bards playing and people for all sorts of desires. Come in and find your place to unwind!

name: Nightraid Bounty Call
description: 💰 Bring back your trophies and collect your rewards! 💰

NightRaid's office is open for those in search of bounties, odd jobs, and general work. Those with many different professions such as; hunters, mercenaries, exorcists, crafters, gatherers, healers, and so on are usually welcome to browse our job board located in the lobby. Our HQ also acts as a lounge & kitchen downstairs if visitors are looking to relax and socialize.
🏮NightRaid's Services: Hunting, Tracking, Info-Gathering, Exorcism, Healing, Escorting, Guarding, Entertainment, etc.
🏮Traditional eastern guestrooms are open for hunters to stay after. Healers are on standby if any hunter returns injured!

notices.message: This venue opens biweekly at this time, please check the venue's discord to see if the're open first!

name: Ink & Sip
description: ‚ÄúWelcome to the Ink & Sip! If you're looking for the perfect place to curl up with a good book, enjoy a cozy ambience and have some tasty food, this is it. Our cafeÃÅ features a variety of delicious menu options to pair with our expansive selection of new and used books. Enjoy the smell of freshly brewed coffee, delectable snacks and good conversation as you browse through our bookshelves.‚Äù

name: Cafaye Sublime
description: Cafaye Sublime is the spot for those wanting a relaxing and calming atmosphere with beautiful music and a chance to socialize with a variety of people. Open 3 days a week, we offer cheap drinks and a raffle every open.

name: Laughing Coffin Casino and Bar
description: Casino with a chill vibe for all players to enjoy

name: The Roe's Garden
description: The Roe's Garden: the Garden of Eorzean Delights, is an 18+ Nightclub, Adventurer's Tavern, and adult playground serving the LGBTQIA+ community. Whether you swing by for one of our club nights with amazing Twitch DJ's spinning, or a more low key rp tavern night with an open bardic stage, The Roe's Garden eagerly awaits to serve you!

name: Icecrown Citadel
description: This is an Inspired Themed Venue based on World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King but turned into a Tavern

name: Lost Aether Lounge
description: We are a cozy modern lounge that offers a quiet place to get a drink, meet new people and chit chat the night away. We offer a variety of drinks, companionship and a spa on site!

name: The Lucky Sevens Casino & Gentleman's Club
description: You lucky people! It's time to come down and experience Eorzea's wildest role-play Free Company, filled with the most talented and fun players on Hyperion. Step through the resort palms and come forward into our grand lobby, where sexy casino bunnies and dapper poker studs will lead through our entertainment destination. Downstairs, a stocked bar stands across from the main stage. In the upper levels, enjoy the games and see if you can break the 100 million gil bank in our casino games, ranging from slots machines to Astrologian roulette. Fancy yourself a great minion trainer? Send your beloved pets into our Dominion of Minions arena to square off against fellow guests or dare to attempt the boss-encounters of our staff's own beasts. If you do strike it rich, you'll find one of our bunny girls the perfect place to spend your ill-gotten gil. As we say in Lucky Sevens, "What happens in the private chambers, stays in the private chambers." Finally, end the night with the fabulous Showcase and Revue featuring the Lucky Sevens dancers, taking place in the company theater to the roaring crowd of high rollers. Just be careful whom you cross, where you set your drink and whose hand you follow into what dark corner. Rumor has it that darker, more terrible plots and schemes lurk beneath the glitz and glamour of the marble and gold halls...There is only one way to find out! Head down the Lucky Sevens Casino & Gentlemen's Club--where roleplay is the biggest jackpot!...

name: RED (Brothel & Bar)
description: RED is a Brothel and Bar dedicated to delivering a luxury NSFW FFXIV RP Experience. We offer a range of exotic and talented Escorts, along with services ranging from rotating Free Escort Roulette every night, to Escort Mud-wrestling and even body shots of some our best top-shelf liquor.
If you are looking for a night of adult entertainment RED is a Brothel suited for you, regardless of your specific needs, RED offers Escorts of varying sexes and fetishes.

name: The Crescent Inn - Onsen and Bar
description: Newly Relocated to Shirogane, the once cozy and comfortable tavern has been transformed! Please enjoy our signature drinks while you relax in our herbal baths with some of our choice herbs.
Our private rooms contain our many amenities for the mercenaries who pass through.
Located on Mateus Shirogane Ward 26 Plot 46

name: Darklight Den
description: Welcome to Darklight Den, the ultimate bubblegum metal nightclub where the night is loud, unapologetic, and electric. Located in the heart of Eorzea, Darklight Den is a high-energy, immersive space designed for those who crave an unforgettable nightlife experience. We mix sweet neon-pop vibes with the hard-hitting intensity of metal, creating a one-of-a-kind atmosphere that you won't find anywhere else.

name: Event Horizon
description: Event Horizon is a Space/Dark Theme nightclub with inspiration in space horror science fiction. For those coming from the Dark Nebula family it is a safe haven to kick back after a long and hard week. We welcome all and encourage everyone to mingle with us and have a great social experience while enjoying some of the greatest music that Eorzea has to offer.

name: DANCE
description: DANCE brings the old good memories back to life.
We are a club from 2021 that took a long break and is now back to put a smile on the faces of the party people.
We would be very happy if you came to visit us.

name: The Haven Nightclub and Spas [18+ LGBTQIA+]
description: **Open since early 2021,** the Haven has been one of Eorzea‚Äôs premier **INCLUSIVE LGBTQIA+ 18+** hybrid RP/Casual-Convo nightclubs and free companies. We have a large mansion in Mist with themed rooms, spas, a full bar, live DJ‚Äôs and we‚Äôre just a short walk from the beach.

A **full-service bar, lounge, and dancehall** greet you as you come downstairs. Beyond that are our **secluded adult's only clothing-optional spas.** Every section of our large house is utilized! We have no closed-off house sections, so every corner is decorated to enjoy. Come join us for some dancing, chillaxing, and fun! We are also hiring - inquire within. Wifi is on our carrd. ‚ù§Ô∏è🧡 💛 💚 💙 💜
**Open Fridays 8p-11p EST and/or as otherwise announced.**

name: Prelude in Violet
description: Welcome to Prelude in Violet! A cozy caf√© with an open stage for bards. SFW/AFK friendly.

name: Club UwU
description: Step into the steampunk wonderland of Club UwU, where gears gleam and lights dance to the rhythm of heart-pounding beats. Fuel your evening with the electrifying tunes of our talented DJs, the mesmerizing moves of our hot dancers, and the delicious taste of our delectable drinks. Club UwU is more than just a venue; it's a community, backed by Project UwU, a LGBTQIA+ FC within the world of Final Fantasy XIV. So come, join the UwU Crew, where every person is a new friend and every party is a new celebration.

name: Unholy
description: Welcome to Unholy‚Äîwhere the night is yours to command, and the thrill of the gothic underworld awaits. Step into the shadows and surrender to the music that pulses like a heartbeat through dark walls and flickering lights. Here, in our sanctuary of midnight, every soul can let loose, savoring sinfully crafted drinks and indulging in the pleasures that only the night can bring. Dance among kindred spirits, raise a glass to the forbidden, and let the allure of the unknown sweep you into the early hours.

name: Auntea Ino's
description: The Teahouse, a calm place to come to gamble, relax and enjoy an evening. Run by Auntie Ino, the teahouse is a place for all to come to find a safe and relaxing environment for their evening. Feel free to stop in anytime to enjoy your evening.

name: The Blue Lotus
description: the Blue Lotus offers a friendly and relaxing atmosphere perfect for a comfortable and quiet evening. Offering a range of services for all role play levels whether it be a casual drink at the bar or an in-depth massage experience, our staff are sure to welcome all whether they are taking their first steps into role play or are experienced players themselves. Please have a look and see what we offer and we hope to see you very soon.

name: The Little Red Panda Cafe
description: The Little Red Panda Cafe is your new spot for drinks, food and live music! Owned by Koko and her little red panda Bors, the venue aims to provide a comfy spot for dates, chilling out with friends or trying some of our freshly baked goods. We hope to see you soon!

name: FRACTURE
description: FRACTURE is a gothic, rose-themed SFW club with music provided by a mix of our talented bards and some of the best DJ talents that Eorzea has to offer! On the final Thursday of every month, we have our resident DJs to end the month right!

name: The Wicked Violet
description: Swanky, rave-like nightclub venue!

name: Dreadmist Maidens
description: Dreadmist is an intensely RP-driven venue where Hard Industrial, EBM, and Metal reign. A haven of darkness and heavy beats, we welcome those who embrace the night. Proudly LGBTQIA+ friendly, we offer a space where all can lose themselves in the music and the moment. Step into the mist and feel the pulse of the dark.

name: The Gremlins Den
description: In the midst of the goblet a small venue opens it doors to the outside, inviting everyone in to a small piece of Doma welcome to The Gremlins Den.

This Doman venue mixes the traditional small Doman bathhouse where one can slip into a bath and forget about the world outside for a brief moment, with a small yet charming Cafe that serves food for you to barbeque on your own.
Come in and enjoy the risk of burning your food, or enjoy the chaos of a hot bath and idle chatter. Whatever choice you make awaits you at The Gremlins Den.
The Gremlins Den is currently a popup venue open whenever it fits.
RP is encouraged within the establishment walls, but not a must.
All food/drink and other services are currently very inexpensive or tip based.

name: Slumber Party Cafe & Lounge
description: The Slumber Party Cafe and Lounge is a place where you can RP, chat OOC, go AFK, vibe, bard, whatever you want really! (Within reason - as long as you're following the rules.) The venue, as you might expect from the name, has a slumber party theme, filled with cozy decor and a menu of comfort food.

Our doors are always open to anyone who wants to chill (or chat, RP, etc.) in the space, even if there are no staff members around. We have staffed openings (where one or both owners are there and available to chat, RP, and serve food/drinks) every Sunday 3PM-7PM Eastern time, and possibly other days/times too if we feel like it.

name: Souls Night Club
description: Welcome to Souls Night Club, where every night is a journey into paradise! Whether you're looking to connect with great people, make new friends, or even find that special someone, we've got you covered. Our dedicated staff is committed to ensuring you have the best night of your week.

Take your chances at our friendly and welcoming gamba tables, perfect for both newcomers and seasoned pros. Our mesmerizing dancers will captivate your senses, while our attentive courtesans are here to provide companionship and warmth for those feeling a bit lonely or adventurous.

Strike up a conversation with our friendly bartenders and charming waitstaff‚Äîthey're here to make your night memorable. And when it comes to music, rest assured, we only feature top-quality DJs spinning the best tunes.
Join us at Souls Night Club, where unforgettable experiences await you at every turn. Come and discover a world of excitement, connection,  endless possibilities and loose your soul

name: The Cat's Meow
description: Come out and enjoy some bard tunes at The Cat's Meow! Bring a friend or two to enjoy the live music, tasty drinks, and maybe try your luck at our gamba table! We are a SFW RP venue with the goal to showcase some great bards and a place to relax while enjoying the jams!

name: Crystal Tinker Bath & Bar
description: Food, bar, dancefloor, and a bath house in the basement. Welcome to visit and check around anytime as not set schedule is currently available.

name: Pound Town
description: Pound Town is the home of FIGHT NIGHT's, a massive pit built with the express purpose to allow for untamed violence and spectacle! Every feature and intent is centered around it. All staff and interactions are intended to engage and challenge you, and if you're a bit curious. You might discover what's hiding outside the pit.

name: Wu Studios : ÁöáÂêéÂÆ´ÊÆø
description: House Of Wu presents Wu Studios : ÁöáÂêéÂÆ´ÊÆø - gpose studio where all are welcome. Open 24/7 to the public.

name: The Biblioplex
description: A little slice of Sharlayan comforts for all your research needs. Browse our curated selection of works spanning topics from all over Eitherys and beyond! or simply lounge and unwind after a hard day of study.
Curl up inside with a drink and a book or feel free to enjoy our exterior heated bath and water garden.

name: Verdant Cafe
description: Welcome to the Verdant Cafe, a relaxing eatery and roleplay venue in the Goblet. Stop by for drinks, food, or just conversation, and take a breather from the chaos of life. We hope to see you soon!

name: Unraveled Haven
description: Unraveled Haven is a Nightclub Venue offering a wide variety of entertainment and services.
We have a fully stocked RP bar, dancers, gamba, and a twitch "radio station" for you to tune in to! (DJ's coming soon?)

Whether you're here to dance, strip down one of our dancers, have a drink, or gamba the night away, we can promise you an immersive night with our friendly and interactive staff! New to RP? That's okay. Everyone is welcome here and we'd love for you to come as you are!

name: Time Warp
description: "Time Warp is Aether's fastest growing venue, offering a little something for everyone, and EVERYONE is welcome. We do not care if you have issues with other venues, as long as you leave those issues at the door. All of our staff are welcoming and eager to provide whatever you need to take your mind off the chaos of the day, and simply enjoy yourself within our walls. Take the leap inside, and find out for yourself what it is that everyone is talking about."

name: The Collared Kitten
description: The Collared Kitten is affectionately referred to as a ‚Äúhedonism den" where pleasure, opulence, and self-indulgence is a primary focus. We offer a HIGHLY immersive and RP-focused experience, and as such, we expect both the player and the character to be 21+ to be able to fully enjoy our bar, private outdoor hot springs and BDSM dungeon area to the fullest.

name: Ink
description: A staged lounge bar specially created to showcase one off sessions within the alt sounds genre, whether that is cyberpunk, underground rap, witch house or more. Opening hours are irregular.

name: The Drunken Duck
description: In a quiet little corner of Ishgard sits an inn, almost perfectly between the lower city and the pillars. Stories abound about the place and the owner and new citizen of Ishgard. But whatever the tells that are told, the place is warm, welcoming. Filled with spirits far and wide, and food to rival even the Bismarck!
A place for the adventurers, the everyday laborers, the travelers, the heroes of wars long past, for those who love to spin a tale and share with the world.

name: Club LEWD
description: Club LEWD is an nightclub on Halicarnassus. Boasting an alluring and seductive atmosphere. It is a popular destination for players seeking a vibrant nightlife experience. With it's sleek decor, pulsating electronic music, and captivating light displays, the club setrs the state for an unforgettable evening. From energetic dance floors filled with players showcasing their moves to mesmerizing performances by talented DJ's and dancers, Club LEWD offers an array of entertainment. It embraces a provocative theme while maintaining a safe and inclusive environment. Whether players are looking to socalize, dance, or simply enjoy the immersive ambiance.

name: Occam's Razor
description: An Unpretentious Pub at the Edge of the Brume
Open every second Tuesday of the month

IC gil, but donations welcome! Proceeds generated by food and drink sales are used to fund programs such as education, medical care, and vocational training for those of Halone's children who need a hand up in recovering from the Dragonsong War--and the star's many other perils.

name: The Forge
description: A dance club with fire, smoke, and a side of tetanus.

name: Club Voidsent
description: A rift has opened in Eorzea, and the call of the void awaits you! Step into the 13th shard and experience unrivaled service and impeccable vibes as you dance the night away with only the void above your head.

Voidsent has Poker, BlackJack, 50/50 raffles and more! Featuring a massive dance floor with Live DJs and a free entry DR Tournament where you could win massive bank! The Void is calling, will you answer?

name: Delfina Maid/Butler Cafe
description: Have a Sweet treat with your own maid and enjoy cute fun maid dance shows!

name: Frost
description: Club Frost is an 18+ LGBTQ+ nightclub, bar, & lounge. If you're looking for a spot to Chill out then you came to the right place. Join us Friday Nights 9P-1A EST for an unforgettable time!

name: The Tooth & Claw Speakeasy
description: A classy retro-themed bar, inspired by the secret bars of the 1920s and '30s. With themed drinks and jazzy tunes, The Tooth & Claw wishes to bring you an immersive, chill experience. Put on your classiest clothes and join us! Listen to the in-game tunes, or a bard performing on the Open Stage, grab a drink, and have a great time chatting the evening away~!

name: Amethyst Nightclub
description: 🪩Welcome to Amethyst, where the night never stops! 🪩
A place for the wild, the free, and the music lovers of all kinds.
We offer Gamba, Courts, Photos, and Drink!! A little something for all tastes.
So lose yourself in the vibe, and let the night be as legendary as you are.
Amethyst‚Äîfor those who dare to dance to their own rhythm. 🌟
🗺Ô∏èLocated in Dynamis/Golem/Mist/W6/P7🗺Ô∏è

name: Gentle and Desire
description: Welcome to Gentle and Desire. A sweet and gentle SFW cafe on the top floor. Come cuddle with a friend and enjoy sweet treats. and then the Bar of Desire on the bottom, come and hang out with our dancers in the NSFW area of this venue.

name: Cafe Flintstone
description: Welcome. Take a seat. Order a coffee or tea and maybe a cake to go with it. Enjoy the good music with us and maybe a good chat.

name: Seafront Village Library
description: A warm sea breeze washes over you, seals and sea lions squawking outside the windows as you make yourself comfortable. With books as high as the ceilings and plenty to browse, the quiet plucking of a lute echoing through the room from Head Librarian Popola. This is Seafront Village Library, small and tight knit as the Replicant twins who founded it all. Seafront Village Library is a library first and foremost take our patrons under our wing as if you were one of Popola's own. Where our library is always just the right enough warm to keep you comfortable, our acts of service keep you entertained and well-fed by local vendors and partners. A place where you can rest no matter the hour or day, no matter who you are or what brought you here. You have a home at Seafront Village Library, so don't be afraid to come by and make yourself comfortable.

name: The Midnight Rose | Cafe and baths
description: The Midnight Rose is blooming into Kugane's newest cafe and bath. Everyone is welcome to shelter beneath her spreading petals, from your average adventurer to those who stray from the straight and narrow. The Rose is safe for all. So leave preconceptions and weapons at the door (we handle the pruning), grab a drink or snack and enjoy a soak, and you might find common ground with a common crook, meet a new friend or even find some companionship if your tongue is sharp enough or you play your cards right. Just bring your gil, and please, mind The Thorns.

name: Frozen Abyss
description: Step beyond the veil and enter Frozen Abyss, where fire and ice collide in an unholy symphony of chaos. A sanctuary for creatures of the night, our gothic nightclub is a realm of haunting melodies, infernal energy, and darkly seductive atmospheres.

name: Honey Honey
description: "Maids with Extra Spice"

name: The Britannia
description: A British pub hidden away in the heart of Faerie. The Britannia is made by Brits, run by Brits and is for Everyone. Come enjoy some classic pub food and drinks along side pleasant company and live music, we have an open stage for bards along with pleasant staff to chat with.

name: The Blue Note
description: A cosy jazz venue ‚ô•

name: The Verdana
description: Come relax with a great cup of tea and a pastry or two. Cozy atmosphere, great staff, and seating in our exclusive downstairs garden. We look forward to seeing you there!

name: SideArm
description: A Soldiers hang out, A bounty hunters waystation from mark to mark and A brawlers get away from the normal everyday life that only wants them to bleed. A place for Brother an sisters at arms to come and rest. To have a drink and maybe throw a punch or two.

name: The Peach Blossom
description: Need a break from the clubbing scene? Then come unwind at The Peach Blossom! We offer multiple hot tubs where you can soak away your worries, an open stage to show off your mad playing skills or watch others perform & a bar that offers delightful drinks that will certainly quench your thirst! We are an 18+ venue. View our carrd if you'd like to join the discord (link at the bottom)!

name: Starlight Springs
description: Here at Starlight Springs, our goal is to create a relaxing and friendly atmosphere for all of our guests. Whether you want to take your sweetheart on a date night, relax after a long days work, or meet new friends, you are welcome here!

name: The Fungeon
description: 18+ NSFW Goth style dance club with cages, a coffin, dancers, courts, a bar, hot tubs, semi-private rooms, and a dance floor

name: The Grind
description: The Grind is a punk rock themed roleplay venue focused on musical performance. During events at the Grind, different acts will perform one after the other on stage.

In-universe, the rough and tumble establishment, built under an anarchist ethos, seeks to unite disaffected and angry groups within the city and beyond. It serves as a hub for music, entertainment and to provide assistance to vulnerable people.

Performances in the Grind often make use of Mare Synchronos to play music in-game. As such, the program is highly encouraged -- but not mandatory! Everyone is welcome to roleplay. Please note that this is not a Twitch DJ venue, and no third party websites will be used beyond Mare Synchronos for this event!

name: The Red Strings Bar
description: A new venue is coming to Eorzea, a down-to-earth speakeasy you never knew you needed. At the Red Strings we don't just serve alcohol, we use spirits to tune into customers emotions.  Delicious cocktails, accommodating lounges, and friendly souls happy to listen to all adventurous tales.

name: Prismatic Tavern
description: Prismatic Tavern, a RPG-theme tavern that focus on tabletop simulator nights and hoster of a D&D campaign ! Come check out our fully decorated house and enjoy the perks of our laid-back, LGBTQ+-friendly community!

name: For Pet's Sake Caf√©
description: Our venue is a minion- friendly adoption center and caf√©. We have lots of minions looking for their fur-ever home... Will it be your home? Just ask one of our staff behind the counter for a pamphlet and check out our selection of available friends to adopt!

It is important to us that everyone feels welcome and accepted for who they are at our venue. We have zero tolerance for hateful and/or inappropriate behavior. Common sense and Final Fantasy XIV TOS apply. While in our venue, content is SFW.

All food and drink transactions are in-character and do not require out-of-character gil payment, though we do greatly appreciate tips. Adoption fees are in-character and require gil. This gil goes towards more minions and staff salaries.
We're open every Saturday from 4pm-6pm EST! Hope to see ya there!

name: Noctis Aeterna
description: Noctis Aeterna aims to be an inclusive, RP focused, NSFW/lewd bath house and lounge located on Marilith! We have games, auctions, raffles, and spice friendly activities to sate everyones needs! We look forward to seeing you where shadows dance and souls unwind!

name: Bandee Pakshee
description: Bandee Pakshee is the best taste of Thavnair in the cold climes of Ishgard. Committed to a holistic view of comfort, Bandee Pakshee offers some of the best Hannish cuisine in Eorzea, some of the most relaxing environments for dates or evenings out, therapists, doctors, masseurs, courtesans, caterers, singers, dancers, and far more.
Bandee Pakshee also represents the Eorzean Courtesans' Guild, pursuing a safe and secure environment for those employed in adult entertainment disciplines.

name: Arcana Ice Bar
description: The Arcana is a tarot-themed bar in Final Fantasy XIV, offering a mystical atmosphere where patrons can enjoy drinks and tarot readings. The venue blends socializing with fortune-telling, providing an immersive experience for players looking for a unique and spiritual nightlife setting.

name: Moonlight Lounge
description: A sfw lounge that offers guests a place to relax, dance and listen to music from our amazing DJ's!  We come together for the sake of fellowship and to have fun just being together.  So when your done with you travels come on by and May the Moonlight bless you always!

name: Bink's Brew
description: Strolling the docks of Moraby Drydocks, you find a peculiar ship anchored by the shore. A sign reads 'Seafaring Restaurant: Bink's Brew! Now open for business!'

name: Florette Athenaeum
description: Florette Athenaeum is a FFXIV library-based RP venue where you can share your custom stories, partake in story time in voice chat, and chat with others in the comfort of a cozy home!

name: Secret Pixie Comedy Club
description: The Secret Pixie Comedy is the home of Bad Jokes, Speed dating nights, cryptids, and drunken open mic nights. Come hang out with us Monday  and Sunday at 7pm cst-10pm cst in Hyperion Ward 12 plot 23 Lavender Beds. We  sometimes open on Friday and Saturday !

name: Bayou Bingo
description: Welcome to Bayou Bingo, the first bingo hall on Aether! We call the numbers, YOU stamp the papers! Lots of fun Giveaways, 50/50 Raffles, Music, Drinks, Food and More down at the Bayou!

name: Rengo Bathhouse
description: Join us tonight at the Rengo Bathhouse! Let the warm water relax your body and refresh your spirit, share stories with friends new and old, or lose track of the evening with that special someone. Whatever you're looking for, we'd love to have you. We're also hiring! If you'd like to join our stellar staff, fill out the application on our carrd or speak with a manager when we're open.

name: Midnight Solace
description: Hidden away in plain sight lies a sanctuary nestled under a blanket of stars. In the twilight hours, tranquility awaits - Midnight Solace, a place to let the music lift your worries while you dance the night away. We provide a safe and welcoming environment where you can just let go and be yourself. Bring your best vibes and only the fun kind of drama - we'll do the same.

Apart from an atmospheric dancefloor and a well-stocked bar, you can expect top-notch entertainment provided by our roster of fun and diverse companions. If you desire more physical comfort, our courtesans will be happy to indulge you.  Monthly theme nights and a variety of other events ensure that you'll never get bored.
Follow the whispers of the night and join us for a good time you won't easily forget!

name: The Burrow
description: The Burrow Bordello

Art den, lounge, bordello, bistro, forum, safe house... The Burrow wears many hats and so do the people that frequent it. Opened in the Brume at the end of the Dragonsong War, the Burrow bills itself as a place for the unwanted, lost, and lonely. If you have a need, the Burrow can probably fulfill it. Come see us every Wednesday for food, drink, company, and more.

The Burrow is 21+ immersive RP venue with an ongoing storyline and passionate staff. Please be aware the venue touches on mature and dark themes and engage at your own discretion. We hope to see you soon.

name: The Blind Cactus
description: The Blind Cactus is an adventurer's hub that hosts a comedy show called Giggle Fits almost every month. The venue is run by Firelight <FL-RP> on Mateus. Adventurers new and experienced are all welcome to visit or to make their homes there. Grab a drink or a meal and share your grand adventures among like-minded individuals! The mission board placed within the tavern is for members of the FC to take on. Other features include a library and other research areas in which budding and experienced adventurers might be able to glean some knowledge for future endeavors.

name: The Wild Willow
description: The Wild Willow is a cozy, classy coffee shop in house *thirteen*. [[ It's a SFW 18+ Lore Friendly IC Caf√©, with some lightly eerie but not edgy vibes. ]]

name: The Treehouse Theatre
description: In the cold climes of Ishgard lies a little patch of green. Inside you will find a grand treehouse from which you may relax while chatting with friends and listening to music.

name: The Canyon Lounge
description: The Canyon Lounge is a place where cliff meets river, with roots entrenched in the heart of goblet.
Canyon Lounge is the perfect place to enjoy a cup of Joe. Offering solitude and coziness, we understand the mad raid rush and welcome you all to take a load off and relax here!

name: Femboi Hooters
description: A place to enjoy cute Fembois serving you joy

name: Cheshire Cat
description: WHERE? Chaos - Moogle - Empyreum - 15 - 21
WHEN? Saturdays Bi-weekly (odd calenderweeks)
DRESSCODE? Well.. We are a BDSM-dungeon....
18+? HELL YES
Welcome to our most lovely and innocent BDSM-Dungeon that will make sure you'll leave with a wide grin. The Cheshire-Cat is there to catnap you into the wonderlands of safe BDSM-experiences.
We will offer BDSM-Education as well as experiences in a safe environment.

name: Skalds Hall
description: A Norse / Viking themed Hall. Our goal is to bring a place for Travelers to come relax and unwind. Come tell us a story and drink until the gods call you home.

name: Night City
description: Welcome to the city of dreams... Welcome to Night City. We offer a chill place to enjoy music, make friends and hang out. Come get a drink, dance until you drop, relax on the couches while stargazing or all of the above! We hope to see you soon! ‚ô•
Note: We open most nights at the scheduled time unless IRL or staffing issues arise.

name: Lunar Lotus
description: Lunar Lotus is a far eastern tavern and bathhouse offering a relaxing, immersive experience with skilled geisha and orien for entertainment and far eastern meals to enjoy.

name: Horns & Heels
description: Horns & Heels was created as a space for entertainment, companionship, and fun. We offer a variety of activities including escort services, drinks, live shows, gambling, and even cosplay and glam contests.
Discord is available at the website, or by going to discord.gg / hornsandheels (remove spaces).

name: Vega's Hidden Puzzles
description: Vega's Hidden Puzzles are rooms with different themes of jump puzzles wherein the goal is to reach the message book that marks the end of the puzzle. Just for the joy of seeking the heights of the unknown, where few have ventured.. though if you feel tired/ insanity take hold, I recommend you put your ambitions to rest and run! All puzzles open 24/7!

name: MoonPlay
description: Moon Play: A Celestial Nightlife Experience

Welcome to Moon Play, where the essence of the night sky and the allure of dance converge to create an unforgettable nightlife experience. Nestled in the heart of the city, Moon Play is more than just a dance club; it‚Äôs an otherworldly escape, a place where the mysteries of the moon and the energy of the earth intertwine.

As you step into Moon Play, you‚Äôre greeted by an atmosphere that‚Äôs both enchanting and electrifying. Our venue is designed to captivate your senses, featuring sleek, modern decor inspired by the celestial beauty of the moon. The color palette of deep blues, silvers, and vibrant accents mirrors the night sky, creating a backdrop that‚Äôs both sophisticated and inviting.

Our state-of-the-art sound system fills the space with pulsating beats and rhythms from world-renowned DJs, ensuring every night is a journey through sound and movement. The dance floor, illuminated by dynamic lighting that mimics the phases of the moon, invites you to lose yourself in the music and the moment.

Moon Play offers a curated selection of signature cocktails, each crafted to perfection and inspired by the cosmic allure of the moon. From the refreshing Lunar Lemon Twist to the mysterious Eclipse Elixir, our drinks menu is designed to tantalize your taste buds and elevate your nightlife experience.

Our venue also features exclusive VIP areas, offering a more intimate setting for those seeking a private retreat within the vibrant energy of the club. Whether you‚Äôre celebrating a special occasion or simply enjoying a night out, Moon Play provides the perfect backdrop for creating memorable moments.

At Moon Play, we believe in the power of music, dance, and community to bring people together. We‚Äôre committed to creating an environment that‚Äôs welcoming, inclusive, and filled with positive energy. Join us under the moonlit sky at Moon Play, where every night is an opportunity to play among the stars.

name: Solstice Lounge
description: Solstice Lounge was created with music as our main priority. We also provide the best RP Bar staff and Dancers as well as Tarot readings! We believe that music creates the right environment. Our DJ‚Äôs are extraordinary people, who fell in love with music, creating a distinctive ambience and unique feelings. Generally we prefer smooth and fluid dance music like Deep House, Melodic Techno, Liquid DnB and Trance. The styles can change, but the general direction of our club will remain the same - Chill Vibes all around

name: CDE: ALUMBRA
description: "A moment of respite, warrior of light,
Allow us to illuminate your night,
Step into Chai‚Äôs world of wonder,
May the odds ever be in your favor!"

name: Trionfi
description: Eorzeans look for a solace. Their own little spot in the corner of the world to just get away from it all. Some folk need a bit more intimacy - that's what Trionfi is for. With a cozy atmosphere, the jazz lounge and bar is one of the few spaces in Eorzea where one can vent to a stranger, relax a bit and chill out with close friends in a smaller setting.

name: Crossroads Conversations
description: When you're lost and don't know where to turn next, you arrive at the Crossroads. Take your time to rest your feet, have a bite to eat, and enjoy in the fellow company of travelers. Find a friend and then pick up where you left off, ready to discover where you're meant to explore next.

We offer dinner parties designed for the first time RP'ers and veterans alike. Engaging you in a 60-90 minute immersive RP dinner party, encouraging character development, introducing new people, and building friendships before discovering new venues to experience!

When you're ready to head to the door, check out our curated directory of venues guaranteed to offer RP experiences!  We are partnered with more than 2 dozen venues ready to offer you a fantastic time.

name: Bar Minstrel
description: Inspired by the Tokyo bar scene, this small but ambient back alley venue is sure to delight couples, wanderers, and bar-crawlers! Our drinks are inspired from izakayas from Omoide Yokoch≈ç, Roppongi, and Shinjuku. We boast one of the few Lalafell accessible bars in Jenova so you'll find yourself delighting in appropriately sized furnishings!

name: SubZero
description: SubZero is Zero Management's latest venue and Crystal's premier Hip Hop venue.

name: The Cozy Treehouse
description: {Immersive RP/SFW} Just a quiet little cozy library cafe nestled in the Mist. Come on in to find a book, sit by the fire, and enjoy a snack or a drink.

name: The House of Qadesh
description: Welcome to the House of Qadesh! Where your darkest dreams and deepest desires are but one wish away! We offer you one of the best lustful services out there while you can enjoy delving into our Dreamscape. Our egyptian-themed venue is NSFW focused and offers you a bar, several private rooms and countless opportunities to mingle, relax and enjoy the services of our high-class lusthouse!

name: Bimbo Paradise
description: New Sargatanas Hangout bar lounge to synch up / party up / and make friends! All are welcome 18+ Club NSFW or SFW allowed

Feel free to dance the night away on our disco or just hang out on the sofa. Order drinks as you see fit, or just sit and chat away with your friends. We got all the party animals and night owl's could want.

name: Soda Pop
description: Welcome to Soda Pop , Eorzea's cozy LGBTQ+ roleplaying haven!  Whether you're a veteran storyteller or just starting your RP journey, our doors are open for you. Embrace creativity, forge connections, and be yourself in a space that celebrates inclusivity and fun. The adventure begins at  Soda Pop ‚Äîyour story, your way!

name: WiPE Tavern
description: Hello, we are a little tavern open 24/7, upstairs there are beds to rest and downstairs tubs and sofas to relax, come whenever you want if you want, we will give you some cookies! invite your friends and come relax between one wipe and another ‚ô•
(we still have to finish building everything but it is accessible, we apologize for the inconvenience ^^)

name: Violet's Repose Lounge
description: Violet's Repose is a late night lounge open every Friday night from 6:00 to 9:00 P.M PST. Our primary goal is to forge strong RP connections and we are therefore a RP heavy venue, however, we are always happy to welcome people of all skill levels and help people develop their characters and their story. We offer barded music, drinks, food and from time to time hold special events.

name: Vibe
description: We're a captivating club, specializing in kinky NSFW and ERP content, centred around English and German speakers. Are you a fan of EDM and Trance music? If so, you've found your spot!
Meet the duo holding the reigns, Sunny and Seymour Cuteheart. Alongside many DJ¬¥s, Sunny controls the beats as VIBE's resident DJs.

Our dedicated staff is here to bring your fantasies to life with your favorite companion, or you can just lose yourself on the dance floor. Featuring one of Eorzea's finest mixologists, ready to craft the most exquisite drinks for you. Feeling lucky? Visit our charming Gamba dealers in the venue and take on the challenge! Memories need to be preserved, our amazing photographer team can do just that or commission them for something truly  special.

Unleash your desires; we actively encourage steamy encounters in the venue. Clothing is optional ‚Äî feel free to express yourself in whatever way you please, even going au naturel!  Welcome to Vibe, where VIP status is not a thing!

name: Idiot Bar
description: Reject brain, embrace idiot!

name: The Garage
description: [18+ RP] The Garage is a Speed House and Metal based venue heavily focused on Roleplaying. Our amazing bartender will keep the social lubrication flowing and maybe you can talk to and spend some quality time with one of our amazing Courtesans. We have different DJs gracing the stage every week, and even some gambling if that suits your fancy. We have a little something for everyone.

name: Pogazu Pizza
description: Pogazu is the most unhinged (and longest running) pizza-related venue on Aether. Casual? pizza atmosphere where you can order quite literally anything on a pizza! Just don't ask for Namazu. The staff may serve you with a smile one moment, then threaten you with a flamethrower the next. It's the venue where everything's made up and the points don't matter!

name: Carnival Creamery
description: Carnival Creamery is a cute, SFW and AFK-friendly hidden gem hangout spot run by a couple of clowns specializing in ice cream and all things sweet.

Indulge in a snack of your choice‚Äîor just relax and soak in the whimsical atmosphere! Whether you're craving a custom-made sundae, delightful conversation, or sugary-sweet vibes, we've got everything you need to let the world melt away. Come join us for a scoop of joy!

name: Wiener Wonderland
description: Wiener Wonderland is a SFW Bar. Come enjoy Hot Dogs and Ale. Challenge your friends to a Hot Dog Eating Contest! Make friends and have fun!

name: Utop√¨a Club
description: Utop√¨a is a venue owned by Rekse Nintly. Created by the owner, it is an environment created to allow the guest to lose contact with the stressful reality of everyday life and totally surrender to the pleasures of life, be it nightclub, gambling, the pleasure of the forbidden, the captivating flavours of drinks, or a relaxing night bath. It has a large outdoor area and is located at the top of the steps from the Mist beach. It has no fixed opening but occasionally also on the owner's own initiative or in collaboration with other communities.

name: The Rainbow Room
description: The Rainbow Room is the friendly neighborhood bar with a rainbow twist! We are an inclusive, immersive Safe For Work PG-13 role play venue which offers our patrons light-hearted role play and a variety of different entertainments; Tavern Night - Open Stage nights the first and third Sundays of the month and Club Nights the second and fourth Sundays. We do not offer adult services. Be sure to join us on raffle or contest nights for some fun prizes!  Our Discord server link is available on the website and our Syncshell information is available in our Discord server.  We have a gpose photographer on staff and you could be caught on camera!

name: The White hare
description: The White Hare Art Cafe is a long existing cafe, bringing you an atmosphere and community unlike any other. Find yourself sitting in limsa all day? Perhaps your an artist and you want a cozy place to go and vibe out while you draw WoL's around you? Maybe you're someone who likes taking photo's and want to find more people to take photo's of, but not really sure how to approach people in a main city? Maybe you're even a Roleplayer and want to find a good social hub to go to in order to interact with the right crowd?

TWH is a built community for all to enjoy, relax and be entertained by our amazing staff members! Whether you know how to RP or not- they will make you feel right at home. We hope this establishment becomes a home to you just as it has for us ‚ô•
We've also recently added a new feature to our cafe - An Adventure Guild! Looking to take part of our twice a week DND styled adventures? Make sure you join our discord for more information!

name: Lofi Lounge
description: Lofi Lounge is a weekly art party with cafe treats & lofi beats. Welcoming all artists, gposers, rpers, afkers, and folks lookin' to be creative together or just vibe in a chill space.

name: Furry Affinity
description: New little LGBTQ+ /Furry Friendly venue opening. Come join us!
Fridays 11 pm to 2 am EST (not yet)
Sundays 10 pm to 2/3 am EST (Depending on if staff want to stay the extra hour)

name: Dryad's Den
