description: Dryad's Den invites you to come inside and dance til you drop on our sizeable dancefloor as DJs spin late into the night. Order a drink from our welcoming bartenders, or send that special someone one our Sweet Pea Special. We offer simple to understand games of chance, with low minimum bets so anyone can play.
We are a west coast based venue with hours to match, keeping our doors open as late as we can keep the party alive!

name: Dreams of Eros
description: Step into Dreams of Eros, your ultimate weekend escape! With our relaxed, easygoing vibe, it's the perfect place to kick off your weekend. Unwind, mingle, dance to great music, and let the night sweep you away. Join us and start your weekend on the right note!

name: Hrothbar
description: The rain is constant as you tread through the forests, but you come across a small home where a hrothgar humbly greets you. Warm food, comforting drinks, and stories to tell; let this lion dad help you relax as you weather out the storm~

name: Club Hearthbound
description: Club Hearthbound is here to provide a classy fun and entertaining night for you.

name: Oschon‚Äôs Baths 2
description: Need a laid-back spot to unwind? Swing by Oschon‚Äôs Baths! Dive into a tub, melt your stress away, and chat with some friendly faces. Take a break from the grind and come relax with us. Warm waters and great company guaranteed!

name: UltraViolet
description: Welcome to UltraViolet

Step into the pulsating heart of the future, where the glow of neon lights and the rhythm of electrifying beats create a haven for those seeking a night of indulgence and excitement. UltraViolet is more than just a bar‚Äîit's an experience.
Located in the heart of the Ul'dah city, Ultraviolet is your escape to a world of good vibes, immersive music, and unforgettable moments. Our venue features:
- A Futuristic Atmosphere: Bask in the vibrant glow of cutting-edge neon aesthetics that blend elegance with edge, setting the perfect backdrop for every encounter.
- Music That Moves You: Dance to curated tracks spun by talented DJs, or relax with live performances that set the tone for an unforgettable night.
-  Signature Cocktails and Craft Drinks: Sip on custom creations served by our expert mixologists, tailored to ignite your senses and match the mood.
-  Red-Light District Elegance: For those seeking more, Ultraviolet offers alluring, high-class entertainment and companionship that promises discretion and delight.
Whether you‚Äôre here to celebrate, unwind, or explore, UltraViolet invites you to embrace the night, leave your worries behind, and step into the glow.

name: Toasted Bun Bakery
description: A viera themed bakery/cafe good to hang out in

name: The Otter Hat
description: The Otter Hat is a Bar located in Mist where weary adventurers can rest and share their stories. Enjoy good company and a good drink listening to the sound of the sea.

name: The Orchid Cup.
description: The Orchid Cup is a Teahouse and Lounge located in Kugane. We offer the best teas, food and alcoholic beverages one can find.

name: Forgotten Paradise
description: A cocktail lounge located in the Mist, that provides a calming atmosphere, a chatty bartender, and amazing bardic performances to all of it's guests.

name: Pink Miqo
description: A nightclub featuring live music, 100/0 auctions, Glam contests, and giveaways!

name: F.V: Wildflower Theatres
description: A place for all Forest Valley theatre events & movie nights~
Enjoy the flowers and entertainment under the stars..
And see the beauty reveal itself before you!

name: The Hidden Grove
description: Welcome to The Hidden Grove, a charming haven where the aroma of freshly baked delights beckons you into a world of irresistible sweetness. Our caf√© & bakery is a symphony of flavors, crafting a delightful fusion of passion and palate-pleasing treats.

name: Little Devils
description: At Little Devils, our mission is to create a dark and seductive sanctuary where the most daring and devilish souls can come together to indulge their deepest desires. Blending succubus gothic allure with electrifying metal vibes, we strive to provide an immersive experience that will keep our guests‚Äîwhom we proudly call Sinners‚Äîcoming back for more.

Our focus is on delivering unforgettable nights through the energy of live DJs, spinning dark beats and heavy riffs that pulse through the very veins of our venue. Every night is a celebration of the sinful, the wild, and the untamed. From our captivating atmosphere to our passionate entertainment, every detail is designed to enthrall and captivate.
At Little Devils, we‚Äôre here to ignite your passions and immerse you in an unforgettable escape‚Äîwhere the music never stops, and the night is always alive. Welcome to your ultimate indulgence.

name: Spice & Miqo'te - Tavern & Bath House
description: A relaxed and warm Tavern for travelers to come to rest their feet, share stories, and wet their throats. We provide tasty food, strong drink, and good company. We also offer public baths, and rooms to rest in if you're looking for a place to spend the night. Come share your tales of adventure, unwind from the day, and enjoy a relaxing night with us. Private rooms for groups, private baths, and private beds can be rented hourly.
Saturday Openings are generally smaller and have some kind of event linked to them, such as Gambling, Fight Club, Drinking Competitions, Cosplay Events, and so on.
This is a Gil-Free Establishment, as in none of the items cost any Gil to order, nor do any services. We just wanna RP!
We are very strict on NO PUBLIC ERP within the Baths, and conduct like that will result in bans from the venue.
18+ SFW Tavern/Bath House RP

name: Jade Villa
description: Through the wish of its Jade Mistress, Jade Villa followed under the jeweled sanctuary of its community. A jeweled treehouse tavern that brings comfort and community together, you may be able to find something within our leaves worth staying for.

name: Altitude
description: Altitude is a Club that specializes in VIP and Bottle service- Gamba - DR tourneys - Great music & Great vibes all night long

name: ‚ÄúO‚Äù AfkCafe
description: Our cafe is located in  Crystal, Zalera, The Lavender Beds W22 P14.  It was created with the purpose of providing a place for people to wind down or relax at their leisure.  We serve a selection of food and drinks, all within a cafe/library atmosphere.

Our opening hours can be variable, but we‚Äôre usually open on the weekends with the earliest opening time starting at 7pm PST.  Even after our counter service has ended, or even if we‚Äôre not open on the weekdays, everyone is always more than welcome to visit and stay for as long as they like.
Our party finder is always advertised starting with the auto-translate symbol for a ‚≠ïÔ∏è .

name: The Vale
description: Relaxed nightclub atmosphere, live DJ, substantial VIP packages, inclusive and neavy roleplay compatible environment. Everything a patron could desire and more with our competent and friendly staff you're sure to get the individual attention you deserve. Come visit us at The Vale on Sundays 9pm-12am EST.

name: The Chicken's Roost
description: A cozy tavern run by a tiny chicken! We've got ales, ciders, meads, and loads of food to fill that empty belly of yours after even the busiest day of adventuring!
Guests can expect equal parts relaxation and silly shenanigans, all in a SFW environment. We're also super casual, so don't worry all that much about RP etiquette!

name: The Bel Canto Winery
description: [OPEN 4th SUNDAYS and SPECIAL EVENTS] once a beloved opera house, now a winery, lounge, and a stage playing host to talent from all across Eorzea and beyond 🎵 ‚Äî we are a low stakes environment meant for a fun and casual RP experience!

name: Dragon's Rest
description: "Every WoL needs a rest from saving the world now and then, a place where you can relax with warm food, cold drinks and great company."
Dragon's Rest can provide all of that and even more! We are a small Casual RP Tavern, a place where you can feel comfortable even if you are new to RP.

name: Nest Underground
description: Come to see what your night has in store for you at the Nest Underground, A tavern With a dark side. We are a NSFW 18+ Venue with a tavern on the main floor but you have to come see what is on the bottom.  We offer anything you could want from food to Gamba to someone to keep you warm, or maybe you want to releve some stress. Come down to the Nest Underground, where your fantasies come to play!

name: The Humming Grove
description: The Humming Grove is a cozy SFW caf√© with a delicious menu full of snacks and both hot and cold beverages to brighten your day! Within the caf√© you will also find a bard stage and photobooths, which are free for everyone to use for gpose purposes.

name: Squirt!
description: Squirt! is a tropical getaway its a pool venue we hope to see you here we are a nsfw rp venue with teasing aspects come and enjoy the pool with us ^^ https://squirtvenue.carrd.co/

name: The Hibiscus Ryokan
description: The Hibiscus is a immersive RP venue, themed around the culture and lore of the Othard continent, with a focus on the Azim Steppe and its many Xaela tribes.

name: Wanderer's Bazaar
description: Tucked away from the prying eyes of the Radiant Host is a private marketplace where one can find rare and unusual goods for sale. Anyone can ply their trade, hawk wares and offer less than savory services. Just don't go running to the guards when you find your purse empty.

name: Souls & Sundries
description: Welcome to Souls & Sundries, a hidden gem nestled in a long-forgotten corner of the world, where shadows dance among rusted relics. This sanctuary for creatures of the night is filled with ancient tomes and enchanted artifacts, each whispering secrets of the arcane.
Our skilled practitioners offer tarot readings that unveil the mysteries of your future, guiding you through fate's twists.

For those daring enough to explore the darker side of magic, we provide a curated selection of potent and dangerous items. Enter Souls & Sundries, where the past and present intertwine, and let the magic of the unknown envelop you. Your destiny awaits.

name: Eden
description: Nestled in a realm of lush greenery and forbidden delights, Eden is more than just a venue‚Äîit is an experience. Inspired by the beauty and temptation of the mythical garden, we‚Äôve created a haven where indulgence thrives, boundaries blur, and fantasies come to life.

Our venue is a sultry sanctuary where desires blossom freely. Whether you seek intimate conversations under moonlit boughs, playful encounters amid fragrant blossoms, or the thrill of dancing under a canopy of stars, Eden invites you to explore your wildest imaginings. Here, the natural world entwines with human passion, creating a space where every guest is encouraged to embrace their truest self.

Whether you come to dance, drink, or delve into deeper pleasures, you‚Äôll find a paradise that offers something for everyone. Respect, consent, and mutual enjoyment are the fruits that sustain us, ensuring that Eden remains a sanctuary for safe yet thrilling exploration.
So step into our garden, leave your inhibitions behind, and let your desires take root. Paradise is waiting.

name: Par-A DI-50
description: Par-A DI-50, or Paradiso to most involved, is a cyberpunk-themed Mature RP bar with some solarpunk inspirations. The bar's primary goal? Providing a space for any and all adventurers to relax and have some nice conversations. On Saturdays, Paradiso even has a bard, guard, and second bartender who may join the fun! Come by and say hello, so we can make a story together.

name: UMBRA
description: UMBRA is Kraken‚Äôs home for Ancients and Ascians at heart! We host a large dance area and full-service bar, perfect for those trying to relax after a long week! We also have a monthly 50/50 with future additions to come!

name: The Azure Cafe
description: The Azure Cafe is the ideal place for a nice meal, stiff drink, or revelry with any sort of person. Azure's Cafe is open to all!

name: Ethereal Nights
description: The best nightclub you'll ever visit! We have the hottest live music, friendly and interactive staff, the sexiest courtesans, stocked bar with a wide variety menu, and ViP service! Auctions every week and endless shenanigans make for the most fun you'll have at a venue!

name: Habitat
description: Habitat is a semi-immersive 18+ FFXIV Nightclub located in The Mist, Raiden server, Light Data Center. Every Friday night, our venue transforms into a pulsating haven of neon-lit waves, where desire takes on a shimmering and electric form.

Lose yourself to the beats curated by our fixed DJ Line-up ‚Äì a collective of Eorzea's finest DJs streaming live on Twitch. Our dance floor becomes a dynamic fusion of experiences where the convergence of music, ambiance and entertainment unfolds as an uncharted adventure.

Engage with our enchanting courtesans, seize the night's essence through our photography services, let the cocktails flow with the rhythm of your evening and fulfil your ambitions by trying your luck at the gambling table. Habitat has everything you need to make your night unforgettable.
It's your vibe, your scene, and your essential social hub.

name: The Blissful Eye
description: The Blissful Eye is a self-maintained venue that specializes in providing a relaxing atmosphere for everyone who wishes to escape from the clutches of reality. We have a bar and stage inside the venue for an entertaining experience, along with outside lounging on the rooftops!
Events are held on a monthly basis; we are open for film screenings and serving food, drinks, and even a tune from our performers, with occasional giveaways and bets for all to join in on!

name: The Azem's Rest
description: The Azem's Rest is a cozy micro-cafe and bar nestled into the tower of the Ingleside Building in the Empyreum. Founded by a once famed adventurer, now retired, the Rest aims to provide a comfortable place to relax, enjoy the company of friends and new strangers, and imbibe some simple refreshment.

name: Amor Caf√©
description: A maid caf√© to forget your worries and relax. A maid, to give you the care you seek. Or the cute atmosphere to sweeten your day.

name: Mother Base
description: Join the boss for a drink or two on the mother base

name: Grimlins' Lair
description: Grimlins' Lair is a fun, open, and relaxed atmosphere venue with giveaways, banter, and good times!

name: Blue Diamond
description: Welcome to **Blue Diamond**, a high-end 18+ cabaret located in a large mansion in the **Subdivisions of Mist** on **Mateus**.  **Blue Diamond** is a place for you to come and relax, be yourself and make connections!  We offer a range of entertainment from live DJs, VIP service, a fully stocked bar, talented hosts and hostesses providing a wide range of public and private RP services!  Our mission is to create an intimate environment where every stripper knows your name!

name: Moonbloom Cafe
description: A cosy, nighttime venue tucked away in the heart of the Lavender Beds, Moonbloom Cafe offers its patrons a comforting ambience to enjoy and a serene spot to relax and socialise.

name: Final Gambit
description: Established May 2022, Final Gambit has proven itself as the premiere deathmatch pit for fighters wishing to run wild unconstrained by things like "not maiming people" and "collateral damage". The arena regenerates, fighters are healed, and everyone's expecting carnage; bring your best, not what you think is polite. Go wild. Be cringe. Be free.

More specifically, Final Gambit is a laid-back venue for violence enjoyers and those who are tired of limiting their creative writing for sake of appearances. Can your character detonate their arm like a cannon? Go for it! Are they a master of elements? Shock the floor! Narrative hand-waves are built into the place's identity. Don't worry about destroying the arena with too powerful of an explosion - it'll come back! Worried about permanent injuries? Red Potion‚Ñ¢ or the services of one of our medics. Just have fun out there. Remember: Too much is never enough!

name: Tea-A-Holic
description: Walk into a cozy bubble tea cafe and jump through the secret bookshelf portal to enter our hidden bar paradise! Sip your tea and relax or join us on the dance floor while listening to live Twitch DJs every other Saturday! Join our discord as well for our weekly raffles and giveaways! We hope to see you soon!

name: The Azure Oasis
description: The unrelenting Thanalan heat and fast paced Ul'dahn city life can wear down any adventurer whether they're local or from afar. Nestled on the rim of the Goblet, the Azure Oasis is a shining beacon to all who need a break and cool off a while. Our bar is stocked with our prized exotic waters from across the globe blended and brewed with equally as exotic herbs to give each drink a life and personality of it's own. Many local delicacies and a large selection of incense also graces our menu. If you're looking for a place to drift away and relax a while (aside from occasional staff hijinks) there's none better.

name: The Black Chimera
description: Welcome to the Black Chimera, a Nightclub and cafe dedicated and designed to serve you! We're a social and RP venue geared toward entertainment, hype, and events that'll etch themselves upon the tablets of your memories! Step into our modern twist on a mythical atmosphere, guaranteed to turn your whims and wishes into reality! We look forward to your visit!

name: Forsaken Grove
description: The Forsaken Grove is a LGBTQ+ friendly 18+ only gothic kink venue. A hidden treasure to drink and dance the night away, or even enjoy some forsaken company.

name: Rose Thorn Tavern
description: A Bathhouse & Bar nestled away in the wintery land of Ishgard, welcoming to one and all. Come in from the cold and enjoy the company, or peruse the bookshelves of the owner for some entertainment.
Syncshell info in the Discord.

name: Ghoulish Endeavors
description: A Arcade Bar and Goth Club offering Gamba|Arcade|Bar|RP|and more! From live dj's to Bards! Come enjoy which ever Endeavor you wish to partake in 😉

name: BBHC
description: BBHC is a host club that specializes in male bun boy hosts! We're HOP-py to tailor your experience for you, whether you just need a chat and a drink, or would like private company with our bunnies.

name: Bards & Brews Lounge
description: Bards and Brews is an SFW RP venue geared towards hosting and promoting the various bards and bard bands that grace Eorzea with their talents. Our stage is booked weekly with multiple performers for your enjoyment and relaxation, so stop by to hear the wonderful bards and show support for all their hard work while relaxing with a drink from our bar! If you are a bard and would like to perform, please speak with the proprietress for bookings.

name: Club Glo
description: A 90s inspired club with live DJ's and a unique bar menu. Come and party the night away with us!

name: The Wishing Well
description: *The sign on the door reads "open," but the inside is dim. Despite that, the faint scent of ale and the sound of clinking glasses makes its way into the entry, coming from... The bookcase? This merits investigation.*
The Wishing Well is an atmospheric tavern/lounge hidden in and under a Gridanian Curiosities shoppe. Stop in for food, drink, conversation, and relaxation. Maybe a little mischief?
We look forward to seeing you!

name: Odysseus Bathhouse
description: Odysseus is a 18+ Bathhouse. NO LALAS!
🍃 Our state-of-the-art facilities boast a blend of modern luxuries and timeless charm, creating a serene haven that's truly unforgettable.
👑 Our highly-trained, professional staff is dedicated to making your experience as rejuvenating as possible, ensuring you leave feeling pampered and stress-free.
🌸 Explore our exquisite range of specialty services! Each tailored to meet your unique needs.

name: The Waterhole Onsen
description: An extension of the night club venue The Waterhole, The Waterhole Onsen is here to let you relax after the grind of content and the chaotic nightlife, come dip your toes in the warm waters at this magically delightful Onsen!

name: House Lily of the Valley
description: House Lily of the Valley: A small oasis where rock and rockabilly make the stage glow. In this idyllic nightclub, echoing beats and piercing riffs fill the air, creating a lively atmosphere. Leather-clad enthusiasts immerse themselves in the timeless fascination of the music that defines the spirit of House Lily of the Valley.
***House Lily of the Valley, where Past and Future become one*** 🍷

name: The Black Market
description: A speakeasy hidden in the attic of a quiet apothecary.  Whispers spread of an open market where anyone can buy, sell, and trade at their whim all without the pesky complications of regulations and taxes.

The Black Market is openly staffed - this means anyone can claim an available stall and throw on a staff tag (/lfp) if they wish to trade.  The bar is NPC run unless someone wants to hop back there and volunteer their time.
Immersive, mature, and 18+ RP all welcome.  No NSFW or ERP within these walls please and thank you.

name: Velvet
description: Near the bustling metropolitan port of Limsa Lominsa, overlooking the sapphire waters of the Rhotano Sea there is a well-kept secret for those in the know... Velvet‚Ä¶

Be you adventurer or city elite, hero or villain, from Tural to Garlemald, here at Velvet we welcome you with open arms and tails. Looking for a quiet spot to discuss the latest political machination in Tuliyollal? Kick back with friends and listen to some music? Or retain one of our Vixens and taste of their exquisite delights? The choice is yours and Velvet has you covered.

Velvet offers a discreet but friendly venue for those wanting to relax after a hard weeks adventuring. Offering a chill environment with superb bar staff, great company and the best poker dealer in Eorzea, Velvet has it all. All this is of course in addition to our selection of the most talented courtesans, or our Vixens, on the continent, who will be more than happy to sate your darkest desires with 100% confidentiality assured, in one of our custom designed private rooms.

So come, relax, have fun and ease your tired mind for a time. Our Vixens will take your worries and smooth them away with but a gentle, velvety touch‚Ä¶ or the hard end of a riding crop depending on your wants, the client comes first at Velvet and we‚Äôre more than happy to oblige.

name: Plushie's Tea Party Cafe
description: Welcome to the Plushie's Domain: Tea Party Cafe! We have a variety of baked goods and drinks such as Rolanberry Cheesecake and Ishgardian Tea! We even have seasonal items as well! Come join us and enjoy the tasty food and lovely atmosphere! All food items are gathered and crafted by hand

name: Greg's Dad's House
description: Punk nostalgia. Bard Hall primarily focused on capturing the nostalgia of the punk shows and house shows many of us went to in our younger years.

name: Chocoroni's Pizza
description: **Special Dawntrail Promotion!** Order any Combo for a chance to win a Mountain Zu Mount! See Carrd for details

Our amazing pizza place located in scenic Mist will truly tempt you! No matter where you are, We Deliver! Whether it's a Free Company house, private residence, or a venue, we've got you covered on all World Servers and Data Centers! Catering for private functions also available upon request.

name: Mythril Moon
description: ‚òÜ Cozy Bathhouse ‚òÜ [ WFH | Social | Hangout ]

name: Catgirl Dave and Busters
description: Welcome to the only casino where luck, vibes, and patrons are high af. Whether you're here to pay tribute to the one and only Catgirl Dave or sip on our signature THC-infused brews, Catgirl Dave & Busters has you covered. Try your hand at our tables, lose yourself to the beats, and let our dancers remind you why you're single and proud.

name: The Cozy Cottage
description: A warm and inviting cozy cottage, perfect for gposes alone, with friends, or partners. Open to the public 24/7.

name: Lunaris Cafe
description: A cozy cafe with abundant plant life and a light hearted atmosphere. Feel free to come get a drink from our baristas or afk/gpose in the venue. FC rooms are open as small gpose studios.

name: Tsukiakari Onsen
description: Tsukiakari Onsen is a Japanese-style bath house that was founded to create a sanctuary for women who like other women where they can relax, socialize, find companionship, and do whatever else they might desire. [Men are not allowed in the venue]

name: Lohcho‚Äôs Lounge
description: Cozy tavern feel, friendly conversations and an open stage

notices.message: This venue is often open in the evenings (Eastern Time). Check Party Finder.

name: Moonlit Grove
description: Tucked away in the heart of the Lavender Beds, Moonlit Grove is the perfect balance of magic and comfort. The Grove was created as a home away from home, where lost shards come together.

name: Dark Divinity
description: ‚∏∏𝐃𝐀𝐑𝐊 𝐃𝐈𝐕𝐈𝐍𝐈𝐓𝐘‚∏∏ 𝐖𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐠𝐨𝐭𝐡,𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐜 𝐦𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐪𝐮𝐞,𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐯𝐲 𝐦𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐜𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐝𝐞.𝐈𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐬𝐞𝐥𝐟 𝐢𝐧 𝐚 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝 𝐨𝐟 𝐬𝐡𝐚𝐝𝐨𝐰𝐬, 𝐰𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐫𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐤𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐩𝐮𝐥𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐫𝐡𝐲𝐭𝐡𝐦 𝐨𝐟 𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐜 𝐠𝐮𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐫.𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐩 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐨 𝐚𝐧 𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐦 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐛𝐞𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐬𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐭𝐞𝐦𝐩𝐭𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐬. 𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐞𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞 𝐚𝐦𝐛𝐢𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐬𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐞-𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐯𝐲 𝐦𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐬, 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐬 𝐰𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐬𝐨𝐮𝐥 𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐬 𝐢𝐭𝐬 𝐧𝐨𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐡𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐧.𝐉𝐨𝐢𝐧 𝐮𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐚𝐧 𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐧𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐝𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐧𝐨𝐫𝐦‚Äì𝐃𝐚𝐫𝐤 𝐃𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐰𝐞𝐥𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐭𝐨 𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐧𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐢𝐧 𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐢𝐭𝐬 𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐤,𝐦𝐚𝐣𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐠𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐲.Œ≤‚Ç¨≈Å∆ó‚Ç¨V‚Ç¨ ≈á√ò≈¶ƒ¶∆ó≈á«§ ¬•√ò·ªÆ ƒ¶‚Ç¨Œî≈ò Œî≈áƒê √ò≈á≈Å¬• ƒ¶Œî≈Å‚Ç£ √ò‚Ç£ ≈¥ƒ¶Œî≈¶ ¬•√ò·ªÆ ≈û‚Ç¨‚Ç¨.‚∏∏

name: Serpent's Lodge Tavern
description: Home to the Serpent's Spear Hunter's Group, the Serpent Hunting Lodge has a fully stocked tavern located in its basement. Once a month, the hunters of the Lodge throw open their doors to welcome in outsiders. Come and enjoy the flavors of Tural and various Monster Meats.

name: Ara Ara
description: Welcome to Ara Ara!  Aethers Premier anime themed nightclub! Joins us for great music, Dancing,Themed staff\Menu and more!

name: The Cabbit Patch [On hiatus]
description: A humble coffee shop ran by a bunch of himbos. Drop by, grab a drink, and laugh at the staff trying to keep the place together.
*Open Bi-weekly! See carrd or discord for details

name: Roemance
description: This is a 18+ venue. Your one stop shop for drinks, dancing, and good vibes! We have an excellent bartender, a live open stage (come show us your Bardic knowledge), and wonderful dancers for you to ogle! Come let your worries out, and hang out with a diverse group of friends!

name: The Mythril Treasury
description: The Higuri Regalia's "mini-Largesse" initiative that reoccurs on a weekly basis every Wednesday evening.  Here, rare items sourced from across the world are given away for the public to enjoy.  Come and relax in this Far Eastern hotel and bazaar, and see what's on offer for the week!  Full details here: https://mythritesuites.carrd.co/
(Tips and donations are always appreciated, but never mandatory!)

name: The Looking Glass Lounge
description: The Looking Glass Lounge is a bar and hookah lounge with a laid back, lowlight atmosphere.

name: The Kwehnnedy Center for the Eorzean Arts
description: The Kwehnnedy Center cherishes the performing arts in Final Fantasy XIV. If you are a patron, you can count on the Kwehnnedy Center to showcase the most compelling performances in Eorzea. If you're a performer, we are thrilled to host you on stage!

name: Llyn Bathhouse
description: An open large sized venue free to use by anyone. Just don't break SE ToS.
It's designed as a concert venue with an attached bathhouse in the cellar. Feel free to host your next event here!

name: Midnight Horizon
description: Step into the glow of the setting sun, where the horizon meets the waves. Welcome to Midnight Horizon, a sanctuary of elegance and energy, where the rhythms of the sea blend with the pulse of adventure. Whether you seek the thrill of the rhythm, a quiet corner to unwind, or an intimate space for unforgettable ecstasy, you‚Äôll find your place here. Let the night unfold at your pace‚Äîrelax, explore, and enjoy the company of like-minded souls. Enjoy your stay, and may the horizon always be within reach.
NSFW services, a Fully-stocked Bar, special Live musical performances, and so much more! Free public Wifi available! Join our discord to follow more special events!

name: The Raccoon Hideout
description: Nightclub with Hooter Girls serving Pizzas and Drinks!

name: Exo
description: Exo (formerly Exo Aeterna) is back on Wednesday nights! Primal‚Äôs premiere night club destination returns with our OG vibes, with performances by Swage, Lilu and other special guests! Now open biweekly on Wednesdays, Exo has been known for throwing epic music-focused parties for almost 3 years and counting!

name: Paradise Lost
description: Caught somewhere between the Seven Hells, and the realm of the Twelve, lies a little bar, a refuge for the forlorn or the dammed. If you seek a bit of solace for what once was, or simply seek to hide while you heal, come see us at Paradise Lost.

name: Greenery Oasis
description: Forest-like feel to relax and recharge! Friendly conversations, AFK friendly, an an open stage to perform your favourite tunes or listen to others

name: Nunh Nunnery Nightclub
description: Welcome to the ‚ô±Nunh Nunnery Nightclub‚ô±, where you can Sin and Be Forgiven. We're a small but humble sanctum devoted to the care and rehabilitation of sinners... by any means necessary ;). We're open Friday evenings from 7pm to 10pm EST. Hope to see you there!

name: The Warden's Grace
description: Goldsmithing and Jewelry Shop, owned and operated by one Chee Angharad. Located in the heart of the Mist, The Warden‚Äôs Grace has a wide array of fine jewelry, tools and trinkets, magical focuses and other Goldsmithing services. Ask about Private Consultations, Special Commissions, and Repairs and Restorations!

name: Outback's Den and AFK Bar
description: Outback's Den and AFK Bar is a casual and relaxing venue for friendly RP and good company, A place to relax and wait for that que to pop or just to sit AFK while you have other stuff to do IRL. The stage is open and Bards are always welcome.

name: Caf√© Uzumaki
description: Caf√© Uzumaki is led by the Kiryuin twins and their tight knit staff, a fun and chaotic bunch who love to chat and entertain! Come by for our chill vibes, fun games and be served freshly made & delicious food! The caf√© is themed after the Bungou Stray Dogs Cafe with the same name. Come by and say hi! (ÔΩ°ÔΩ•œâÔΩ•)ÔæâÔæû‚ô•

name: Longstop
description: You cautiously move through the front door met with a sleek, rich environment. You wonder if there are any gangsters around tonight doing business as you head upstairs. The deep bass of the music hits you drawing a deep breath from your lungs. Where will you start? The backjack tables? The bar? Perhaps the dance floor? Or maybe there is a special someone who could give you a magical night with only a little gil? Only you can tell what trouble you will get into when you enter Longstop.

name: SugarBabyBoomStx! (SBBS)
description: Thanks for checking us out! We here at the SBBS Nightclub would love to meet and get to know you! Our aim is to provide a positive, uplifting and fun place you can come back to again and again. Come join us for some great DJs and dance your troubles away 🙂

name: Cherry Tree Nightclub
description: Modern with a bold aesthetic, Cherry Tree is a 18+, LGBTQ+ nightclub focused on creating a safe space for individuality and expression, memorable experiences with friends and loved ones, and great music.

name: The Eventide
description: The Eventide isn't anything. It's also everything. It's a tavern. It's a lounge. It's a bubble separate from reality and common sense. We have liquor in portals. We have coffee from the sky. Sometimes there's an alligator. We have fun, we don't ask questions and we embrace the absurd.

name: Dirt & Grime Battlegrounds
description: A bare-knuckle fight club where combatants fight for glory and the nightly prize pool! Stop by and watch the fights, place bets and enjoy a drink from the bar while you enjoy!

name: Catgirl Hooters
description: At Catgirl Hooters, you'll find hot wings, cold beer, fun cocktails, thot tubs, and of course, THE Catgirl Hooters gang! We are the wildest bunch you'll ever party with.
Come party with us! Or don't. We don't pay your sub.

name: Tsuki Bathhouse
description: A quiet bathhouse where you can escape the bustle of Kugane for a cup of tea or a warm bath.

name: Lux night club
description: Lux night club is a 18+ place has a lot to offer great place to roleplay we have dancers escorts great team and a lot of fun great place to visit

name: Mistview Cinema
description: Mistview Cinema is Eorzea's premier movie theater and event space. A modern theater specializing in movie-theater style watch parties. Venue is available for booking for any other type of small-stage style events for performances, large group meetings, lecture-style speakers, etc.

name: House of Seoul
description: ‚ô• Chill vibes, live bards and drinks a plenty. ‚ô•
We are a music themed sfw venue focused on relaxation, chill vibes and good memories. Make yourselves at home!

name: The Empty Sun
description: The Empty Sun is a pub and cafe styled in the likeness of the Crystarium. 'A taste of the First, here in the Source.'
All are welcome in this casual RP-focused venue, whether you're looking for a cuppa, a meal, or even a rest between ventures.

name: Menphina's Lantern
description: Menphina's Lantern is a Greek/Twelve themed bathhouse. We are a RP Immersive venue catering to the LGBT+ community as a safe space to pursue romantic, consensual relationships.

name: Order of the Emblem
description: The eorzean answer to chivalry!

We are a small upcoming hostclub, offering a cozy yet adventurous, medieval flair, as well as a range of gorgeous, beautiful, handsome hosts, who enlighten your evening. So come in, enjoy a drink at our tavern themed bar, spend time with attractive men or dance to the vibes of our DJs music.

name: Heaven's Gate Restaurant
description: A high scale restaurant, nestled deep in the deserts of Ul'dah, catering to any who are looking for a classy date, or a nice drink surrounded by the majesty of the Goblet.
Hours have been removed for the time being, I am not able to dedicate myself fully at this time.

name: The Dregs
description: The Dregs is a bar concealed beneath an Ishgardian wine cellar. Find your way through the secret door and down the steps to a lavishly outfitted refuge for the weary and worn out. Opening in the late hours at the end of the week, the bar is host to all sorts of folk from the upper echelons to the bottom of the barrel.

More quietly it functions as a safe haven for those pursued or targeted by both the law and those who break it. Offering unique services to help those needing to flee their former criminal lifestyles, or simply get out of a bind.

name: Mpire Club & Casino
description: Mpire Club & Casino located on Aether Gilgamesh

name: Sin City
description: Sin City, the place where fun never stops. Whether you try your luck at the blackjack table (or *dirty* blackjack table), dancing the night away, or *relax* with one of our Lucky Charms, everything here is about enjoying yourself. Leave the stress behind‚Äîthis is a space to unwind, have a good time, and let loose. No work, just pure, carefree fun.

name: Dead Space
description: Dead Space is an upscale nightclub venue that offers a variety of entertainment, often with a thematic opening, and always aiming for novelty. Some of the things you‚Äôll find here are: Live DJs, auctions (anyone can enter), high-quality gambling, photobooths, raffles, nightly giveaways, glam contests, tournaments (All kinds, often matching the night‚Äôs theme). We are LGBTQIA+ friendly. We‚Äôre also often organizing and collaborating in special events, so check our discord to see what‚Äôs coming up!

name: The Blood Drop
description: Located in the depth of the Goblet's Districts, this Gothic Nightlife venue has a lot to offer. Come check us out if gothic style is to your liking. The Venues theme is Gothic/Demons and we will open hopefully every week atleast once a week!

name: Dragon's Spine Tavern
description: A SFW High Fantasy Tavern set within the deep woods of The Black Shroud that has a little something for everyone. We are an Immersive RP venue!
We also have an open stage for anyone to take part in be it barding, storytelling, or comedy.

It is entirely safe for work as we offer no court services or anything beyond that. We wish to bring a safe space for people to roleplay at and be themselves in a scenario not often seen among other venues.

name: Astral Heart Maid Caf√©
description: Nestled along the waterside of the Lavender Beds is a beautiful caf√© full of cheerful maids, carbuncles, and magically delicious food! Astral Heart is an immersive dining experience. We offer games, gourmet food, and VIP services for those who are looking for a special night out. We also offer an upstairs bathhouse & lounge. We are an 18+ venue, but our services are SFW only. Come on in and let us treat you to Eorzea's cutest caf√©!

name: The Stormslayer Trading Company
description: Are you a seasoned explorer, a daring dragon-slayer, or simply a curious soul seeking extraordinary treasures? Look no further than The Stormslayer Trading Co! We offer a realm of wondrous and mythical goods, from enchanted weaponry to rare potions, and from mythical beasts' hides to celestial starstones. Our wares are sourced from the farthest corners of the world, (and beyond!) brought to you by intrepid merchants who brave treacherous mountains and stormy seas. Whether you're a crafter seeking ingredients for a potent spell, a valiant knight in need of an edge in battle, or a curious collector of the extraordinary, The Stormslayer Trading Co. has something to ignite your passion.

name: Eastern Frost Onsen
description: Eastern Frost Onsen is a bathhouse/Teahouse where players can come to relax and hangout during their AFK moments. Refreshment are provided.

name: Sleepy Sylph Cafe
description: Sleepy Sylph Cafe is a quaint little cafe, perfect for relaxing, going AFK or RP

name: Art Studio MissDraws
description: Welcome to my little art studio, Im an digital artist and i love to draw, so have a seat and let's talk, let me know if you want to see my works, or if you want a portrait for you.

name: The Scrapyard
description: The Scrapyard is an in character 18+ immersive roleplay venue with a playful atmosphere centered around big event style cage match fights, betting, drinking at the bar, and purchasable roleplay services. Both dancers and fighters can be hired for their time in the back rooms, but otherwise it's free for all roleplay on the floor! Fighters who enter the cage are treated to custom introductions, help from the announcer and winners come home with fabulous mystery prizes. With some IC safety in place for fighters, it's a little less blood and guts here and a bit more professional wrestling in tone!

name: Club 7
description: Club 7: Where Balmung's Adventurers Gather

Calling all thrill-seekers and party animals of Balmung!  Venture beyond the usual Limsa Lominsa haunts and discover a haven for the extraordinary ‚Äì Club 7!  This interstellar nightspot, nestled near The Oblivion Free Company's Empyreum estate, throws open its doors not just to its members, but to the public as well!

Forget the neon-drenched streets ‚Äì Club 7 promises an experience that transcends the ordinary.  Step through the threshold and be transported to a world of otherworldly entertainment, designed to cater to the most adventurous souls.  Whether you're a seasoned veteran of Balmung's social scene or a fresh face just starting your journey, Club 7 has something for everyone.  So, dust off your dancing shoes, grab your friends, and prepare to be amazed!  This is your chance to mingle with fellow adventurers, experience the legendary hospitality of The Oblivion Free Company (one of Balmung's largest!), and create memories that will last a lifetime.  See you on the dance floor!

name: Crystal Academy of Musical Arts
description: The Crystal of Academy Musical Arts is a no-drama establishment intended as a place where bards/musicians/bands can relax, hangout, and share their musical passions with other fellow bards/musicians/bands and music lovers. Our regular events are also a place to showcase talent to any interested venue owners seeking to hire talent for their venue. We are also dedicated to teaching inspiring musicians and providing for the future for musical entertainment for venues. We offer 1 on 1 lessons, classrooms, and advise on unlocking the mysteries of the FFXIV performance system. We also help mediate venues finding a bard/band if such services are required.

name: The Big Black Chocobo Cafe (BBC)
description: The BBC is a Laid back roleplaying venue.  You can come enjoy a cup of coffee and a kweffin with one of our friendly staff members, or if you'd like Something a little more intimate and private our library is available.   We invite anyone to come relax and enjoy a cozy and calm atmosphere.

name: Pink Lantern
description: Welcome to <:pinklantern_logo:1171885661431791637> Pink Lantern

Our venue is more than just a nightclub; it's a welcoming sanctuary where strangers become friends and every moment is cherished. Embrace the spirit of camaraderie as you enter Pink Lantern as a guest and leave as a friend, our team of hosts greet you with genuine smiles and ensure you feel right at home. Our venue dripping in marble and neon aesthetics blending both class and fun into one.
Indulge in the excitement of our blackjack tables, where luck and strategy collide for exhilarating wins and who knows maybe you have lady luck on your side tonight.

Be mesmerized by the captivating performances of our show dancers, who light up the stage with their talent and grace. For those seeking a more intimate experience, our bookable dancers offer an enticing NSFW option, every guest can find their perfect entertainment in Pink Lantern.

And of course, no visit to Pink Lantern is complete without a visit to our fully stocked bar, where expert mixologists craft cocktails that tantalize the taste buds and elevate the evening to new heights.
At Pink Lantern, our tagline rings true: "Enter as a patron, leave as a friend." Join us for unforgettable nights filled with laughter, music, and memories that will last a lifetime.

name: The Dragon's Lair
description: A Medieval Tavern

name: Dragoste Cafe and Inn
description: An immersive cafe that accepts all walk of life. Sit down, tell us your story. We provide a place to rest your weary head, and a selection of coffee and tea to chill you down, or warm you up! Elegance is what we aim for, and while we may be shy; we won't bite! We're a cast of misfits who built a house and home of love; and when you step through the door, we welcome you as family.

name: The Smolra Cafe
description: Nestled in the Topmast Apartments, the cafe offers a cozy setting for dining, relaxing or both!

name: The Snake Den
description: The scheduling aloof bath/teahouse of Dynamis. We open and close when we desire, but a cup of delicious tea and and a relaxing bath are guaranteed.

name: Forever Hateful
description: Let spite and rage flow through your veins, shed the skins of society politeness at the door and give in to our delicious vices.

name: Bar, Bath & Eatery
description: Welcome to our Bar, Bath & Eatery! We offer a wide range of services from bathing in our relaxing baths, to socializing at our bars and grabbing a few snacks from the eatery. We have a fun atmosphere where the glowing dance floor is always popping and the DJ is always spinning great songs! Feeling like you need a little more fun and games throughout your stay? We we have a Gamba table just for you with our 50/50 Gamba shots! Feel free to DM my wife Pika Isekai or myself for more info :)‚ô•

name: Ravish
description: Join us tonight at Ravish for an exhilarating nightlife experience! Dive into an extraordinary adventure where the line between reality and fantasy blurs.
Join us at Ravish, where an Elder Horror awaits to embrace you in its enigmatic embrace. Dare to delve into the abyss, for in darkness lies the true essence of liberation. Let the night consume you.

name: Eclectic Nightclub
description: Step into the extraordinary world of Gold Squad-owned venue, a non-profit establishment that thrives on defying norms. Our space is a vibrant haven for the unconventional‚Äîa place where Underground Raves, Emos, Metal Heads, and Synthwave enthusiasts, and many other genres can come together to revel in their uniqueness. We celebrate those who boldly challenge the status quo and embrace their individuality without hesitation.

In our venue, you'll experience an exhilarating fusion of genres and subcultures that creates an atmosphere of pure excitement. Just like Gundam's, whose dynamic spirit inspires us, we've woven elements of this energy into every aspect of our space, showcasing our commitment to pushing limits and embracing the extraordinary.

Gold Squad's mission is to nurture a sanctuary where kindred spirits can gather, express themselves freely, and immerse themselves in the ecstasy of their passions. Our venue stands as a living tribute to diversity, originality, and the unrestrained pursuit of self-expression. Join us to become part of a community that thrives on breaking barriers, just like the legendary individuals that the Gundam's are....

name: The Elysian Springs
description: The Spa A venue for those looking to relax, rejuvenate, and above all, roleplay, Elysian Springs Spa is self-care socialization supreme... All without costing a single gil. All Elysian Springs Spa facilities are free of charge! All we ask in return is that you RP your heart out while visiting, and be sure to read through the Spa Rules. They're important! Baths The Spa's bread and butter -- relax in the steamy caress of our eight bubbling baths, complete with refreshments! Clothing is optional; comfort is compulsory. Sauna Seeking something more steamy? Crank up the cleanse in the closeness of our sauna, its own separate room with steam galore, located to the south-east of the Spa. Sitting Parlor Sometimes, a little calm is all you need. Take five with a friend in the tranquility of our reading room refuge, an ideal spot for quieter conversations in peace, located on the west side of the spa. VIP Services We do have additional VIP services including tarot, massage and lodgings as well as private baths for those seeking a more intimate space. It is important to note, however, that Elysian Springs is not a brothel. We cater to the fantasy with lovely and gracious staff, but are not courtesans and do not sell ERP at the spa.

name: The Speakeasy Myth
description: Welcome to The Speakeasy Myth, where whispers of fortune and secrets intertwine in a vibrant tapestry of chance and camaraderie. Step inside our hidden door, where the atmosphere is thick with the sound of shuffling cards, clinking glasses, and laughter that echoes into the night. Here, the stakes are high, but so are the rewards‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre at the poker table, rolling the dice, or trying your luck at a game of blackjack. Each corner of this enchanting space holds a promise of thrill and adventure, drawing you into a world where the ordinary fades away.

name: Rose Dragon Cafe
description: A cozy spot to enjoy a bit of coffee, tea, or a little spirits pick-me-up along with general caf√© cuisine.
We believe simplicity is best and the quality of our food and service will speak bounds.
HQ Food and warm conversations are to be had in this space.

name: Bunboi Insurance Co.
description: Need adventuring insurance? Stuck getting through a fight, dungeon, or map? Hurt from adventuring? A bun could be what your party needs! Let us help you (in character and out) in dungeons, fights, etc; or visit our clinic to get patched up and ready for your next adventure. New roleplayer friendly, SFW venue. No gil needed but tips are welcomed.

name: Club Neon Necropolis
description: Neon Necropolis, Welcome to the Underworld of the Damned and the Seductive. Solara Blackflame, our demoness owner welcomes you to our den of the unholy. Come inside, you may wish you never have to leave.

name: Sector 30's Bathouse
description: A small neighbourhood public bath, to refresh and relax after a hard day. Open 24/7, unattended

name: The Caged Dragon
description: The Caged Dragon is a modern asian themed heavy RP lounge where all can come to relax and partake of many pleasures. Come in and have a seat in our fine establishment. Enjoy the finest liquor or indulge in one of our lovely host or hostess's. We welcome everyone to come and enjoy an evening with us. We do hope to see you there.

name: The Soap Bar
description: An sfw karaoke and Jazz club, perfect for chilling and talking to friends old and new!

name: The Sanctuary
description: The Sanctuary is a gorgeous light roleplay and music venue for everyone on North American data centers to enjoy! We host live DJs and positive vibes. Thank you for visiting!

name: The Velarium Cafe & Bathhouse
description: An immersive RP Cafe and Bathhouse to relax and socialize in! AFK friendly. No gil charged for fully stocked menu and bar. Lala's welcome, SFW public spaces.

name: The Vintage
description: The Vintage is a luxurious, speakeasy and social lounge. Serving the finest liquors, wines and cigars clientele can enjoy the finer things of life In peace. However, The Vintage is known to carry its own secrets as well as protect others secrets. Criminal rings, corrupt politicians and other individuals of shady backgrounds frequent The Vintage precisely because of its seclusion and elegance.

name: Ginkgo Medical
description: A small medical center specializing in herbs, aetherial healing, runes, history, aether, and much more! Here at Ginkgo we tend to everyone no matter ones issues or try our best to point on in the right direction.

name: Kitty's Play Palace
description: We are a Open LGBTQ+ RP open maid caf√© with something for everyone. We offer Courts, Dancing , A full sized kitchen, A bakery for sweet tooth lovers. We also have a Vip section available. We have Bard playing music and very soon a DJ.

name: Envious
description: Envious is a Maid Theme Brothel & Caf√©! Our maids & servants offer the best kind of pleasure a master or mistress can desire! Craving some personal company with a beautiful maid or handsome servant? Want to enjoy the finer things in life in a relaxing environment?  Then don't hesitate, visit us and let your desires run free!

name: Delirium
description: High end, mainstream EDM venue - where the venue owner's only request of the DJs and guest is so always "Go hard!"
Offering 80/20 auctions, gamba, raffles, immersive bar, high class VIP with bottle services, shot girl for more RP immersion - come for the features and stay for the vibes!

name: Glamour
description: An immersive nightclub experience at Glamour with top-tier service including live DJs, dancers, courtesans, full service bar with one-of-a-kind cocktails, blackjack, raffles, and a first class VIP experience in the largest VIP section on Aether.

name: The Homely Oni Tavern/Â±ÖÈÖíÂ±ã„ÅÆÁ•ûÊ£Æ
description: The Homely Oni Tavern is a little place in Ishgard plentiful with Eastern drinks and meals for all to enjoy. And if that's not enough, or you're a performative type, the stage and seating downstairs is more than accommodating for you!

name: Oschon's Rest Tavern & Inn
description: An 18+ FFXIV RP venue designed to offer a combined tavern and inn experience. Wanderers and vagrants welcome. Located in Primal - Hyperion - Lavender Beds - W7 - Plot 18.

name: Destiny's Reach
description: Destiny's Reach is a restaurant nestled in the slowly reviving scene of Ala Mhigo. The venue is designed for comfort and relaxation, a place to experience the stories and lives of all kinds of people while eating delicious meals and listening to the gentle sounds of Gyr Abania.

name: Sandglass Cafe
description: The Sandglass Cafe is a small back-alley shop where adventurers, book enthusiasts, and lovers of romance novels of all kinds to hang their hats, enjoy some treats and company in a relaxing environment. This venue is SFW and beginner-friendly for RP learning.
We also run Sketch Night on the first opening of every month where the venue owner (Meia) will be sketching guests who visit the establishment and stream the process on Twitch.

name: Clowder Club
description: Our singular goal is to chill and vibe while having fun. Be sure to head down to Clowder Club to celebrate the coming of the weekend in style! Clowder Club has always been about friendship community and having a good time and it continues to be such a place. We have VIP Services, Photography service, a Sketch Artist and more ‚ô•.

name: The Kupo Cafe
description: The Kupo Cafe is a cozy venue run within the Kupo Arts & Cafe <<CAFE>> Free Company House, and is currently hosted by Renai Sance.

Whether you're looking to have art done of your character, a cozy spot to AFK, friendly company with a healthy bit of banter, or a place to practice barding on a small stage, our goal is to make you feel right at home.

name: The Bottomless Bucket
description: A small gentleman's club with a touch of Eastern flair, offering gamba and a fully stocked bar.

name: Cat Scratch Club
description: Cat Scratch Club is your Emo Rock destination- Both dark and sultry we offer a night full of sin, desire, and great vibes. We have black jack, a fully stocked bar, dancers, and courts. Let Cat Scratch make your night one to remember

name: Space Camp
description: Space Camp is home to the largest collection of player-created jump puzzles in FFXIV! Our private chambers house a variety of challenges suitable for beginners and parkour masters alike. New puzzles are added regularly. You can follow @SpaceCampFC on Twitter for updates, or visit our website for more information such as a beginner's jump guide and a timeline of FFXIV's major housing milestones. We are also open 24/7 so feel free to visit us anytime!

name: The Midnight Lotus
description: Nestled atop Foundation in Empyreum, on the fringes of the Red Light district, Midnight Lotus is a Yakuza hotspot. Members of the Yakuza as well as normal citizens alike come to the Lotus to relax and unwind. Shrouded in smoke and steam, you can let your imagination run wild and let pleasure take over. Employing a high class staff with a focus on a luxurious experience, your well being and personal secrecy are our top priority. Come to eat, drink, and let your inhibitions disappear.

name: Moonshine Bath & Bar
description: Moonshine Bath & Bar ~ A place to relax and enjoy yourself, by yourself, or around company you treasure in that moment. An adult themed location that's always under the [18+]/Adult ranges, with the intentions of promoting comfortable SFW roleplaying publicly, among normal comfortable enjoyable times, but also allowing the lewder side of things to come out in private, In DM's, or private alike.
**Note: times are subject to change, or the likes. Join the discord for the best way to keep up with things.**

name: CHIMERA
description: CHIMERA is an LGBTQ+ focused venue. We offer a safe and inclusive place for you to vibe, hang out with friends, and make new ones. We offer Tarot Readings, 30/70 Raffle, and giveaways. Our DJ's will have you falling in love, dancing, and feeling the vibe. Formally known as Lions & Dragons, but don't worry, only the name has changed.
CHIMERA. We are proud to be YOUR community Nightclub!

name: The Hidden Oasis
description: A secret place secluded in the Black Shroud, the Slyphs have invited you for timeless rest and relaxation.

name: theLude
description: After the events that led to its subsequent accident reducing it to ash, the new owner rebuilt it.
theLude is now an FC Narrative Universe Venue, that offers on its service nights on the 1st/2nd/ and 4th Friday and Saturdays at 11pm est to 1:30am two choices of RP interaction.

Come downstairs to theCellars where you and your date or friends can experience and atmospheric dining experience. Be able to fully immerse yourself in the charm theCellar brings while watching Head Chef Aridam Delfyne do what she does BEST!
Or venture upstairs to theSavoy where are hosts and bartenders are there to share in conversation and patron interaction.
Whatever night you are looking for....theLude provides!

name: Saint-Lilith
description: Welcome to Cabaret Saint-Lilith
A place where all you wishes and desires will be fullfiled and customer satisfaction is our goal.
Our team will take care of all your wishes and you can relax in a pleasant atmosphere while enjoying drinks and cocktails, that are carefully prepared by our bartenders.
Why not spice it up? Our courtesans will make sure you will never forget your visit and give you a night full of sinfull pleassure.
Secrecy and a respect for your privacy come without question while you benefit from our high quality of services and captivating atmosphere.

name: Purple Orchid
description: Purple Orchid is a bathhouse and caf√© with luscious baths, a well-stocked bar, and a cozy area to sit down with a snack or drink while enjoying live bard music. We offer an immersive RP environment where we strive to create a relaxing and cozy atmosphere for everyone, no matter if they're an RP veteran or new to the roleplaying community.

name: Whispering Pines Speakeasy
description: Between the chirps of the crickets and the chatter of fireflies lie the secrets of these evergreen woods somewhere in between. So come listen carefully to the tales these woods may tell...

name: Shroudrose Teahouse & Speakeasy
description: Nestled within the Lavender Beds of the Twelveswood with a cliffside at its back and a flowing stream beneath a short bridge at its entrance is a large mansion known as Shroudrose Teahouse & Tavern. Once housing a rowdy free company of adventurers summers ago, it now serves as the site of a teahouse and upscale bar serving everything from specialty tea blends, to a wide array of spirits, to light meals and snacks both sweet and savory.

We are a SFW, fully immersive heavy RP venue. The house is a public role-play space where anyone is welcome to come role-play at any time, and can be used as a venue for events with some prior discussion. To stop by when there is a crowd and the place is staffed by player characters, please come during our public event times. If you wish to role-play in the teahouse outside of our event hours, you can assume NPC staff take care of your characters, or you can contact us and we will have a character come assist you if possible

name: Rabbit's Burrow
description: Come into the wonderful Burrow, a very light hearted and pop club in the middle of Kugane. DJ and dancerfloor on the menu and of course a bar for everyone to enjoy. The Sauna will be for those who want to relax during the party. The Rabbit's Burrow is an LGBTQIA Venue within the world of Final Fantasy XIV.

name: The Angel's Loft
description: Welcome to the Angel's Loft, the calmest pleasure spot in the skies! Enjoy our wonderful snacks above, and our calming baths below. We offer a high tier raid and crafter food with no mb tax and a chill place to hang out and afk. We also offer a wonderful bathhouse experience and plenty of role play interactions.

name: Zanarkand
description: Welcome to ***Zanarkand***, a water-themed haven inspired by the legendary city from FFX. Surrounded by serene waters, with glowing azure walkways and cascading fountains, this venue offers a dreamlike escape into tranquility and wonder. Are you ready to dive in?

name: Cassis Tavern
description: Cassi's Cozy Cuddle Tavern! Empy Ward 30 Plot 9! SFW-RP Venue. Come enjoy a relaxing time at Cassi's Tavern, Drinks and food!
Own music stream in the carrd be sure to check it out! We also accept song requests!

name: Envy
description: Dare to Indulge?
Step into Envy, the ultimate 18+ alternative RP venue and nightclub, where boundaries blur and fantasies ignite.

Whether it‚Äôs a place of escape, enchantment, or transformation, Envy endures as a sanctuary for those who seek the sublime within the shadows. But to find its doors is to surrender to the night entirely, for once you enter, Envy becomes part of you forever.

name: The Ruby Lights District
description: The Ruby Lights District is an LGBTQ+ friendly hostclub offering a place to hang out, meet new people and to have a laugh at the staff's shenanigans.
We have hrothgar hosts, games and a relaxing asmosphere
We hope to see you there!

name: [ A Knight Out ]
description: A Knight Out is a SFW Bar/Tavern-esk Lounge Space which welcomes RP and Relaxing for an AFK Spot. If wanting, the Stage is Open to whoever desires to play.

name: Moonflower Lounge
description: Moonflower Lounge is a welcoming and vibrant lounge specifically designed for the lesbian community. Nestled in a cozy, intimate setting, the lounge offers a warm and inclusive atmosphere where guests can relax, socialize, and enjoy a variety of delicious cocktails and light bites. With its eclectic d√©cor, Moonflower Lounge is the perfect spot for making new connections and possibly more. We also host a "After Hours" once normal hours close out, for those who seek something a bit more...spicy -smiles-

name: Poseidon's Reef
description: Welcome to Maduin's premier dispensary lounge! Grab your friends and take your night to new heights with one of our premium herbs in a safe space. Diverse menu with food and drinks available, tailored to a unique underwater Thavnairian theme. We are a small, intimate and immersive venue. LGBTQ+ friendly!

name: Thavnairian Nights
description: "Oh, the music that plays as you move through a maze in the haze of your pure delight. You are caught in a dance, you are lost in the trance, of another Thavnairian Night..."

Amidst the billowing sands of the East, a Free Company's mansion emerges like a vision from a dream. Step inside and take respite from the desert winds, where a mystical lounge awaits to enchant your senses. Recline on silk and satin cushions as tantalizing dancers grace the stage, their movements weaving a spellbinding tale. Melodies from distant lands drift through the air, mingling with trails of fragrant smoke.

At this RP venue, the power of your wishes comes alive. Allow our attentive hosts and hostesses to indulge your desires, serving concoctions crafted by skilled Alchemists. Each visit offers a new mix of shisha to explore‚Äîor perhaps you‚Äôll discover your favorite blend. For those seeking more, venture further into themed rooms, rented out to various businesses and shops, each offering a unique escape to faraway places.

name: The Crystal Comfort Cafe
description: Looking for a nice relaxing and cozy place to have a late night drink and maybe a snack?
How about relaxing in our soothing baths after the long day you've just had?
Come see us at The Crystal Comfort Cafe and Bath, let us pamper you and melt all that tension away in a warm and welcoming environment full of immersive RP.

name: The Bottom Line
description: The Bottom Line is a lively jazz bar recently relocated to Ishgard from their humble beginnings as a dive in Ul'dah.
Come by for lighthearted, fast-paced RP in a cozy bar environment with a host of charming characters. Live bards & excellent vibes.
Roleplayers of all experiences welcome!

name: Clair de Lune
description: Club Clair de Lune was first established in July 2022 and then was officially opened to the public in June 2023.
Club Clair de Lune is managed by FC FTW (Forging True Wonders, Materia DC/Sophia). It sports FTW crest colours of purple/yellow/gold, a rich, boldly glowing and uniquely moon focused theme.

Clair de Lune (French for Moonlight) was themed after the beautiful Lavender Beds moon lit night views the club resides inside of. The name was inspired by a classic piano piece Clair de Lune by Claude Debussy..
**Our club is SFW (NOT R18, mature) and we are open for all. We are a non profiting venue, we strive to create an inclusive, warm and inviting atmosphere, focused on people, fun and the music.
Our venue is built immersive, RP is heavily encouraged! Syncshell and more can be found in this venue discord. Come vibe with us every two weeks and on special occasions!**

name: Seaside Caf√© & Lounge
description: Welcome to Seaside! Where the chaos is half the fun! We are a Maid & Butler Caf√© plus Lounge providing various activities and dishes for you to enjoy in a SFW environment, come join the Chaos that is Seaside!

name: Ruby Red Cafe
description: Step into our vibrant cafe and indulge in a delightful array of floral-themed treats, meals, and drinks. Enjoy tasty floral food while having delightful conversations with our friendly staff. Explore our bakery's exquisite floral sweets, savor a drink at our coffee bar, or simply relax in our cozy lounge.
Experience the charm and warmth that makes Ruby Red Cafe a special place to unwind and enjoy!

name: The Obsidian Crowned Phoenix
description: Welcome to The Obsidian Crowned Phoenix, a distinguished haven in the Mist‚Äîa VIP dining experience for Eorzea‚Äôs elite.

name: Sanctum Of Perished Souls
description: Welcome to the Sanctum of Perished Souls

Prepare to enter a realm where the darkness pulses with life and the energy of the night knows no bounds. This is no ordinary nightclub‚Äîthis is a sanctuary for those who dance with the shadows, where the music echoes through eternity, and the spirits of the lost rise with every beat.

In the Sanctum of Perished Souls, the air is electric, the lights are hypnotic, and the atmosphere is charged with mystery. Here, the boundaries between this world and the next fade, and the night becomes a celebration of the strange, the wild, and the untamed.
Whether you're here to lose yourself on the dancefloor, revel in the thrilling unknown, or simply be part of an experience unlike any other‚Äîyou've found your home.
The night is eternal, and your place in it awaits. Let the spirits guide you.

name: Tea & S'koens
description: Tea & S'koens is quite possibly the best brunch on Dynamis, definitely the best brunch in Marilith Mist Ward 12 Plot 26

name: The Bear Cave
description: The Bear Cave is Behemoth's one and only Anime Themed Underground Bear Bar! Come by for a Drink, and dance the night away as we play some of the Hottest new tracks as well as your favorite classics straight from Japan and from some of your favorite anime series!

name: Nocturna
description: Materia's Finest Lounge and Tea House

name: The Crystal Font
description: The Crystal Font is a florist and cafe upstairs and a speakeasy downstairs.   The florist is open during the day while the speakeasy opens late at nights.
This venue is primarily a roleplay venue, though anyone is welcome to come and enjoy the atmosphere.
We host an open stage policy, dancing, and provide a cozy atmosphere for you, a small group of friends, or a special date.

name: The Light Party's Book Club
description: Whether you love fiction or non-fiction, we‚Äôve got a spot for you. From thrillers to romance, we embrace all genres. The Light Party's Book club is mainly a social gathering for those who love books, reading, collecting, or sharing them with like minded peers. Not only that there is a mini bar with snacks and drinks. Join us for engaging chats and book recommendations!

name: Moonlight Bath and Resort
description: Moonlight  Bath and Resort Is a 24/7 Bathhouse and a place to relax and chill. While washing all the worries away.

name: The White Lotus Teahouse
description: An Avatar: The Last Airbender themed teahouse, we are a small venue with a focus on sfw rp and a chill atmosphere. LGBTQIA+ friendly, and welcoming staff.

name: The Huntsman's Tavern
description: A cozy Eorzean tavern, serving fine, Coerthan-style cuisine. Here one can enjoy excellent food, and exquisite company. Partake in the wonderful tradition of the Huntsman: First time visit? Your first drink is on the house.
Come, stay awhile, and listen.

name: Rainfall Studio
description: Rainfall Studio is offering portrait services to fellow WoL. Whether you fancy a standard bust to half body portraits, or a gacha style surprise drawing, we can do it for you!

name: Voidbound Lounge
description: Welcome Traveller. Come, take a minute and rest, at the Voidbound Lounge. A safe place for voidsent and those associated with voidsent can mingle and be entertained by each other and staff. But take heed of the sin of greed. Voidbound Lounge welcomes all who wish to sample our decandent delight. Enjoy, relax, and partake.

name: 37 Beach Hill: Bar & Grille
description: Enjoy a laid back low light tavern atmosphere
Open Bi-weekly
live music by our in house bard team!
Serving drinks & food at our bar and kitchen, come relax & enjoy time with friends, cozy time alone, a good chat with our staff and anything in between! hope to see you there!

name: Reefside Cafe and Pub
description: A warm and friendly Cafe tucked away in the heart of the Mist. With the seaside vista and the salty Limsan air adrift, why not enjoy a cocktail with staff and share tales - or secrets. Wherever your weary feet have taken you, come rest at Reefside Cafe and Pub.

name: Shirayuki Sento
description: We are temporarily closed, due to DC/World Travel Restrictions. We are actively looking for a solution so everyone can join us. Please be patient and look to our twitter and/or our discord for future updates!

Stay warm in the cold white snow, at Shirayuki Sento. Come on by, and enjoy some tasty snacks, drinks, and tunes. If something more active is your speed, feel free to say hello to our death roll dealer, they'll be happy for the company. Or maybe some photos or a fortune is more your speed? Maybe you want to relax with some conversation and games? You could even just spend some time with one of our geisha, as well. There's plenty to do, and never enough time. So take a moment to battle the biting chill of the Empyreum, and warm yourself, body, heart, and soul.

name: Dark Desires
description: (18+) A Bar & Club for all those that like to relax and begin the weekend with a nice drink and/or dance the night away in our club downstairs! The drinks are tip based and we offer escorts services!

name: Skadi
description: SKADI is a Viking Mead Hall. It is a Tavern which opens for Dj's new or experienced wishing a platform to play Pagan or Folkish Sounds. Its built on old timbers, toil and beer all the while drinking honeyed mead.

name: Club Tormenta
description: Hang with Eorzeas Rascal Wabbit LS at Club Storm where gifts galore!

name: Divination
description: Enjoy our nights of mystery and wonder with amazing music of *your* choosing heading right into your soul. Our __Tarot__ themed **__Alternative__** club will leave you learning more about yourself - especially with a trip to our bar where you might convince our devilish bartender to read your fate.

name: High Nunh Bar & Grill
description: Join us at the honkiest tonkiest cowboy bar east of Shaaloani! Found in a dim and dark Ul'dah alleyway, High Nunh promises good music, wretched food, and cheap drinks.

name: Visions
description: Visions is an 18+ relaxation haven, equipped with state-of-the-art bathhouse services to both relax and excite. With Roman-inspired baths and a warm, friendly vibe, Visions serves as a place to relax, meet others, and occasionally participate in lewd activities (with or without the staff).

name: Umbral Radiance
description: Are you the life of the party or a wallflower? A fluent dancer or a serial couch warmer? Or, are you  just not sure where where you belong? No matter where you come from, you are welcome here. After all, when it comes to all of creation, everything is a matter of duality. Of equal and opposite forces. Introverted or extroverted, we all precariously move through life, our very essences a battle between the astral and umbral forces that compose our aether. We pride ourselves, here at Umbral Radiance, of celebrating both sides of this universal coin flip. That is to say, not all that glistens is gold, and it is only with absolute light or absolute darkness that one may escape their shadow.

[This being said, we don't pander to assholes. Nasty opinions will be dealt with accordingly, and anyone with less than amiable "opinions" about marginalised people will be promptly black listed. ((In other words no hate speech here.)) Thanks. <3 ]

name: The Black Coffin
description: We are a brothel and bar, we focus escorts! We also have a DJ and dance area if you wish to just dance! as well as gamba!

name: **Strip N Ladders** [Official]
description: ## **Welcome to SNL!**
The best board game in Eorzea where you and your friends can have fun and steal peoples clothes! Strip N Ladders is based off the Snakes and Ladders board game with an NSFW twist.
Boards swap every 2 months and current boards/rules are reflected on the website!

name: THE CAVERN‚≠êConcert Hall
description: A place where bards and musicians can play live and stream! Where a mixed audience of console and pc players are equally entertained unlike any other venue. Wide range of light RP activities and leisure, but mainly a place by musicians, for musicians.

name: Moondancer Inn
description: The Moondancer Inn is a medieval pub located on Zodiark, Empyreum W1/P38. If you like listening to medieval music, rock, metal & folk, then this is the place you want to visit after a long and adventurous day in Eorzea. We'd love to have a pint with you!

name: The Desert Jewel
description: Located in the bustling streets of Ul'Dah, The Desert Jewel offers a place for respite, good company, and immersive RP in the heart of the city.

name: Seraphs Embrace
description: A relaxing bathhouse with food and drink, welcome to all!

name: Ataraxia Bath House + Lounge
description: Ataraxia Bath House + Lounge is a cozy, yet luxurious, retreat nestled away in the chilly residential districts of Coearthas. We offer four public baths with (or without) herbal + mineral soaks to soothe your body and relax your mind. Unwind in our lounge with fare from our limited menu while you nourish your soul with good company. (Must be 18+ to enter.)

name: "999 Nightclub"
description: The "999 Nightclub" on FFXIV Light/Raiden - The Goblet W14 P60

name: Wychwood Tonics
description: A taste of Thavnair with Eorzean flair, this apothecary styled Cafe caters not only to the culinary arts but the alchemical as well, highlighting thavnairs alchemical advancements.

From potions to pomanders, Wychwood offers a variety of magical goods in the shoppe above while catering to guests below in the dining lounge and bar, fit with a stage for special performances featuring dancers who utilize the kriegstanz.

name: Li'l Leblanc
description: It's early on a weekend morning. You want a place to chill with a piping hot breakfast of curry and coffee. Then you'll probably be headed to Li'l Leblanc. Come on by! We can talk phantom thieves or just general events or you can just relax at one of the tables. Whatever suits you! Adding more than coffee to the menu as well, stay tuned for hot cocoa and chai!

name: Midsummer Night Cafe
description: A sweet floral cafe focused on sweet conversation and gathering with new and old friends alike.

name: one/one
description: The one/one place you want to be‚ô•! A bathhouse, bobo/teashop, and lounge located in the heart of Mist.

name: Sakura Sunrise
description: An early morning 18+ Eastern Tea Shop & Bath House for you to relax and enjoy your mornings in.

name: Shinkou Rentsuki Lounge
description: A relaxed, laid-back Doman RP establishment with a twist on traditional refreshments, food, and entertainment. We are bringing a lavish, high style of the East to the Grey of Ishgard with our welcoming staff, creative menu, a casino for both low and high stakes, and reaching out to connect with the community for entertainment. Let us be your hosts and welcome you with hospitality.

name: The Unending Journey
description: MSQ Themed Caf√© with cozy, heartwarming vibes.

name: The Toybox
description: The Toybox is for music and dancing, a touch of this and that, maybe some naughty definitely some nice.

name: Astral Meadows
description: Welcome to Astral Meadows Nightclub. (18+ Venue) Come party to your hearts content on our dancefloor, drink and chat at the bar, or relax listen to music. We hope you enjoy your time with us!

name: The DREAM LAKEVIEW LODGE
description: Leisurely Lodge / Quiet Place / Relax / Rental Possible [RP / nonRP / AFK / Gpose]

name: The Black Dragon
description: The Black Dragon is a tavern/restaurant offering a variety of Ishgardian and Nosc√©an dishes. You can also book a communal table for planned evening events! The Black Dragon opens the fridays, but we open for french speaking people one week and the other is for english speaking people! IT'S THE FRENCH SPEAKING OPENING !

name: The Cats Meow
description: The Cats Meow is mainly a bathhouse, with a side used for a teahouse. We offer relaxing soaks, a choice of drinks and snacks from our menu, as well as the two cat owners, who are always looking forward to meeting you.

name: Calescent Glen
description: Welcome to Calescent Glen, a SFW immersive Eatery and Nonprofit focusing on bringing fine dining to all social classes! We provide a nice venue for date nights, chatting, casual RP, heavy RP, and so much more! If you're interested, please come and check us out, and leave your gil at home. No gil is required to participate in Calescent Glen or its services.

name: Ars Goetia
description: Ars Goetis Is a premier RP-focused immersive lounge experience for all things dark, goth, mystical, and exotic. OPENING at 10pm-1am CST~! MALBORO.LAVENDER BEDS W22P21 Venture into our dark-esoteric church themed lounge to experience indulgence. https://arsgoetia.crd.co/

name: Skysingers Beach-Club
description: Welcome to Skysingers Beach-Club! We are glad you found your way to us 🥰
We are a venue with great focus on RP! The venue is ALWAYS open, so you can stop by whenever you feel like it!
Have a seat in our Garden with a great view at the Beach and awesome sunsets to enjoy! Or come inside and have a rest in our beautiful lounge.
By Chance, the owner is around and you are even able to order some drinks or food!
We have special events and partys going on every other sunday. Please keep updated and watch out for them in our #🔊-announcements - channel at our Discord!
We are LGBTQ+ friendly venue ‚ù§Ô∏è 🧡 💛 💚 💙 💜

name: The Tusk
description: ‚Ä¢the tusk‚Ä¢ a thavnair & gyr abania restaurant with well seasoned food and colorful staff! come try our spicy curry challenge or maybe win some gil with some poker dice! either way, there's great service, fun times, and an amazingly decorated environment to thrive and enjoy by yourself or with friends! we won't judge, but we will do our best to keep you and yours happy and full!

name: BunBun's Caf√©
description: Welcome to BunBun's Caf√© ‚Äì your cozy, whimsical hideaway where charm, warmth, and just a touch of mischief await!
