Nestled in the heart of Eorzea, our cafe isn't just a place to grab a drink; it‚Äôs an unforgettable experience hosted by none other than our delightful team of bunboys. With ears as soft as our smiles, we're here to make every visit feel like a dream come true.

Our bunboys aren‚Äôt just your servers; they‚Äôre charming hosts who‚Äôll chat, entertain, and make you feel truly special. Enjoy engaging stories, playful banter, and the best company Eorzea has to offer.

name: Lilith's Cringe House
description: Want company and a nice place to chill, craft or AFK? Lilith's Cringe House is open 24/7 for everyone!

name: Maison L'charnel
description: An atelier out in the country sat low in a forest bed. Something warm and dark, something one does not seek out- rather, it finds you. Inside, one will find any and all delicacies laid out in abundance to sate their hunger. From these indulgences, one might find themselves inspired. May your grandest visions come to fruition within these halls..

name: The Hidden Rest
description: The Hidden Rest is a Library and hidden speakeasy. A place to rest and relax with the potential of live music.

name: Cat Nipps
description: A purrfect place for you and friends to spend your time RPing with other patrons or with our lovely staff. We'd love to show you a wonderful night.
***Open 1st & 3rd Saturdays a month. - 9p EST until Midnight***

name: The Rat's Nest
description: [This is an open world RP area, simply head down to The Brume in Ishgard on Zalera]

Named for the number of street rats often crammed into the small lamplit nook behind the aetheryte, The Rat's Nest is a hive of criminals and lowlives who gather in The Brume to conduct all manners of business and get into trouble.

Whether you're looking to buy or trade illegal goods and services, deal drugs, find contacts in dark places, or simply loiter somewhere far from the law, there's something here for every criminal, if you can stand the cold.

name: The Velvet Room
description: The Velvet Room is Station WSLY's place for monthly events and a few in between! You can expect a great night at our venue every First Saturday of the month and some special occasions! We have food & drink, a DJ or two or three, gambling, and end of the night giveaways! We hope you enjoy your stay at The Velvet Room!

name: Viko's Lewd Bathhouse
description: Viko's Bathhouse is an 18+ Full NSFW bathhouse. Enjoy the cozy atmosphere that encourages to bring out your inner lewdie! Please enjoy yourself, the ambiance, and your fellow patrons! :3

name: Limitless Bite
description: Ever wanted Far Eastern cuisine but never knew where to look? Come to The Limitless Bite! We are a restaurant that specializes in bringing Far Eastern tastes and culture to Eorzea by offering different kinds of foods and drinks for you to try! Our staff welcomes RP, but we do not enforce it, we want everyone and anyone to feel comfortable when they come visit us.
"The only limit to how much you can bite is your appetite"

name: Celeste
description: Looking for a place to celebrate your raid success? A place to forget the pains of endless wiping? Or even a place to relax and have a couple drinks after a long day at work? Celeste is the place for you. Celeste is a bar/nightclub venue that changes with the seasons, with a focus on the kinkier side. Whether it is a shoulder to cry on or something a little on the... adult side, we are sure to leave you begging for more.

name: Gateway
description: Live music venue! Hooray music! 🎉

Gateway opens monthly. Every other month we try to have overworld concerts, preferably in places which are no longer as frequented as they once were. There are many places in this world which are devoid of activity and deserve to have some life breathed back into them.
There is no specific week in which Gateway opens. However, when it does open, it is on a Sunday, mid-month.

name: Club Aqua
description: Club Aqua is a brand new Nightclub & Lounge that is situated in a large house in the Mists on Siren (Aether) .  The theme is fully aquatic-based, so if you love fishes and an underwater vibe then this club is for you!

name: Nasrin's Rest
description: A small restaurant and bar owned and operated by Nasrin binh Ahmet of Yedlihmad. It offers food and drinks with a bit of flair from Thavnair! There is also an open stage and sometimes even Nasrin herself plays a few songs for her customers.
